anya-e0807n:864: Yomhi dvissa savibhattissa duve+dve honti paccekaṃ. Duve dve, duve dve, dvīhi dvībhi.
anya-e0807n:866: Naṃmhi dvissa savibhattissa duvinnaṃ hoti vā. Duvinnaṃ, aññatra –
anya-e0807n:868_0: Dvādīnaṃ sattarasannaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ nuka hoti naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Ukāro uccāraṇattho,
anya-e0807n:868_1: kakāro antāvayavattho. Ettha nāgamo vibhattissa ādyāvayavo ce, “āgamā tagguṇībhūtā
anya-e0807n:868_2: taggahaṇena gayhante”ti ñāyā nāgamopi taṃgahaṇena gayhatīti “sunaṃhisū”ti dīghappasaṅge
anya-e0807n:868_3: pakatiyā antāvayavabhūte sarantatā natthīti na dīgho. Dvinnaṃ, dvīsu.
anya-e0807n:870: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ti+catunnaṃ tayo+cattāro honti yathākkamaṃ pulliṅge. Tayo, tayo, tīhi tībhi.
anya-e0807n:872: Jhasaññito tito naṃvacanassa ṇṇaṃ+ṇṇannaṃ honti. Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
anya-e0807n:875: Vibhattisahitānaṃ ticatunnaṃ yomhi tisso+catasso honti itthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ. Tisso, tisso, tīhi tībhi.
anya-e0807n:877_0: Naṃmhi ticatunnaṃ tissa+catassā honti+tthiyaṃ yathākkamaṃ. Naṃmhīti catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ
anya-e0807n:877_1: sāmaññavacanaṃ, no ce naṃsūti vadati, yathākkamaṃti saddadvayāpekkhaṃ. Eva+mīdisa+maññampi. Tissannaṃ tīsu.
anya-e0807n:879: Yomhi savibhattīnaṃ ticatunnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tīṇi+cattāri honti napuṃsake. Tīṇi, tīṇi, tīhi iccādi pulliṅgeva.
anya-e0807n:882_0: Catussa savibhattissa yomhi caturo hoti vā pulliṅge. Caturo cattāro. Kathaṃ “caturo
anya-e0807n:882_1: nimitte nāddasāsi”nti, liṅgavipallāsena siddhaṃ, cattāri nimittānīti attho. Vipallāso
anya-e0807n:882_2: tividho liṅgavipallāso vacanavipallāso vibhattivipallāsoti. Catūhi catūbhi. Catunnaṃ, catūsu.
anya-e0807n:883: Itthiyaṃ catasso. Catasso. Catūhi catūbhi. Catassannaṃ. Catassannaṃ. Catūsu.
anya-e0807n:884: Napuṃsake cattāri. Cattāri. Catūhi catūbhi. Iccādi pumeva.
anya-e0807n:886: “Sutte liṅgavacanamatta”nti ñāyā ṭa-iti vuttaṃ. Pañcādīhi cuddasahi saṅkhyāhi yonaṃ ṭa hoti. Pañca. Pañca. Yonaṃ ṭā+ṭenivatthanatthaṃ ṭa-vidhānaṃ.
anya-e0807n:888_0: Pañcādīnaṃ cuddasannaṃ sunaṃhisva hoti. Etta+dīghāpavādo+yaṃ. Apavādati bādhetīti
anya-e0807n:888_2: ca ussaggā “pañcādīnaṃ cuddasanna+ma” iti apavādavisayaṃ na pavisanti, sāmaññattā.
anya-e0807n:888_3: Eva+muparipi “pañcamiyaṃ parassa” “ādissā”ti. Pañcahi pañcabhi pañcannaṃ. Pañcannaṃ.
anya-e0807n:889: “Catthe”ti eko ca dasa cāti cattasamāse “amādī”ti ekena adhikā dasāti tatiyāsamāse vā kate “ekatthatāya”nti vibhattilopo. Eva+mupari ca.
anya-e0807n:893_0: Saṃkhyāto parassa dasassa ra hoti vibhāsā. Sa ca “pañcamiyaṃ parassā”ti vattamāne
anya-e0807n:893_1: “ādissā”ti dakārasseva hoti. Ekārasa ekādasa. Ekārasahi ekādasahi. Ekārasannaṃ ekādasannaṃ.
anya-e0807n:896: Āviṭṭhaliṅgattā saṃkhyāyaṃ uttarapade saliṅgeneva visesanaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:899_0: Ettha yathākkamaṃ rukkho latā paṇṇaṃti suddhaṃ. Ghaṭo ghaṭī, vajiro vajiraṃ, vedanā
anya-e0807n:899_1: vedanaṃti missaṃ. Taṭo taṭī taṭaṃti saṃkiṇṇaṃ. Sukko paṭo, sukkā paṭi, sukkaṃ vatthaṃti
anya-e0807n:899_2: upasajjanaṃ. Rājā saraṇaṃ, guṇo pamāṇaṃti āviṭṭhaṃ. Tuvaṃ ahaṃ kati pañcāti abyattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:901: Dvissa bā vā hoti cattālīsā do nāññatthe. Rāde se bārasa.
anya-e0807n:905: Chatīhi parassa dasassa ḷo hoti ro ca. Teḷasa terasa.
anya-e0807n:907: Catussa cu+co honti vā dase pare. Dvitte cuddasa coddasa catuddasa.
anya-e0807n:909: Vīsati sesu paresu pañcassa paṇṇa+pannā honti yathākkamaṃ. Pannarasa pañcadasa.
anya-e0807n:911: Chassa so-icca+ya+mādeso hoti se pare. Soḷasa sorasa. Sattarasa sattadasa. “Ekaṭṭhāna+mā”ti ā, aṭṭhārasa aṭṭhādasa.
anya-e0807n:912: Ūnā ca sā vīsati cāti “visesana+mekatthene”ti visesanasamāse “itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumi+tthī pume+vekatthe”ti pumatte ca kate ekena ūnā vīsatīti tatiyāsamāse ekūnavīsati.
anya-e0807n:913: Vīsatiādayo ānavutiyā itthiliṅge+kavacanā. Bho ekūnavīsati. Ekūnavīsatiṃ. Ekūnavīsatyā ekūnavīsatiyā. Ekūnavīsatyaṃ ekūnavīsatiyaṃ ekūnavīsatyā ekūnavīsatiyā. Matisamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:914: Evaṃ vīsati, ekavīsati, dvāvīsati bāvīsati, tevīsati catuvīsatippabhutayo. Paṇṇaādese paṇṇavīsati pañcavīsati. Evaṃ chabbīsati, sattavīsati, aṭṭhavīsati.
anya-e0807n:915_0: Ekena ūnā tiṃsati tiṃsā vāti ekūnatiṃsati ekūnatiṃsā vā. Karaṇe ekūnatiṃsāya. Ekūnatiṃsāya,
anya-e0807n:915_1: ekūnatiṃsāya, ekūnatiṃsāya, ekūnatiṃsāyaṃ. Evaṃ tiṃsatiṇiṃsāvabhutayo. Tiṃsāsaddassa
anya-e0807n:915_2: pana silope “dīghasso”ti yogavibhāgā rasso, tiṃsa. Niggahītāgamo, tiṃsaṃ. Bhotiṃse+ccādi pumeva.
anya-e0807n:916_0: Cattālīsādīsupi yathāsambhavaṃ evameva. Dvitte ekattiṃsati ekattiṃsā. Rassadvitte
anya-e0807n:916_1: dvattiṃsati dvattiṃsa. Evaṃ tettiṃsati tettiṃsādayo yāva ekūnacattālīsati ekūnacattālīsā.
anya-e0807n:916_2: Cattālīsāya simhi cattārīsā cattālīsā cattālīsaṃ, bho cattālīse+ccādi hoti. Evaṃ ekacattārīsā.
anya-e0807n:918_0: Asatādo nāññatthe cattālīsādo dvissa e vā hoti ā ca. Dvecattālīsā dvecattālīsa dvecattālīsaṃ,
anya-e0807n:918_1: evaṃ dvācattālīsa-iccādi. Dvecattārīsā dvecattārīsa dvecattārīsaṃ, evaṃ dvācattārīsā
anya-e0807n:918_2: dvācattārīsa iccādi. Cattālīsati ekacattālīsati dvecattālīsati dvācattālīsati iccādi ekūnavīsatisamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:920_0: Asatādo nāññatthe cattālīsādo tisse hoti vā. Tecattālīsā tecattālīsa tecattālīsaṃ.
anya-e0807n:920_1: Bho tecattālīse iccādi hoti. Evaṃ ticattālīsā tecattārīsā ticattārīsā iccādi, tecattālīsati
anya-e0807n:921: Evaṃ catucattālīsā pañcacattālīsā catucattālīsati pañcacattālīsati iccādi yāva ekūnapaññāsā.
anya-e0807n:922_0: Paññāsā paññāsa paññāsaṃ iccādi hoti. Evaṃ dvepaññāsā dvāpaññāsā dvipaññāsā dvepaṇṇāsā
anya-e0807n:922_1: dvāpaṇṇāsā dvipaṇṇāsā. Tepaññāsā tipaññāsā tipaññāsaṃ tepaṇṇāsā tipaṇṇāsā. Catupaṇṇāsā
anya-e0807n:923: Evaṃ saṭṭhi, ekasaṭṭhi, dvesaṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhi dvisaṭṭhi, tesaṭṭhi tisaṭṭhi, catusaṭṭhi pañcasaṭṭhi iccādi yāva ekūnasattati.
anya-e0807n:924: Sattati, ekasattati, dvesattati dvāsattati dvisattati, tesattati tisattati. Dvesattari dvāsattari dvisattari, catusattati, pañcasattati, catusattari, pañcasattarīti yāva ekūnāsīti.
anya-e0807n:925: Asīti, ekāsīti, dvāsīti, yāgame dviyāsīti, teasīti tiyāsīti, caturāsīti, pañcāsīti iccādi yāva ekūnanavuti.
anya-e0807n:926: Navuti, ekanavuti, dvenavuti dvānavuti dvinavuti, tenavuti tinavuti, catunavuti, pañcanavuti iccādi yāva ekūnasataṃ, etaṃ napuṃsakaliṅga+mekavacanantaṃ.
anya-e0807n:927: Sataṃ, bho sata satā, sataṃ, sataṃ. Satena, karaṇe satena. Satassa, satā satamhā satasmā, satassa, sate satamhi satasmiṃ. Evaṃ ekasatato pabhuti yāva sahassaṃ.
anya-e0807n:928: Koṭi pakoṭi koṭippakoṭi akkhobhiṇiyo itthiliṅge+kavacanantā. Vaggabhede tu sabbāsampi saṃkhyānaṃ bahuvacanopi hoteva “dvevīsatiyo jinadantā” “tisso vīsatiyo dinaghaṭikā” iccādi.
anya-e0807n:929: Dasadasakaṃ sataṃ nāma, dasasataṃ sahassaṃ nāma, dasasahassaṃ nahutaṃ, dasanahutaṃ lakkhaṃ, satasahassantipi vuccati.
anya-e0807n:930_0: Lakkhasataṃ koṭi, koṭilakkhasataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭilakkhasataṃ koṭippakoṭi, evaṃ nahutaṃ,
anya-e0807n:930_1: ninnahutaṃ, akkhobhiṇī, bindu, abbudaṃ, nirabbudaṃ, ahahaṃ, ababaṃ, aṭaṭaṃ, sogaṇḍikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:930_2: uppalaṃ, kumudaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ, padumaṃ, kathānaṃ, mahākathānaṃ, asaṅkhyeyyanti yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0807n:933: Athā+saṃkhyā vuccate, abyayanti ca vuccate. Taṃ pādi cādi, upasagganipātāti ca duvidhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:934: Pa parā apa saṃ anu ava o ni du vi adhi api ati su u abhi pati pari upa ā ime vīsati pādayo. Pādayo hi jotakā, na vācakā.
anya-e0807n:935_0: Tattha pa-saddo pakārā+dikamma, padhāna+ntobhāva, viyoga, tappara, bhusattha, sambhava,
anya-e0807n:935_1: titti, anāvila, patthanādīsu. Yathā pakāre-paññā. Ādikamme-vippakataṃ, padhāne-paṇītaṃ,
anya-e0807n:935_2: antobhāve-pakkhittaṃ, khittanti peraṇaṃ, pakkhittanti antokaraṇaṃ, dhātvatthassa
anya-e0807n:936: Dhātvatthaṃ bādhate koci, koci taṃ anuvattate;
anya-e0807n:938_0: Ettha ca “anuruddhakā me saṅgāmayuddhe”ti ca ime upasaggā dhātvatthaṃ visesenti nāma.
anya-e0807n:939: Parāiti parihāni, parājaya, gati, vikkamā+masanādīsu. Yathā parihāniyaṃ-parābhavo. Parājaye-parājito, gatiyaṃ-parāyanaṃ, vikkame-parakkamati, āmasane-aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:940: Apaiti apagata, garaha, vajjana, pūjā, padussanādīsu. Yathā apagate-apamāno apeto, garahe-apagabbho, vajjane-apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, pūjāyaṃ-vuddhāpacāyī, padussane-aparajjhanti.
anya-e0807n:941_0: Saṃiti samodhāna, sammāsama, samantabhāva, saṃgata, saṃkhepa, bhusattha, saha+ppattha,
anya-e0807n:941_1: pabhavā+bhimukhabhāva, vidhāna, punappuna, karaṇa, samiddhādīsu. Yathā samodhāne-sandhi,
anya-e0807n:942_0: Anuiti anugatā+nupacchinna, pacchāttha, bhusattha, sādissa, hīna, tatiyattha, lakkhaṇi+tthambhūtakkhāna,
anya-e0807n:942_1: bhāga, vicchādīsu. Anugate-anveti, anupacchinne-anusayo, pacchātthe-anurathaṃ, bhusatthe-anuratto,
anya-e0807n:942_4: bhāge-ya+dettha maṃ anu siyā, taṃ dīyatu, vicchāyaṃ-rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando.
anya-e0807n:943_0: Avaiti adhobhāga, viyoga, paribhava, jānana, suddhi nicchaya, desa, theyyādīsu. Adhobhāge-avakkhittacakkhu,
anya-e0807n:943_1: viyoge-avakokilaṃ vanaṃ, paribhave-avajānanaṃ, avamaññati, jānane-avagacchati. suddhiyaṃ–vodānaṃ
anya-e0807n:944: Oiti oroharaṇa, nīharaṇa, suddhiādīsu dissati. Orohaṇe-pāsādā orohati, nīharaṇe-omukkupāhano, suddhiyaṃ-odātaṃ.
anya-e0807n:945_0: Niiti, nissesa, niggata, nīharaṇa,+ntopavesanā+bhāva, nisedhana, nikkhanta, pātubhāvā+vadhāraṇa,
anya-e0807n:945_1: vibhajana, upamu+padhāraṇā+vasāna, cheka, nīharaṇā+varaṇādīsu. Nissese-nirutti, niggate-nikkileso,
anya-e0807n:945_4: upadhāraṇe-nisāmanaṃ, avasāne-niṭṭhitaṃ, cheke-nipuṇo, nīharaṇe-nīharati, issa dīgho. Āvaraṇe-nīvaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:946_0: Duiti asobhaṇā+bhāva, kucchitā+samiddhi, kiccha, virūpatādīsu. Asobhaṇe-duggandho,
anya-e0807n:947: Viiti visesa, vividha, viruddha, vigata, viyoga, virūpatādīsu. Visese-vimutti, visiṭṭho, vividhe-vimati, viruddhe-vivādo, vigate-vimalaṃ, viyoge-vippayutto, virūpatāyaṃ-virūpo.
anya-e0807n:948_1: Adhike-adhisīlaṃ, issare-adhipati, adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, uparibhāve-adhirohati,
anya-e0807n:949_0: Apiiti sambhāvanā+pekkhā, samuccaya, garaha, pañhādīsu. Sambhāvanāyaṃ-api dibbesu
anya-e0807n:949_1: kāmesu, merumpi vinivijjhitvā gaccheyya, apekkhāyaṃ-ayampi dhammo aniyato, samuccaye-itipi
anya-e0807n:949_2: arahaṃ, antampi antaguṇampi ādāya, garahe-api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka, pañhe-api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha.
anya-e0807n:950: Atiiti atikkamanā+tikkantā+tisaya, bhusatthādīsu. Atikkame-atirocati amhehi, atīto, atikkante-accantaṃ, atisaye-atikusalo, bhusatthe-atikodho, ativuddhi.
anya-e0807n:951: Suiti sobhaṇa, suṭṭhu, sammā, samiddhi, sukhatthādīsu. Sobhaṇe-sugandho, suṭṭhu+sammādatthesu-suṭṭhu gato sugato, sammā gatotipi sugato, samiddhiyaṃ-subhikkhaṃ, sukhatthe-sukaro.
anya-e0807n:952_0: Uiti uggatu+ddhakamma, padhāna, viyoga, sambhava, attalābha, satti, sarūpakathanādīsu.
anya-e0807n:952_1: Uggate-uggacchati, uddhakamme-āsanā uṭṭhito, ukkhepo, padhāne-uttamo, lokuttaro,
anya-e0807n:952_2: viyoge-ubbhāsito, sambhave-ubbhuto, attalābhe-uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, sattiyaṃ-ussahati gantuṃ,
anya-e0807n:953_0: Abhiiti abhimukhabhāva, visiṭṭhā+dhiku+ddhakamma, kula, sāruppa, vandana, lakkhaṇi+tthambhūtakkhāna,
anya-e0807n:953_2: uddhakamme-abhiruhati. Kule-abhijāto, sāruppe-abhirūpo, vandane-abhivādeti, lakkhaṇādīsu purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:954_0: Patiiti paṭigata, paṭiloma, paṭinidhi, paṭidāna, nisedha, nivattana, sādissa, paṭikaraṇā+dāna,
anya-e0807n:954_1: paṭibodha, paṭicca, lakkhaṇitthambhūtakkhāna, bhāga, vicchādīsu. Paṭigate-paccakkhaṃ,
anya-e0807n:954_2: paṭilome-paṭisotaṃ, paṭinidhimhi-ācariyato pati sisso, paṭidāne-telatthikassa ghataṃ
anya-e0807n:955_0: Pariiti samantatobhāva, pariccheda, vajjanā+liṅgana, nivasana, pūjā, bhojanā+vajānana,
anya-e0807n:955_1: dosakkhāna, lakkhaṇādīsu. Samantha- tobhāve-parivuto, paricchede-pariññeyyaṃ, vajjane-pariharati,
anya-e0807n:955_2: āliṅgane-parissajati, nivasane-yo vatthaṃ paridahessati, pūjāyaṃ-paricariyā, bhojane-bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0807n:956_0: Upaiti upagamana, samīpū+papatti, sādissā+dhiku+paribhāvā+nasana, dosakkhāna, saññā,
anya-e0807n:956_1: pubbakamma, pūjā, gayhākāra, bhusatthādīsu. Upagamane-nisinnaṃ vā upanisīdeyya, samīpe-upanagaraṃ,
anya-e0807n:956_2: upapattiyaṃ-saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati, atha vā upapatti=yutti, yathā upapattito ikkhatīti
anya-e0807n:956_3: upekkhā, sādisse-upamānaṃ, upamā, adhike-upakhāriyaṃ doṇo, uparibhāve-upasampanno,
anya-e0807n:956_4: anasane-upavāso, dosakkhāne-paraṃ upavadati, saññāyaṃ-upadhā, upasaggo, pubbakamme-upakkamo,
anya-e0807n:957_1: gahaṇa, nivāsana, samīpa, āvhānādīsu. Abhimukhabhāve-āgacchanti, uddhakamme-ārohati,
anya-e0807n:957_2: mariyādāyaṃ-āpabbatā khettaṃ, abhividhimhi-ākumāraṃ yaso kaccāyanassa, pattiyaṃ-āpattiṃ
anya-e0807n:957_4: āliṅgati, (ālimpati, rū), nivāse-āvasatho, āvāso, samīpe-āsannaṃ, āvhāne-āmanteti.
anya-e0807n:958: Pa parā+pa sa+manva+va, o ni du rabhi byā+dhisu;
anya-e0807n:959: Ati ni ppati pari apayo, upa ā iti vīsati;
anya-e0807n:962: Upasagga+nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
anya-e0807n:965_0: Avijjamānasaṃkhyehi parāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. Na santi ekavacanādisaṃkhyā
anya-e0807n:965_1: etesanti asaṃkhyā, tesaṃ asaṃkhyānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ bhede asatipi syādividhānaṃ “mā
anya-e0807n:965_2: no ajja vikantiṃsū”tiādo vibhatyantattā padattasiddhīti vo+noādīnaṃ siddhiyā ca tesaṃ
anya-e0807n:965_3: paṭhamādiatthe dassanato ca hoti. Pahāro parābhavo apahāro saṃhāro avahāro ohāro iccādi hoti.
anya-e0807n:970_1: Na, no, mā, a, alaṃ, halaṃ iccete paṭisedhe. “Dve paṭisedhā pakatiatthaṃ gamayantī”ti
anya-e0807n:970_2: ñāyā “na tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ paccayā na ca hontī”ti ettha na ca na honti-hontevāti
anya-e0807n:971_0: Pūraṇatthaṃ duvidhaṃ attapūraṇaṃ padapūraṇañca, tattha atha, khalu, vata, atho, assu,
anya-e0807n:971_1: yagghe, hi, carahi, naṃ, taṃ, ca, tu, vā, vo, pana, have, kīva, ha, tato, yathā,
anya-e0807n:971_2: sudaṃ, kho, ve, haṃ, enaṃ, (evaṃ, rū) seyyathidaṃ iccevamādi padapūraṇe. Tattha atha-iti
anya-e0807n:971_3: pañhā+nantariyā+dhikārādīsu ca. Khalu-iti paṭisedhā+vadhāraṇa, pasiddhīsu ca. Vata+iti
anya-e0807n:971_4: ekaṃsa, khedā+nukampa, saṃkappesu ca. Atho-iti anvādese ca. Hi-iti hetu, avadhāraṇesu
anya-e0807n:971_5: ca. Tu-iti visesa, hetu, nivattanādīsu ca. Pana-iti visesepi. Have+ve iccete ekaṃsatthepi.
anya-e0807n:971_6: Haṃ-visāda, vimhesupi. (Visāda, sambhavesu, rū). Seyyathidaṃti taṃ katamaṃti atthepi.
anya-e0807n:972_0: Atthapūraṇaṃ duvidhaṃ vibhattiyuttaṃ avibhattiyuttañca. Atthi, sakkā, labbhā iccete
anya-e0807n:972_1: paṭhamāyaṃ. Āvuso ambho hambho are hare re je iccete āmantaṇe. Divā bhiyyo (namo,
anya-e0807n:972_2: rū) iccete paṭhamādutiyāsu. Sayaṃ sāmaṃ saṃ sammā kinti iccete tatiyatthe. So+to+dhāpaccayantā
anya-e0807n:972_3: ca suttaso padaso aniccato dukkhato ekadhā dvidhā iccādi. Tave+tuṃ paccayantā catutthiyāva,
anya-e0807n:972_4: kātave dātave, kātuṃ kāretuṃ, (dātuṃ, rū) dāpetuṃ iccādi. So+topaccayantā pañcamiyatthe,
anya-e0807n:972_5: dīghaso oraso rājato vā corato vā iccādi. To satta- myatthepi tra+tthādipaccayantā
anya-e0807n:972_6: ca, ekato purato pacchato passato piṭṭhito pādato sīsato aggato mūlato, yatra yattha
anya-e0807n:972_7: yahiṃ tatra tattha tahiṃ iccādi. Samantā sāmantā parito abhito samantato ekajjhaṃ
anya-e0807n:972_8: ekamantaṃ heṭṭhā upari uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ sammukhā paramukhā āvi raho tiro uccaṃ
anya-e0807n:972_9: nīcaṃ anto antarā antaraṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā bāhirā bāhiraṃ bahi oraṃ pāraṃ ārā ārakā
anya-e0807n:972_10: pacchā pure huraṃ pecca iccete sattamiyā. Sampati āyati ajja aparajjha suve sve uttarasuve
anya-e0807n:972_11: (kisu, rū) hiyyo pare (parasuve, rū) sajju sāyaṃ pāto kālaṃ kallaṃ divā rattaṃ niccaṃ
anya-e0807n:972_12: satataṃ abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ muhuṃ muhuttaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ purā yadā tadā (kadā, rū)
anya-e0807n:973_0: Avibhattiyuttesu appeva appevanāma nu iccete saṃsayatthe. Addhā aññadatthu taggha
anya-e0807n:973_1: jātu kāmaṃ sasakkaṃ iccete ekaṃsatthe. Evaṃ iti avadhāraṇe. Kacci nu nanu kathaṃ
anya-e0807n:973_2: (kiṃsu, rū) kiṃ iccete pucchanatthe. Evaṃ iti itthaṃ iccete nidassanatthe. Iti hetu+vākyaparisamattīsu
anya-e0807n:973_3: ca. Yāva tāva yāvatā tāvatā kittāvatā ettāvatā kīva iccete paricchedanatthe. Evaṃ
anya-e0807n:973_4: sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ paṭirūpaṃ āma sādhu iccete sampaṭicchanatthe. Tathā yathā yatheva
anya-e0807n:973_5: tatheva evaṃ evameva evampi yathāpi seyyathāpi seyyathāpināma viya iva yathariva
anya-e0807n:973_6: tathariva yathānāma tathānāma yathāhi tathāhi yathāca tathāca iccete paṭibhāgatthe.
anya-e0807n:973_8: ca. Kiñcāpiiti anuggahatthe. Dhiiti garahe. Ahoiti garaha+pasaṃsana+patthanesu. Nāmaiti
anya-e0807n:973_9: garaha+pasaṃsana+saññā+pañhesu. Sādhūti pasaṃsana+yācanesu. Iṅgha handa iccete codanatthe.
anya-e0807n:973_10: Sādhu suṭṭhu evametaṃti anumodane. Kiraiti anussavana+asaddheyyesu. Nunaiti anumānā+nussaraṇa+parivitakkesu.
anya-e0807n:973_11: Kasmāti kāraṇapucchane. Yasmā tasmā tathā hi tena iccete kāraṇacchedanatthe. Saha
anya-e0807n:973_12: saddhiṃ amā (samaṃ, rū) iti samakriyāyaṃ. Vinā rite vippayoge. Nānā puthu bahupakāre.
anya-e0807n:973_13: Puthu visuṃ asaṅghāte ca. Duṭṭhu ku kucchāyaṃ (jigucchāyaṃ, rū). Puna appaṭhame.
anya-e0807n:973_14: Kathaṃ cikicchatthe. Dhā kkhattuṃ so kiñcaiti saṃkhyāvibhāge. Īsakaṃ appamānesu (appamatte,
anya-e0807n:973_15: rū). Saṇikaṃ mandatthe. Khippaṃ araṃ lahuṃ āsu tuṇhaṃ aciraṃ sīghatthe. Ciraṃ cirassaṃ
anya-e0807n:973_16: dīghakāle. Ce yadi saṃkā+vaṭṭhāne. Dhuraṃ thirā+vadhāraṇesu (dhuvaṃ thirā+vadhāraṇesu,
anya-e0807n:973_17: rū). Hā visāde. Tuṇhī abhāsane. Sacchi paccakkhe. Musā micchāalikaṃ asacce. Suvatthi āsiṭṭhe iccādi.
anya-e0807n:974_0: Tuna+ktvāna+ktvāpaccayantā ussukkanatthe bhavanti. Yathā passituna passiya passitvāna
anya-e0807n:974_1: passitvā, disvā disvāna dassetvā dātuna datvāna datvā upādāya dāpetvā viññāya viceyya
anya-e0807n:974_2: vineyya samecca nihacca upecca ārabbha āgamma iccādi.
anya-e0807n:975: Vibhattiyā kato bhedo, saliṅgānaṃ bhave tathā;
anya-e0807n:977: Evaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggehi vinimuttaṃ etaṃ nipātapadaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:984_0: Tattha ekampi atthaṃ kammādivasena ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo.
anya-e0807n:984_1: Tā pana paṭhamādibhedena sattavidhā. Tā yathā “paṭhamā+tthamatte”ti paṭhamāvibhatti
anya-e0807n:984_2: hoti. Sissa okāra+lopa+a-mādesesu naro itthī napuṃsakaṃ.
anya-e0807n:988: Jāti kriyā guṇo dabbaṃ, tathā nāmanti pañcadhā;
anya-e0807n:997: Ettha paṭo sukkoti vinassanasabhāvo ca casaddena vipulo ākāsoti avinassanasabhāvo ca attani visuṃ guṇarahito guṇo+ccate tyattho.
anya-e0807n:998: Yaṃ yaṃ visessate kiñci, taṃ taṃ dabba+miho+ccate;
anya-e0807n:1000: Ettha gojāti assajātīti vutte jāti dabbaṃ. Nīlo guṇoti ca guṇo dabbaṃ. Pacanakriyāti ca gamanādikriyāto visesiyatīti kriyāva dabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1002: Nāmanti taṃ yathā citto, saññā saddo tu taddhanī.
anya-e0807n:1003_0: Nāmassa dabbattepi cittotyādi nāmeneva pasijjhati, no ghaṭa+paṭādayova dabbattena,
anya-e0807n:1003_1: tasmā nāma+miti saññī kathīyate, taṃvācakattā tabbatī cittādi saññāsaddoti nicchiyateyya+dhippāyo.
anya-e0807n:1004_0: Ayaṃ pañcavidhopi attho saddattho ceva sāmatthiyā gamyamānattho cāti dubbidho. Tathā
anya-e0807n:1004_1: hi “pīno divā na bhuñjeyya”miti bhuttinirākati saddattho. Rattibhutti tu sāmatthiyā+vagamyate. Tene+taṃ vuccati –
anya-e0807n:1007: Mukhyo tu nirantaratthe, lakkhaṇo tu tirohite;
anya-e0807n:1009: “Mañce”ti nirantaratthe vattamāno mukhyo, “mañcā ugghosantī”ti tirohitatthe vattamāno lakkhaṇo, gāthādisakalavākyassa+tthe vattamāno byañjanasabhāvo.
anya-e0807n:1012: Vacco lakkhaṇiko byaṅgyo, cevaṃ saddo suvācako;
anya-e0807n:1015: Ti āmantaṇādhike atthamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Bho nara, bho itthi, bho napuṃsaka.
anya-e0807n:1018: Kriyā nimittaṃ kārakantu kamma, kattu, karaṇa, sampadāna, avadhi, ādhārabhedena chabbidhaṃ, taṃ yathā –
anya-e0807n:1020_0: Karīyati kattukiriyāya sambandhīyatīti kammaṃ, tasmiṃ kammakārake dutiyāvibhatti
anya-e0807n:1020_1: hoti. Taṃ tividhaṃ nibbatti, vikati, patti bhedena, tattha nibbattikamme mātā puttaṃ
anya-e0807n:1020_2: vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṃ janayati, kaṭaṃ karoti datto. Vikatiyaṃ kaṭṭha+maṅgāraṃ karoti,
anya-e0807n:1020_3: suvaṇṇaṃ kaṭakaṃ karoti, vīhayo lunāti. Pattiyaṃ datto gharaṃ pavisati, ādiccaṃ passati,
anya-e0807n:1024_0: Kaṭaṃ karoti vipulaṃ dassanīyanti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā, vipulaṃ karoti, dassanīyaṃ
anya-e0807n:1024_1: karotīti kriyāya sambandhiyamānattā. Odano paccateti odanasaddato kammatā nappatīyate,
anya-e0807n:1025_0: Icchitakammaṃ yathā-gāvuṃ payo dohati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ yācati, gāva+mava rundhati
anya-e0807n:1025_1: vajaṃ, māṇavakaṃ maggaṃ pucchati, gomantaṃ gāvaṃ bhikkhate, rukkha+mavacināti phalāni,
anya-e0807n:1025_2: rukkhātyattho. Sissaṃ dhammaṃ brūte. Ettha payo, gāvaṃ iccādi icchitaṃ, gāvuṃ, gomanta+miccādi
anya-e0807n:1025_3: anicchitaṃ. Eva+manicchitepi kaṇṭakaṃ maddati, visaṃ gilati. Yaṃ nevi+cchitaṃ, nāpi
anya-e0807n:1026_0: Ādhāre adhisi+ṭhā+sānaṃ payoge ca, pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāma+madhitiṭṭhati, rukkha+majjhāsateti.
anya-e0807n:1026_1: Ettha pathavinti pathaviyanti attho. Eva+mabhi, nipubbavisassāpi, dhamma+mabhinivisate,
anya-e0807n:1026_2: dhamme vā. Tathā upa, nva+jjhā+pubbavasatissa, gāma+mupavasati, gāma+manuvasati,
anya-e0807n:1026_3: vihāra+madhivasati, gāma+māvasati, agāraṃ ajjhavasati, ettha gāmanti gāmetyattho.
anya-e0807n:1026_4: Tathā tappānā+cārepi, nadiṃ pibati, gāmaṃ carati, nadiyaṃtyattho. Sace maṃ nālapissatīti
anya-e0807n:1026_5: mayā saddhiṃtyattho. Vihitāva paṭi-yogepi dutiyā, paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā,
anya-e0807n:1026_6: tampaṭi bojjhaṅgā bhāsantūti attho. Upamā maṃ patibhāti, upamā maṃ upaṭṭhātityattho.
anya-e0807n:1028_0: Kāladdhānaṃ dabba+guṇa+kriyāhi accantasaṃyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1028_1: Kāle-sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ, māsaṃ maṃsodanaṃ, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ
anya-e0807n:1028_2: nandanaṃ, tayo māse abhidhammaṃ deseti. Addhani-yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0807n:1029_0: Pubbanhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājānoti
anya-e0807n:1029_1: evamādīsu kālavācīhi accantasaṃyoge dutiyā, bahulaṃvidhānā vibhattivipallāso vā.
anya-e0807n:1031_0: Gatyatthānaṃ bodhatthānaṃ āhāratthānaṃ saddatthāna+makammakānaṃ bhajjādīnañca payojje
anya-e0807n:1031_1: kattari dutiyā hoti. Datto gamayati māṇavakaṃ gāmaṃ, yāpayati vā. Guru bodhayati
anya-e0807n:1031_2: māṇavakaṃ dhammaṃ, vedayati vā. Mātā bhojayati putta+modanaṃ, āsayati vā. Guru ajjhāpayati
anya-e0807n:1031_3: sissaṃ vedaṃ, pāṭhayati vā. Payojjato+ññatra kamme dutiyā. Poso āsayati dattaṃ, sāyayati
anya-e0807n:1031_4: vā. Poso aññaṃ bhajjāpeti, aññaṃ koṭṭāpeti, aññaṃ santharāpeti.
anya-e0807n:1033_0: Harādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā. Poso hāreti bhāraṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā.
anya-e0807n:1033_1: Dassayate janaṃ rājā, janeneti vā. Abhivādayate guruṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Ajjhohāreti
anya-e0807n:1033_2: sattuṃ dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Kāreti datto dattaṃ, datteneti vā. Pakkhe sabbatra kattari tatiyā.
anya-e0807n:1035_0: Khādādīnaṃ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti. Gatyatthādīsu kvaci paṭisedhattha+midaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1035_1: Khādayati datto dattena, ādayati dattena, avhāpayati datthena, saddāyayati dattena,
anya-e0807n:1037_0: Dhiādīhi yuttato dutiyā hoti. Dhi+ratthu+maṃ putikāyaṃ, antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā
anya-e0807n:1037_1: ca nālandaṃ, rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivarabhūte majjheti attho. Samādhāna+mantarena,
anya-e0807n:1039_0: Lakkhaṇādīsva+tthesu abhinā yuttamhā dutiyā hoti. Rukkha+mabhivijjotate cando, ettha
anya-e0807n:1039_1: rukkho lakkhaṇaṃ, cando lakkhitabbo, tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā pakāsīyatīti
anya-e0807n:1039_2: rukkho abhinā yutto nāma. Sādhu devadatto mātara+mabhi, mātari sādhuttaṃ pattotyattho.
anya-e0807n:1039_3: Rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃabhi vijjotate cando, rukkhe rukkhetyattho.
anya-e0807n:1041_0: Patiparīhi yuttato lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge ca+tthe dutiyā hoti. Rukkhaṃpati vijjotate,
anya-e0807n:1041_1: sādhu devadatto mātaraṃpati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃpati tiṭṭhati, ya+dettha maṃ pati siyā,
anya-e0807n:1041_2: yo mama bhāgo, so dīyatutyattho. Evaṃ rukkhaṃparityādipi.
anya-e0807n:1043: Lakkhaṇādīsu dutiyā. Rukkhamanu vijjotate, saccakiriya+manu vassi, hetu ca lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, sādhu devadatto mātara+manu, rukkhaṃ rukkha+manu vijjotate, yadettha maṃanu siyā.
anya-e0807n:1045: Sahatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Pabbata+manu tiṭṭhati, pabbatena saha tyattho.
anya-e0807n:1047: Hīnatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Anusāriputtaṃ paññavanto bhikkhū, sāriputtato paññāya hīnātyattho.
anya-e0807n:1049: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā. Upasāriputtaṃ paññavanto.
anya-e0807n:1051_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti. Jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā
anya-e0807n:1051_1: daṭṭho naro. Yattha kāraṇakāraṇampi kāraṇavasena vuccati, tatthāpi tatiyā, corehi
anya-e0807n:1051_2: gāmo daḍḍho, tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddhaṃ, saddhehi kāritā vihārā.
anya-e0807n:1053: Apayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0807n:1054: Karaṇe-taṃ pana duvidhaṃ ajjhattikabāhiravasena, yathā hatthena kammaṃ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, manasā dhammaṃ viññāyati. Dattena vihayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti.
anya-e0807n:1057_0: Pakatiyā abhirūpo, gottena gotamo iccādi bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe tatiyā. Tathā
anya-e0807n:1057_1: sāriputtoti nāmena vissuto, jātiyā khattiyo buddho, jātiyā sattavassiko, sippena
anya-e0807n:1057_2: naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṃso vayasā, evaṃ samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti.
anya-e0807n:1059_0: Sahatthena yoge tatiyā siyā. Tatiyāpi chaṭṭhīva appadhāne eva bhavati. Puttena sahā+gato,
anya-e0807n:1059_1: puttena saddhiṃ āgato, vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thūlo, nisīdi bhagavā
anya-e0807n:1059_2: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṃ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo.
anya-e0807n:1061_0: Lakkhaṇe vattamānato tatiyā. Bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭīvissake ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0807n:1061_1: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājaka+maddakkhi,
anya-e0807n:1061_2: akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo. Tena hi vikalaṅgena
anya-e0807n:1063: Vāsādilakkhaṇakriyāya hetuto tatiyā. Annena vasati, vijjāya vasati, na jaccā vasalo hoti, kammunā vasalo hoti, dānena bhogavā, ācārena kulaṃ, tena pāṇi kāmadado.
anya-e0807n:1065: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0807n:1067_0: Paraṅgabhūte hetumhi pañcamī hoti vā. Jaḷattā baddho, jaḷattenavā, paññāya mutto,
anya-e0807n:1067_1: hutvā abhāvato aniccā, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho. Bahulaṃvidhānā sattamyatthehipi,
anya-e0807n:1067_2: tena samayena, kālena dhammasākacchā, puratthimena dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako,
anya-e0807n:1067_3: uttarena kapilavatthu, yena bhagavā, tenupasaṅkami, so vo mama+ccayena satthāti.
anya-e0807n:1067_4: Māsena bhuñjati, ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāvisi, navahi māsehi vihāraṃ kārāpesi, kahāpaṇena
anya-e0807n:1067_5: ūno, dhanena vikalo, asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṃ, vācāya sakhilo,
anya-e0807n:1067_6: maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, yojanena gacchati iccādi hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā. Attanāva
anya-e0807n:1067_7: attānaṃ sammannatīti paccatte bahulaṃvidhānā kattari tatiyā. Evaṃ tilehi khette vapatīti
anya-e0807n:1067_8: kammatthe, sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇenāti pañcamyatthe ca.
anya-e0807n:1069_0: Acetanaṃ sacetanaṃ vā paṭiggāhakabhāvenā+pekkhitaṃ, taṃ sampadānaṃ, tañca dā-dāneti
anya-e0807n:1069_1: dhātuto byappena yuttameva, tattha catutthī hoti. Tañca dīyamānassa vatthuno anivāraṇa+jjhesanā+numatito
anya-e0807n:1069_2: tividho, yathā buddhassa pupphaṃ deti, bodhirukkhassa jalaṃ deti, yācakassa dhanaṃ
anya-e0807n:1072: Ādhāravivakkhāyaṃ sattamīpi, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi, yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiyeti.
anya-e0807n:1074_0: Tādatthye catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāve, tādatthyaṃ, tasmiṃ tadatthabhāve jotanīyeva
anya-e0807n:1074_1: catutthī siyā. Tadatthassa bhāvoti nimittanimittīsambandhe chaṭṭhī, tasmā chaṭṭhāpavādo+yaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1074_2: Samepi nimittanimittīnaṃ sambandhe nimittabhūtayūpatova catutthī, no nimittībhūtadāruto.
anya-e0807n:1074_3: Yūpāya dāru, pākāya vajati, buddhassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, neva davāya, na
anya-e0807n:1074_4: madāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati, lokānukampāya, phāsu vihārāya.
anya-e0807n:1075: Iccāyaṃ kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthīti sādhitattā idha chaṭṭhīti dīpanatthaṃ vuccate –
anya-e0807n:1076_0: Kassa sādu naruccati, mā ayasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, khamati saṅghassa,
anya-e0807n:1076_1: bhatta+massa nacchādetīti chaṭṭhī sambandhavacanicchāyaṃ, na ce+vaṃ virodho siyā,
anya-e0807n:1076_2: sadisarūpattā, evaṃvidhesu ca sambandhassa saddikānumatattā. Tathā hi bhāgavuttiyā
anya-e0807n:1076_3: “upapadavibhatti chaṭṭhiyā+pavādā”ti vuttaṃ, saddantare vihitā vibhatti upapadavibhatti.
anya-e0807n:1077_0: Kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā, kassa vā tuyhanti avatvā kassa
anya-e0807n:1077_1: vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamāvasena byabhicāradassanā. Eva+maññāpi
anya-e0807n:1078_0: Rañño sataṃ dhāreti rañño chattaṃ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhīva. Silāgha=kathane,
anya-e0807n:1078_1: evaṃ rañño silāghate iccādi, thutiṃ karotītyattho. Hanu=apanayane, rañño hanute,
anya-e0807n:1078_2: vañcetītyattho. Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, upagaccheyyātyattho. Sapa=akkose,
anya-e0807n:1078_3: mayhaṃ sapate, saccaṃ kurutetyattho. Dhara=dhāraṇe, suvaṇṇaṃ te dhārayate, iṇaṃ te
anya-e0807n:1078_4: dhārayati, assa rañño nāgaṃ dhārayāma. Piha=icchāyaṃ, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino,
anya-e0807n:1078_5: tesaṃ pihayanti sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ, pihayanti=patthenti. Tassa kujjha mahāvīra,
anya-e0807n:1078_6: yadi+haṃ tassa pakuppeyyaṃ, dubhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na dūbhati, yo appaduṭṭhassa
anya-e0807n:1078_7: narassa dussati. Issa=issāyaṃ, titthiyā issayanti samaṇānaṃ. Usūya=dosāvikaraṇe,
anya-e0807n:1078_8: dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ ussūyanti, kā usuyā vijānataṃ. Idha+sidha+rādha+sādha=saṃsiddhiyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1078_9: ārādho me rañño, rañño bhāgya+mārajjhati, kyā+haṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, āyasmato upālittherassa
anya-e0807n:1078_10: upasampadāpekkho upatisso. Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū,
anya-e0807n:1078_11: tassa bhikkhuno janoanugiṇāti, patigiṇāti, sādhukāradānādinā taṃ ussahatītyattho.
anya-e0807n:1078_12: Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, dhammaṃ te desissāmi,
anya-e0807n:1078_13: desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṃ te
anya-e0807n:1078_14: pavakkhāmi, alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ bhikkhu pattassa, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo
anya-e0807n:1078_15: mallassa, alaṃ te idha vāsena, kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇenāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n:1079_0: Evaṃ āyu bhoto hotu, ciraṃ jīvitaṃ, bhaddaṃ, kalyāṇaṃ, atthaṃ, payojanaṃ, kusalaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1079_1: anāmayaṃ, hitaṃ, patthaṃ, sukhaṃ, sātaṃ, bhoto hotu, sādhu sammuti me tassa, puttassā+vikareyya
anya-e0807n:1079_2: guyha+matthaṃ, tassa me sakko pāturahosi, tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṃ dūtaṃ pāhesi,
anya-e0807n:1079_3: kappati samaṇānaṃ āyogo, ekassa dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā pahoti, upamaṃ te karissāmi, añjaliṃte
anya-e0807n:1079_4: paggaṇhāmi, tassa phāsu, lokassa+ttho, namo te purisājañña, sotthi tassa, samattho
anya-e0807n:1079_5: mallo mallassa, tassa hitaṃ, tassa sukhaṃ, svāgataṃ te mahārājāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n:1084: Yathā+ssā dhāvatā poso, pato, rukkhāphalanti ca.
anya-e0807n:1085: Tattha calāvadhi dhāvatā assā puriso patati, acalāvadhi pabbatā otaranti vanacārakāti.
anya-e0807n:1086_0: Tañca avadhi visayakriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ, yattha apa apagamanakriyaṃ
anya-e0807n:1086_1: upāttaṃ=ajjhāhaṭaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattati, taṃ upāttaṃ. Yaṃ kenaci guṇena ukkaṃsiyati,
anya-e0807n:1086_2: taṃ anumeyyaṃ. Yathā gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā, pāpā cittaṃ nivārenti.
anya-e0807n:1086_3: Valāhakā vijjotate, kusulato pacatīti. Ettha ca vaḷāhakā nikkhamma, kusulato apanetvāti
anya-e0807n:1086_4: ca pubbakriyā ajjhāharīyati. Mathurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpāti anumīyati. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1089_0: Bhayahetumhi-corā bhayaṃ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyati bhayaṃ, pāpato uttasati, natthi soko
anya-e0807n:1089_1: kuto bhayaṃ. Akkhātari-upajjhāyā sikkhaṃ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīto suṇāti vā. Buddhasmā
anya-e0807n:1089_2: parājenti aññatitthiyā, parājitā bhavantītyattho. Himavatā pabhavati gaṅgā, aciravatiyā
anya-e0807n:1089_3: pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṃ indriyaṃ, upajjhāyā antaradhāyati
anya-e0807n:1089_4: sisso, mātāpitūhi antaradhārayati putto, nilīyatītyattho. Dūratthayogekīvadūro ito
anya-e0807n:1089_5: naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, gāmato nātidūre, ārakā te moghapurisā
anya-e0807n:1089_6: imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā dūratova namassanti, addasa dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1089_7: Antikatthayoge-antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā. Parimāṇe-ito mathurāya catūsu
anya-e0807n:1089_8: yojanesu saṃkassaṃ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi. Kālaparimāṇe-ito
anya-e0807n:1089_9: ekanavutikappamatthake, ito vassasatasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
anya-e0807n:1089_10: Pāsādā saṃkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā saṃkameyyāti attho, tathā hatthikkhandhā saṃkameyya,
anya-e0807n:1089_11: abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvāti attho, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya. Disatthavācīhi
anya-e0807n:1089_12: yoge-ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, avīcito yāva bhavaggaṃ, uddhaṃ pādatalā,
anya-e0807n:1089_13: adho kesamatthakā. Vibhajane-yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto
anya-e0807n:1089_14: tato varaṃ, kiñcāpi dānato sīlaṃ varaṃ, tato mayā bahutaraṃ sutaṃ, sīlameva sutā
anya-e0807n:1089_15: seyyo. Āratippayoge-ārati virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi, adinnādānā paṭivirato,
anya-e0807n:1089_16: appaṭiviratā musāvādā. Suddhatthayoge-lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho, mātuto ca pituto
anya-e0807n:1089_17: ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho. Pamocanatthayoge-parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto+smi
anya-e0807n:1089_18: mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, mutto+haṃ+sabbapāsehi. Vivecane-vivicceva kāmehi,
anya-e0807n:1089_19: vivicca akusalehi dhammehi. Pamāṇatthe-āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṃ, gambhīrato
anya-e0807n:1089_20: ca puthulato ca yojanaṃ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṃ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo
anya-e0807n:1089_21: majjhimadeso. Pubbādiyoge-pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbe nāhosi, tato paraṃ
anya-e0807n:1089_22: paccantimā janapadā, tato aparena samayena. Pañhe-kuto+si tvaṃ, kuto bhavaṃ, pāṭaliputtato.
anya-e0807n:1089_23: Kicchā laddhanti guṇe pañcamī, kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā,
anya-e0807n:1090: Kathaṃ “thokaṃ calatī”ti, kriyāvisesane kammani dutiyā, thokaṃ calanaṃ karotītyattho, thokanti calanakriyāya visesanattā kriyāvisesanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1092: Nyāyasiddhaṃ yato tasmā, tadatthaṃ na visuṃ vidhi.
anya-e0807n:1093_0: Nyāyasiddhaṃva=calananti yasmā bhāve ano, tasmā bhāvasse+kattā ekavacananti ñāyā
anya-e0807n:1093_1: ekattañca, bhāve anattā napuṃsakattañca, karotikriyāya sambandhena kammattañca sijjhatīti.
anya-e0807n:1095: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṃ tesu gamyate –
anya-e0807n:1097_0: Thokatthe-thokā muccati. Sabbattha savisaye pañcamī. Ettha “vivakkhā lokikā sā ca,
anya-e0807n:1097_1: na sakkā anivattituṃ”ti vuttattā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo na siyā. Mariyādāyaṃ-āpabbatā khettaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1097_2: Abhividhimhi-ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati, pabbataṃ vajjetvā, brahmalokamhi byāpetvāti
anya-e0807n:1097_3: ca attho. Ettha vajjamānasīmā mariyādā, gayhamānasīmā abhividhi.
anya-e0807n:1099: Vajjane vattamānehī apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti. Apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, parisālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṃ vajjetvāti attho.
anya-e0807n:1101: Paṭinidhimhi patidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī hoti. Buddhasmā pati sāriputto, ghata+massa telasmā pati dadāti.
anya-e0807n:1103: Ritesaddayoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammā, rite saddhammaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1105: Vinā+ññatrayoge nāmasmā tatiyā dutiyā pañcamī ca. Vinā vātena, vinā vātaṃ, vinā vātasmā. Aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena, aññatra dhammaṃ, aññatra dhammā.
anya-e0807n:1107: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ dutiyānivattanatthaṃ. Puthageva janena, puthageva janasmā, janena nānā, janasmā nānā.
anya-e0807n:1109_0: Sambandhe chaṭṭhī hoti. Rañño purisoti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso gaṇhāti, tasmā
anya-e0807n:1109_1: rājapurisoti viññāyati. Evameva yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena bhaṇḍabhāvena vā
anya-e0807n:1109_3: vā, āgamīvasena vā, so tividhopi attho sambandho nāma. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1111: Sambandho nāma so attho, tattha chaṭṭhī vidhīyate.
anya-e0807n:1112: Pāratantyañhi sambandho, tattha chaṭṭhī bhave tito;
anya-e0807n:1114_0: Upādhisaṅkhātavisesanato tāva-rañño puriso. Ettha ca brāhmaṇādisāmito nivattetīti
anya-e0807n:1114_1: rājā visesanaṃ, puriso tena visesiyatīti visesso. Bhaṇḍasambandhato-pahutaṃ me dhanaṃ
anya-e0807n:1114_2: sakka, ekassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ. Samīpato-ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva
anya-e0807n:1114_3: santike. Samūhe-suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṃ samūho. Avayave-manussasseva te sīsaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1114_4: rukkhassa sākhā. Vikāre-suvaṇṇassa vikati, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṃ sattu. Kāriye-yavassa
anya-e0807n:1114_5: aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko. Avatthāyaṃ-khandhānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1114_6: pātubhāvo, jarā, bhedo vā. Jātiyaṃ-manussassa bhāvo, manussānaṃ jāti. Guṇe-suvaṇṇassa
anya-e0807n:1114_7: vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa buddhassa guṇaghoso, pupphānaṃ gandho, phalānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1114_8: raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, tilānaṃ muṭṭhi, tesaṃ samāyogo,
anya-e0807n:1114_9: sandhino vimokkho, tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha, sukhaṃ te, dukkhaṃ te, cetaso
anya-e0807n:1114_10: parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa lahutā, mudutā vā, upacayo vā. Kriyāsambandhe-pādassa
anya-e0807n:1114_11: ukkhepanaṃ, avakkhepanaṃ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṃ, dānaṃ, pasāraṇaṃ, dhātūnaṃ gamanaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1114_12: ṭhānaṃ, nisajjā, sayanaṃ vā, tathāgatassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṃ, tassa mātāpitaro,
anya-e0807n:1114_13: tassa purato pāturahosi, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṃ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā,
anya-e0807n:1115: Gāvassa jāti, dhavalo, gati, siṅgaṃ, nāmanti+dha;
anya-e0807n:1116: Dabbassāpi ca jātyādi, visessā honti kāmato.
anya-e0807n:1119_0: Ṭhānito-yuvaṇṇāna+meo luttā. Āgamito-suña sassa. Sāmiyoge-devāna+mindo, migānaṃ rājā.
anya-e0807n:1119_1: Rujādiyoge-devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajji, mahāsenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1119_2: rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṃ iccādi. Yajassa yoge-pupphassa buddhassa
anya-e0807n:1119_3: yajati, pupphenātyattho. Evaṃ ghatassa aggiṃ juhati. Suhitatthe-pattaṃ odanassa pūretvā,
anya-e0807n:1119_4: pūraṃ nānāpakārassa asucino, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa. Kitakappayoge-bahulaṃvidhānā
anya-e0807n:1119_5: chaṭṭhī, rañño sammato, pūjito, sakkato, apacito, mānito vā, amataṃ tesaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0807n:1119_6: aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatā sati aparibhuttā, sādhusammato bahujanassa, suppaṭividdhā
anya-e0807n:1119_7: buddhānaṃ dhammadhātu, dhammassa gutto medhāvī. Kammatthe-tassa bhavanti vattāro,
anya-e0807n:1119_8: sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, sahitānaṃ anuppadātā,
anya-e0807n:1119_9: bodhetā pajāya, kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṃvādako lokassa,
anya-e0807n:1119_10: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo. Sarati+cchāyoge-mātu sarati, na tesaṃ koci
anya-e0807n:1119_11: sarati, sattānaṃ kammapaccayā, puttassa icchati. Karotissa (yoge) – udakassa patikurute,
anya-e0807n:1119_13: chaṭṭhī, assavanatāya dhammassa pariyāyanti, kinnu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0807n:1119_14: sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ ghoravisānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1121: Tulyatthena yoge vā chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā ca. Pitu tulyo, pitarā vā, mātu tulyo, mātarā vā.
anya-e0807n:1123_0: Kattukammaṭṭhānaṃ nisajja+pacanādikriyānaṃ yo ādhāro, taṃ ādhārakārakaṃ nāma. Kathaṃ
anya-e0807n:1123_1: kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati, devadatta+taṇḍulānaṃ kattu+kammānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1123_2: dhāraṇato tadaṭṭhaāsana+pacanakriyaṃ kaṭa+thāliyo dhārenti nāma, tasmiṃ sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0807n:1124_0: So byāpiko, opasilesiko, vesayiko, sāmīpikoti catubbidho. Tattha yo ādheyyassa nissesādhārabhūto,
anya-e0807n:1124_1: so byāpiko, yathā tilesu telaṃ atthi, khīresu jalaṃ, dadhimhi sappi. Paccekasiddhānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1124_2: bhāvānaṃ yaṃ ādheyyabhāvena upasilesanaṃ allīyanaṃ atthi, so opasilesiko. Yathā āsane
anya-e0807n:1124_3: nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati, ghaṭe udaka+matthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhito.
anya-e0807n:1124_4: Yattha samīpe samīpīvohāraṃ katvā tadāyattatādīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvo upacarīyati,
anya-e0807n:1124_5: taṃ sāmīpikaṃ, yathā gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso, gaṅgāya samīpe vajotyattho. Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati
anya-e0807n:1124_6: jetavane. Yattha aññathābhāvavasena desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhāraparikappo, so
anya-e0807n:1124_7: vesayito. Yathā ākāse sakuṇā caranti, bhūmiyaṃ manussā, jale macchā, pāsādesu patito,
anya-e0807n:1124_8: pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye nipuṇo, mātari
anya-e0807n:1128: Sāmīpiko tu gaṅgādi, ākāso visayo mato.
anya-e0807n:1130: Nimittatthe sattamī hoti. Ajinamhi haññate dīpi, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ. Sabbattha nimityattho.
anya-e0807n:1132_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, tato sattamī. Kāle gāvīsu duyhamānāsugato,
anya-e0807n:1132_1: duddhāsu āgato. Etthagamanakriyāya dohanakriyācihanaṃ, āgamanakriyāya duddhākriyācihanaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1132_2: eva+muparipi. Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte
anya-e0807n:1135: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti iccādi. “Akāle vassatī tassa, kāle tassa na vassatī”ti visayasattamī.
anya-e0807n:1137_0: Yassa bhāvo bhāvantarassa lakkhaṇaṃ bhavati, tato chaṭṭhī hoti sattamī cā+nādare
anya-e0807n:1137_1: gamyamāne. Akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu vā. “Ākoṭayanto
anya-e0807n:1137_2: so neti, sivirājassa pekkhate”, “maccu ādāya gacchati, pekkhamāne mahājane”.
anya-e0807n:1138_0: Gunnaṃ sāmīti sambandhe chaṭṭhī, gosu sāmīti visayasattamī. Evaṃ gunnamissaro, gosvi+ssaro,
anya-e0807n:1138_1: gunnaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gunnaṃ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gunnaṃ sakkhī, gosu sakkhī,
anya-e0807n:1138_2: gunnaṃ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gunnaṃ pasuto, gosu pasuto, kusalā naccagītassa, kusalā
anya-e0807n:1138_3: naccagīte, āyutto kaṭakaraṇassa, āyutto kaṭakaraṇe. Tathā ādhāravacanicchāyaṃ sattamī,
anya-e0807n:1138_4: bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, bāhāsu gahetvā, hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti,
anya-e0807n:1138_5: kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti, ñāṇasmiṃ pasanno, ñāṇasmiṃ ussukkoti visayasattamī.
anya-e0807n:1140_0: Jātiguṇakriyāhi samudāyate+kadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ, yato taṃ karīyati,
anya-e0807n:1140_1: tato chaṭṭhīsattamiyo honti. Sālayo sūkadhaññānaṃ pathyatamā, sūkadhaññesu sālayo
anya-e0807n:1140_2: pathyatamā. Kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā. Gacchataṃ
anya-e0807n:1142: Ādhikye atthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Upakhāriyaṃ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikotyattho. Tathā upanikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1144_0: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttamhā sattamī hoti. Adhibrahmadatte pañcālā, adhipañcālesu
anya-e0807n:1144_1: brahmadatto, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho. Adhidevesu buddho, sammutidevādīhi
anya-e0807n:1145: Ettha ca yathāvuttesu atthesu ayaṃ bhedo –
anya-e0807n:1146_0: Kārakaṃ sādhakaṃ nibbattakaṃ kriyānimittanti atthato ekameva, tañca daṇḍo, dhavalo,
anya-e0807n:1146_1: pacanaṃ, citto, goti dabba+guṇa+kriyā+nāma+jātibhedena pañcavidhampi kamma+kattādivasena
anya-e0807n:1146_2: chabbidhaṃ, taṃ sattikārakaṃ, tadādhārabhūtadabbādayo tatraṭṭhakārakaṃ, na mukhyato.
anya-e0807n:1146_3: Mukhyato ce honti, tesaṃ sattidabbānaṃ aññamaññabyāvaṭarūpattā yo ādhāro, so ādhāroyeva,
anya-e0807n:1146_4: kismiñcikāle karaṇaṃ vā katturūpabhūto vā na hoti, tasmā thāli pacati, thāliyā pacati,
anya-e0807n:1146_5: thāliyaṃ pacatītyādinā ekassa vatthuno kattu+karaṇā+dhārabhedo na siyā. Sattipakkhe
anya-e0807n:1146_6: pana dabbādīnaṃ anekasattiyā ādhārattā sattiyā dabbādayo vivakkhitā taṃ taṃ kārakaṃ
anya-e0807n:1146_7: hotīti dabbādīnaṃ abhedepi kārakabhedo yujjate. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1149_0: Thāli vatthuto ekā cedapi sattikārakabhūtakattu+karaṇā+dhārādīnaṃ bhedena bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n:1149_1: kimiva rāma+rāvaṇādivesadhārīnaṭako tesaṃ nāmavasena rāmo, rāvaṇoti bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n:1153_0: Ettha ca sattibhūtakattādayo mukhyakārakaṃ, taṃyogena dabbabhūtathālī guṇakārakaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1153_1: te ca kathaṃ kriyāya kārakā honti. Kattā attanā patiṭṭhitāya hasati+naccaticcādikriyāya
anya-e0807n:1153_2: nimittaṃ hoti. Kammañca attanā patiṭṭhitakriyāya tadatthabhūtaindhanādīni pavattentaṃ
anya-e0807n:1153_3: “odanaṃ pacatī”tyādo nimittaṃ. ‘Kaṭṭhehi paccatī’tyādo kaṭṭhāni jalanakriyāya sādhetabbapākassa
anya-e0807n:1153_4: aṅgabhāvena nimittaṃ. ‘Pharasunā chindatī’tyādo pharasu ca kaṭṭhānaṃ dvidhāpavattiyā
anya-e0807n:1153_5: nimittaṃ. Kammañca kriyāya sambandhīyamānabyāpye sati nimittabhāvena kriyāya nimittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1153_7: godānā+panayana+pacanakriyānaṃ nimittattā kriyāya nimittāni honti. Tesaṃ yathāsakaṃ
anya-e0807n:1153_8: kriyāya pavattako kattā, tasmā sa eva padhāno kattāti vohāraṃ labhati, aññesaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ
anya-e0807n:1153_9: kattubhāve satipi appadhānattā taṃ na labhati.
anya-e0807n:1156: Ekassa kattuno eva, sabbesaṃ kattutaṃ vinā.
anya-e0807n:1158: Karaṇādīnaṃ abhāvattā, kārakaṃ na hi chabbidhanti.
anya-e0807n:1162: Etaṃ sabhāvato upalabbhamānaṃ karaṇādīsu kattuttaṃ paresaṃ karaṇādīnaṃ jalana+dhāraṇādikriyāya aṅgaṃ upāyati appadhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n:1164: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṃ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0807n:1165: Karaṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti, sampadānaṃ tidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0807n:1172: Atha nāmānameva aññamaññasambandhīnaṃ samāsoti nāmanissitattā, sayañca nāmikattā nāmānantaraṃ samāso vuccate.
anya-e0807n:1174: Ida+madhikataṃ veditabbaṃ. Pubbe vuttavidhiggahaṇañāyena syādīti tadantassa gahaṇaṃ. So ca bhinnatthānaṃ nāmāna+mekatthībhāvo samāsoti vuccate.
anya-e0807n:1179: Upakumbhaṃ tiṭṭhagu ca, pātameghaṃti taṃ yathā.
anya-e0807n:1180_0: Asaṅkhyaṃ syādyantaṃ vibhatyādīna+matthe vattamānaṃ syādyantena sahe+katthaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1180_1: “Aviggaho niccasamāso, padantaraviggaho ce”ti padantaraviggaho. Itthīsu tathā pavattāti
anya-e0807n:1182: Eko attho yassa pakatipaccayādisamudāyassa so ekattho. Tassa bhāvo pavattinimittaṃ ekatthatā, īyādi+ṇādi+samāsavidhānaṃ, tasmiṃ sati syādilopo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1184_0: Napuṃsakaliṅge ca “pubbasmā+mādito”ti sabbavibhattīnaṃ lope ca kate adhitthi tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0807n:1184_1: bho adhitthi, adhitthi passa, adhitthi kataṃ, adhitti carati, adhitthi dehi, adhitthi
anya-e0807n:1184_2: apehi, adhitthi āyattaṃ, adhitthi patiṭṭhitaṃ. Evaṃ adhikumāri, antabhūtassa appadhānassa
anya-e0807n:1185_0: Saha=sampannaṃ brahmaṃ sabrahmaṃ. Vuttanayena ettha ca upari ca samāsādayo honti,
anya-e0807n:1185_1: ettha “akāle satatthe”ti sahassa sādeso. Syādimhi kate “pubbasmā+mādito”ti syādīnaṃ
anya-e0807n:1185_2: lope ca sampatte “nā+to+mapañcamiyā”ti apañcamiyā paṭisedho ca akārantaasaṃkhyasamāsato
anya-e0807n:1185_3: parāsaṃ sabbavibhattīnaṃ aṃādeso ca hoti. Eva+muparipi.
anya-e0807n:1186_0: Bhikkhānaṃ samiddhi subhikkhaṃ, ettha ghassa rasso. Subhikkhaṃ tiṭṭhati bho subhikkhaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1186_1: subhikkhaṃ passa. Nā+smiṃsu “vā tatiyā sattamīnaṃ”ti vikappena aṃ, subhikkhaṃ subhikkhena
anya-e0807n:1186_2: vā kataṃ, subhikkhaṃ subhikkhena vā carati, subhikkhaṃ dehi. Pañcamiyaṃ a+mabbhāvā
anya-e0807n:1186_3: subhikkhā apagaccha, subhikkha+māyattaṃ, subhikkhaṃ subhikkhe vā patiṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1187: Samīpatthe-kumbhassa samīpaṃ upakumbhaṃ, evaṃ upanagaraṃ, bho upakumbhaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1188_0: Sākalye-tiṇampi asesetvāti satiṇaṃ, tiṇampi asesetvā ajjhoharaṇīya+majjhoharatītyattho.
anya-e0807n:1188_1: Sesaṃ sabrahmasamaṃ. Aggimpi asesetvāti sāggi, aggiganthaṃpi asesetvā adhītetyattho.
anya-e0807n:1189_0: Abhāvo sambandhībhedā bahuvidho, tatra iddhābhāvevigatā iddhi=vibhūti saddikānanti
anya-e0807n:1189_1: dussaddikaṃ. Atthābhāvemakkhikānaṃ abhāvo nimmakkhikaṃ, niddarathaṃ, nimmasakaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1189_3: lahupāvuraṇaṃ atilahupāvuraṇaṃ, lahupāvuraṇassa nā+yaṃ upabhogatā loti attho.
anya-e0807n:1190_1: addhamāsaṃ anu anvaddhamāsaṃ, evaṃ paccattaṃ. Atthānativattiyaṃ-sattiṃ anatikkamma
anya-e0807n:1190_2: yathāsatti. Evaṃ yathākkamaṃ, yathābalaṃ. Bahulādhikārā yā yā parisā yathāparisā.
anya-e0807n:1190_3: Sadisatthe-kikhiyā kaṇhavicchitadhenuyā sadiso sakikhi, sahassa sādeso. Ānupubbiyaṃ-jeṭṭhānukkamena anujeṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1192: Yugapadatthe-cakkena saha=ekakālaṃ sacakkaṃ, cakkena ekakkhaṇe nidhetīti attho.
anya-e0807n:1194_0: Yathāsaddo tulyatthe vattamāno syādyantena sahe+kattho na bhavati. Yathā devadatto,
anya-e0807n:1194_1: tathā yaññadatto. Ettha upamānabhūto yathāsaddo ‘tathā yaññadatto’ti upameyya+mapekkhati,
anya-e0807n:1194_2: tasmā “sāpekkha+masamatthaṃ bhavatī”ti ñāyā asamāse “na tulye”ti paṭisedho kimattha+miti
anya-e0807n:1194_3: ce. Yasmā “yathā devadatto”ti samudāyameva upamānaṃ bhavati, na visuṃ yathāsaddo,
anya-e0807n:1194_4: tasmā samudāyasseva upameyyasāpekkhatte na asāmatthiyatā na visuṃ yathāsaddassa,
anya-e0807n:1194_5: tasmā sādisse pattasamāsassa paṭisedhattha+midaṃ. Tulyattheti vattabbe tulyaṃ vinā
anya-e0807n:1194_6: tulyatā natthīti tulyattheti avatvā tulyeti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1196: Upamā nāma sā tassā, papañco bahudhā bhave.
anya-e0807n:1198_0: Yāvasaddo avadhāraṇe vattamāno syādyantena sahe+kattho bhavati. Avadhāraṇaṃ=ettakatāparicchedo.
anya-e0807n:1198_1: Yāvantāni amattāni=bhājanāni yāvāmattaṃ, iminā samāse kate sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ. Jīvassa
anya-e0807n:1198_2: yattako paricchedo yāvajīvaṃ. Yāvatāyukaṃ, “sakatthe”ti kapaccayo. Yattakena attho yāvadatthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1199: 5. Payyapā bahi tiro pure pacchā vā pañcamyā
anya-e0807n:1200_0: Pariādayo pañcamyantena sahe+katthā honti vā. Pari pabbatā paripabbataṃ. Vāssa vākyavikappatthattā
anya-e0807n:1200_1: pari pabbatā iccādayopi honti. Apa pabbatā apapabbataṃ, ā pāṭaliputtā āpāṭaliputtaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1200_2: bahi gāmā bahigāmaṃ, tiro pabbatā tiropabbataṃ, pure bhattā purebhattaṃ, pacchā bhattā
anya-e0807n:1200_3: pacchābhattaṃ, sabbaṃ upakumbhasamaṃ, iminā samāso viseso. Eva+muparisuttepi.
anya-e0807n:1203_1: āyāme ca vattamāno syādyantena sahe+kattho vā hoti. Ettha samīpaggahaṇassa bhāvappadhānattā
anya-e0807n:1203_2: sāmīpyameva gamyateti sāmīpyeti vuttaṃ. Vanassa anu=samīpaṃ anuvanaṃ, gaṅgāya anu=āyāmo
anya-e0807n:1205_0: Tiṭṭhaguādīni aññatthena siddhāpi asmiṃ asaṃkhyasamāse nipātiyanti. Tiṭṭhanti gāvo
anya-e0807n:1205_1: yasmiṃ kāleti tiṭṭhantasadda+gosaddehi paṭhamāyomhi kate “vā+nekaññatthe”ti samāso,
anya-e0807n:1205_2: iminā nipātanā lope napuṃsakatthe ca kate simhi gossa “gossu”ti ukāre “pubbasmā+mādito”ti
anya-e0807n:1205_3: vibhattilopo. Evaṃ vahantī gāvo yasmiṃ kāleti vahaggu iccādi. Velāppakāsakapātoādīnampi
anya-e0807n:1205_4: ettheva saṅgaho, pāto nahānanti sattamīamādisamāse pātanahānaṃ, evaṃ sāyanahānaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1205_5: pātakālaṃ, sāyakālaṃ, pātameghaṃ, sāyameghaṃ, pātamaggaṃ, sāyamaggaṃ, ettha “eona+ma
anya-e0807n:1205_6: vaṇṇe”ti akāro, niggahītassa lopo ca hoti.
anya-e0807n:1207_0: Orādayo saddā chaṭṭhiyantena sahe+katthā vā honti. Oraṃ gaṅgāya oregaṅgā, upari sikharassa
anya-e0807n:1207_1: uparisikharaṃ, paṭi=mukhaṃ sotassa paṭisotaṃ, pāraṃ yamunāya pāreyamunaṃ, majjhaṃ
anya-e0807n:1207_2: gaṅgāya majjhegaṅgaṃ, heṭṭhā pāsādassa heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ, uddhaṃ gaṅgāya uddhagaṅgaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1207_3: adho gaṅgāya adhogaṅgaṃ, anto pāsādassa antopāsādaṃ. Iminā nipātanāva niggahītalope
anya-e0807n:1207_4: ca ekāre ca kate oreccādi hoti.
anya-e0807n:1214: A+mādyantānaṃ kārakānaṃ akārakānañca samāso katthacimeva vā hoti. Tañca bahulaṃvidhānenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1215_1: Saraṇaṃ gatoti samāse kate “ekatthatāyaṃ”ti vibhattilopādi upari sabbattha pubbasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1215_2: Saraṇagato, saraṇagatā. Saraṇagatā, saraṇagatāyo. Saraṇagataṃ kulaṃ, saraṇagatāni
anya-e0807n:1215_3: kulāni iccādi. Araññagato, bhūmigato. Dhammaṃ nissito dhammanissito, atthanissito.
anya-e0807n:1215_4: Bhavaṃ atīto bhavātīto, kālātīto. Pamāṇaṃ atikkantaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ, lokātikkantaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1215_5: Sukhaṃ patto sukhappatto, dukkhappatto. Sotaṃ āpanno sotāpanno, nirodhasamāpanno,
anya-e0807n:1215_6: maggappaṭipanno. Rathaṃ āruḷho rathāruḷho. Sabbarattiṃ sobhaṇo sabbarattisobhaṇo,
anya-e0807n:1215_7: muhuttasukhaṃ. Akārakānaṃ samāso accantasaṃyoge. Vuttiyevo+papadasamāse, tassa niccattā.
anya-e0807n:1215_8: Yathā kammaṃ karotīti kammakāro, kumbhakāro, atthaṃ kāmetīti atthakāmo, dhammakāmo,
anya-e0807n:1215_9: dhammaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo, vinayadharo. Sānaṃ pacatīti sapāko, tantaṃ vāyatīti
anya-e0807n:1215_10: tantavāyo, varaṃ āharatīti varāharo. Nta+māna+ktavantehi vākyameva. Dhammaṃ suṇanto,
anya-e0807n:1216_1: Buddhena bhāsito buddhabhāsito dhammo, evaṃ jinadesito. Satthārā vaṇṇito satthuvaṇṇito.
anya-e0807n:1216_2: Viññūhi garahito viññugarahito, viññuppasattho, issarakataṃ, sayaṃ kataṃ, sukehi
anya-e0807n:1216_3: āhaṭaṃ sukāhaṭaṃ, raññā hato rājahato, rājapīḷito. Agginā daḍḍho aggidaḍḍho, sappena
anya-e0807n:1216_4: daṭṭho sappadaṭṭho, sallehi viddho sallaviddho, icchāya pakato icchāpakato, sīlasampanno.
anya-e0807n:1216_5: Evaṃ sukhasahagataṃ, ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, mittasaṃsaggo, piyavippayogo, jātithaddho,
anya-e0807n:1216_6: guṇahīno, guṇavuddho, catuvaggakaraṇīyaṃ, catuvaggādikattabbaṃ. Kākehi peyyā kākapeyyā,
anya-e0807n:1216_7: nadī. Kvaci vuttiyeva, urasā gacchatīti urago, pādena pivatīti pādapo. Kvaci vākyameva,
anya-e0807n:1216_8: pharasunā chinnavā, kākehi pātabbā, dassanena pahātabbā. Pubbādiyoge-māsena pubbo
anya-e0807n:1216_9: māsapubbo. Evaṃ mātusadiso, mātusamo. Ekūnavīsati, sīlavikalo, asikalaho, vācānipuṇo,
anya-e0807n:1216_10: yāvakālikasammissaṃ, vācāsakhilo. Satthārā sadiso satthusadiso, satthukappo, puññena
anya-e0807n:1216_11: atthiko puññatthiko, guṇādhiko. Dadhinā upasittaṃ bhojanaṃ dadhibhojanaṃ, guḷena
anya-e0807n:1216_12: saṃsaṭṭho odano guḷodano. Kārakasambandho kriyāya kato, upasittādikriyānaṃ apaññāyanepi
anya-e0807n:1216_14: yutto ratho assaratho, maggacittaṃ, jambuyā paññāto lakkhito dīpo jambudīpo, ekena
anya-e0807n:1216_15: adhikā dasa ekādasa, jātiyā andho jaccandho, pakatiyā medhāvī pakatimedhāvī iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1217_1: kathinacīvarassāti attho. Evaṃ cīvaradussaṃ, cīvaramūlaṃ, yāguyā atthāya taṇḍulā
anya-e0807n:1217_2: yāgutaṇḍulā, bhattataṇḍulā, saṅghassa atthāya bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ, āgantukabhattaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1217_3: evaṃ gamikabhattaṃ, pāsādāya dabbaṃ pāsādadabbaṃ. Ettha cā+yaṃ niccasamāso, tassa
anya-e0807n:1217_4: tiliṅgatā ca-bhikkhusaṅghassa attho vihāro bhikkhusaṅghattho vihāro, bhikkhusaṅghatthā
anya-e0807n:1217_5: yāgu, bhikkhusaṅghatthaṃ cīvaraṃ. Yassa attho yadattho, yadatthā, yadatthaṃ. Evaṃ
anya-e0807n:1217_6: tadattho, tadatthā, tadatthaṃ. Tathā lokahito. Buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhadeyyaṃ pupphaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1217_7: Saṅghadeyyaṃ cīvaraṃ. Idha na hoti “saṅghassa dātabbaṃ”.
anya-e0807n:1218_1: evaṃ palāpagato, nagaraniggato, piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto, kāmato nikkhantaṃ kāmanikkhantaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1218_2: rukkhaggā patito rukkhaggapatito, sāsanaccuto, āpatti- vuṭṭhānaṃ, dharaṇītalaggato,
anya-e0807n:1218_3: sabbabhavehi nissaṭo sabbabhavanissaṭo. Bhayatādiyoge-rājato bhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ, corabhayaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1218_4: amanussabhayaṃ, aggibhayaṃ, pāpabhīto, pāpabhīruko. Akattabbato virati akattabbavirati,
anya-e0807n:1218_5: evaṃ kāyaduccaritavirati, vacīduccaritavirati. Bandhanā mutto bandhanamutto, vanamutto,
anya-e0807n:1218_6: bandhanamokkho. Kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ, ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhaṃ, omakomakaṃ. Kvaci vuttiyeva,
anya-e0807n:1218_7: kammato jātaṃ kammajaṃ, evaṃ cittajaṃ, utujaṃ, āhārajaṃ. Idha na hoti ‘pāsādā patito’.
anya-e0807n:1219_0: Chaṭṭhītappuriso rañño putto rājaputto, evaṃ rājapuriso, ācariyapūjako, buddhasāvako,
anya-e0807n:1219_1: buddharūpaṃ, jinavacanaṃ, samuddaghoso, dhaññānaṃ rāsi dhaññarāsi, pupphagandho,
anya-e0807n:1219_2: phalaraso, kāyassa lahutā kāyalahutā. Maraṇassati, rukkhamūlaṃ, ayassa patto ayopatto,
anya-e0807n:1219_3: ettha “manādyāpādīna+mo maye ce”ti o. Evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ, pānīyathālakaṃ, sappikumbho,
anya-e0807n:1219_4: devānaṃ rājā devarājā. Pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ, “puṃ pumassavā”ti pumassa puṃ, niggahītalopo,
anya-e0807n:1219_5: lassa dvibhāvo ca. Hatthipadaṃ, itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhunisaṅgho, jambusākhā, ettha īkārūkārānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1219_7: mamā+nukurumāno, gunnaṃ kaṇhā sampannakhīratamā, sissānaṃ pañcamo, paṭassa suttatā.
anya-e0807n:1219_8: Kvaci hoteva ‘vattamānasāmīpyaṃ’. Brāhmaṇassa sukkā dantāti sāpekkhatāya na hoti.
anya-e0807n:1219_9: Phalānaṃ titto, phalāna+māsito, phalānaṃ suhito. “Brāhmaṇassa uccaṃ gehaṃ”ti sāpekkhatāya
anya-e0807n:1219_10: na hoti. “Rañño pāṭaliputtakassa dhanaṃ”ti dhanasambandhe chaṭṭhīti pāṭaliputtakena
anya-e0807n:1219_11: sambandhābhāvā na hoti. “Rañño go ca asso ca puriso cā”ti bhinnatthatāya vākyameva.
anya-e0807n:1219_12: Rañño gavassapurisā rājagavassapurisāti vutti hoteva, ekatthībhāvā. Sambandhīsaddānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1219_13: pana niccasāpekkhattepi gamakattā samāso, gamakattampi hi samāsassa nibandhanaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1220_0: Sattamītappuriso rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, evaṃ rūpasañcetanā, saṃsāradukkhaṃ. Cakkhumhi
anya-e0807n:1220_1: sannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Dhamme rato dhammarato, dhammābhirati, dhammaruci,
anya-e0807n:1220_2: dhammagāravo, dhammesu nirutti dhammanirutti, dānādhimutti, bhavantarakataṃ. Dassane
anya-e0807n:1220_3: assādo dassanassādo. Araññe vāso araññavāso, vikālabhojanaṃ, kālavassaṃ, vanapupphaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1220_4: vanamahiso, gāmasūkaro, samuddamacchā, āvāṭakacchapo, āvāṭamaṇḍūko, kūpamaṇḍūko,
anya-e0807n:1220_5: titthanāvā. Itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto, akkhadhutto. Chāyāyaṃ sukkho chāyāsukkho,
anya-e0807n:1220_6: aṅgārapakkaṃ, cārakavano. Kvaci vuttiyeva, vane caratīti vanacarako, kucchimhi sayantīti
anya-e0807n:1220_7: kucchisayā, thale tiṭṭhatīti thalaṭṭho, jalaṭṭho, pabbataṭṭho, maggaṭṭho. Paṅke jātaṃ
anya-e0807n:1220_8: paṅkajaṃ, saroruha+miccādi. Idha na hoti, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā,
anya-e0807n:1222: Visesanaṃ syādyantaṃ visessena syādyantena samānādhikaraṇenasahe+katthaṃ hoti.
anya-e0807n:1227: Sutte visessenāti avuttepi visesanassa sambandhīsaddattā sāmatthiyato labbhamānaākaḍḍhitasaddaṃ pati “visessenā”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0807n:1233_0: Ettha ca uppaladabbaṃ rattuppalādito visesayatīti nīlasaddo visesanaṃ. Tena visesiyatīti
anya-e0807n:1233_1: uppalasaddo visessaṃ. Api ca bhamara+ṅgārādisāmañña nīlatthato visesiyatīti nīlaṃ
anya-e0807n:1233_2: visessaṃ. Na vatthādīnaṃ, uppalassevāti visesanato uppalaṃ visesanaṃti kāmacāreneti vuttaṃ. Api ca –
anya-e0807n:1235: Govācāti pavutte tu, vācattho tu visesanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1238: Vuttattā mahanto+ccādīsu samānaliṅgādayo daṭṭhabbā. Bhiyyoti kiṃ, devā pamāṇaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1239: So ca chabbidho visesanapubbapado, visesanuttarapado, visesanobhayapado, upamānuttarapado, sambhāvanāpubbapado, avadhāraṇapubbapadoti.
anya-e0807n:1240: Tattha visesanapubbapade tāva-mahanto ca so puriso cāti vākye iminā suttena samāso. “Ṭa nta+ntūnaṃ”ti ntassa ṭādese dīgho hoti, mahāpuriso, mahāpurisā iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1241_0: Vākye tulyādhikaraṇabhāva pakāsanatthaṃ ca+ta-saddapayogo. Vuttiyantu samāseneva
anya-e0807n:1241_1: tappakāsanato na tappayogo. Eva+maññatrāpi vuttatthāna+mappayogo. Evaṃ mahāvīro,
anya-e0807n:1241_2: mahāmuni. Mahantañca taṃ balañcāti mahābalaṃ, mahabbhayaṃ. Santo ca so puriso cāti
anya-e0807n:1241_3: sappuriso. Tathā pubbapuriso, aparapuriso, paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso,
anya-e0807n:1241_4: parapuriso, setahatthī, kaṇhasappo, nīluppalaṃ, rattuppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ. Kvaci
anya-e0807n:1241_5: na hoti, puṇṇo mantānīputto, citto gahapati. Pumā ca so kokilo cāti puṅkokilo, uttarapade
anya-e0807n:1242: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti khattiyakaññā.
anya-e0807n:1244_0: Bhāsitapumā itthī pumeva hotīti pumbhāvā itthipaccayānaṃ nivatti hoti. Evaṃ rattalatā,
anya-e0807n:1244_1: dutiyabhikkhā. Brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, nāgamāṇavikā. Itthiyanti
anya-e0807n:1244_2: kiṃ, kumāriratanaṃ, samaṇipadumaṃ. Bhāsitapumāti kiṃ, gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu.
anya-e0807n:1244_3: Puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo. Ettha ca kāyekadese kāyasaddo. Evaṃ pacchimakāyo,
anya-e0807n:1244_4: uparimakāyo, heṭṭhimakāyo, sabbakāyo, navāvāso, kataranikāyo, hetupaccayo. Jīvitappadhānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1245_0: Visesanuttarapade therā+cariya+paṇḍitā visesanaṃ parañca bhavati. Yathā sāriputto
anya-e0807n:1245_1: ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero, evaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero, mahākassapatthero, buddhaghosācariyo,
anya-e0807n:1245_2: dhammapālācariyo, ācariyaguttilo vā. Mahosadho ca so paṇḍito cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito,
anya-e0807n:1246_0: Visesanobhayapade yathā-sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti sītuṇhaṃ, siniddho ca so uṇho cāti
anya-e0807n:1246_1: siniddhuṇho māso. Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo, evaṃ andhabadhiro, katākataṃ,
anya-e0807n:1246_2: chiddāvachiddaṃ, uccāvacaṃ, chinnabhinnaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ. Kvaci pubbakālassāpi paranipāto,
anya-e0807n:1246_3: vāsito ca so litto cāti littavāsito, evaṃ naggamūsito, sittasammaṭṭho, bhaṭṭhaluñjito.
anya-e0807n:1247: Upamanuttarapade upamānabhūtaṃ visesanaṃ paraṃ bhavati, yathā sīhoti vutte upacaritā+nupacaritasīhānaṃ sāmaññappatītiyaṃ munisaddo viseseti. Ettha ca –
anya-e0807n:1249_0: Sā ca vatthu+vaṇṇa+ākārānaṃ sāmyena hoti. Sīhova sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho,
anya-e0807n:1249_1: munivasabho, munipuṅgavo, buddhanāgo, buddhādicco. Raṃsī viya raṃsī, saddhammo ca
anya-e0807n:1249_2: so raṃsī cāti saddhammaraṃsī, evaṃ vinayasāgaro. Puṇḍarikamiva puṇḍariko, samaṇo
anya-e0807n:1249_3: ca so puṇḍariko cāti samaṇapuṇḍariko, samaṇapadumo. Cando viya cando, mukhañca taṃ
anya-e0807n:1250_0: Sambhāvanāpubbapade yathā-dhammoti buddhi dhammabuddhi, evaṃ dhammasaññā, dhammasaṅkhāto,
anya-e0807n:1250_1: dhammasammato, pāṇasaññitā, asubhasaññā, aniccasaññā, dhātusaññā, attasaññā, attadiṭṭhi iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1251_0: Avadhāraṇapubbapade yathā-guṇo eva dhanaṃ guṇadhanaṃ, evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1251_1: paññāratanaṃ, cakkhu eva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ, evaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhudhātu,
anya-e0807n:1258_0: Ettha nipātoti eva-itinipāto, appayuttopi evasaddo evaṃ yojetabbo – “citto dhanuddharo
anya-e0807n:1258_1: evā”ti visesanena yutto ayogavivacchedako, dhanunā yoge patiṭṭhāpanato “pāttho eva
anya-e0807n:1258_2: dhanuddharo”ti visessena yutto aññayogavivacchedako, dhanuddharattassa pātthasaṃkhātaajjune
anya-e0807n:1260_0: Ekatthe samāhāre saṃkhyādi napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati. Tayo lokā samāhaṭā=cittena sampiṇḍitā,
anya-e0807n:1260_1: tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti vā vākye visesanasamāse kate iminā napuṃsakattaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1260_2: Samāhārasse+kattā ekavacanameva, tilokaṃ, bho tiloka, tilokaṃ, tilokena iccādi. Evaṃ
anya-e0807n:1260_3: tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṃ, tīṇi malāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṃ malānaṃ samāhāroti vā timalaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1260_4: tilakkhaṇaṃ, catusaccaṃ, pañcasikkhāpadaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, sattāhaṃ, aṭṭhasīlaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1260_5: navalokuttaraṃ, dasasīlaṃ, satayojanaṃ. Dve rattiyo samāhaṭā dvirattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1262_0: Naūccetaṃ syādyantaṃ syādyantena sahe+katthaṃ hoti. Ññakāro “ṭa nañassā”ti visesanattho
anya-e0807n:1262_1: ‘pāmanaputtādīsu nassa ṭo mā hotū’ti. Na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, “ṭa nañassā”ti nassa
anya-e0807n:1267_0: Duvidho ca+ssa nassa attho pasajjapaṭisedha+pariyudāsavasena. Tattha yo “asūrikapassārājadārā”tiādīsu
anya-e0807n:1267_1: viya uttarapadatthassa sabbadā abhāvaṃ dīpeti, so pasajjapaṭisedhavācī nāma. Yo pana
anya-e0807n:1267_3: vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati, so pariyudāsavācī nāma. Vuttañca –
anya-e0807n:1276_0: Tadaññatthe – abrāhmaṇo, brāhmaṇato añño taṃsadisoti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ amanusso,
anya-e0807n:1276_1: assamaṇo, na byākatā abyākatā dhammā. Tabbiruddhatthe-na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti
anya-e0807n:1276_2: attho. Evaṃ alobho, amitto, ayaṃ pariyudāsanayo. Tadabhāve-na katvā akatvā, akātuna
anya-e0807n:1276_3: puññaṃ, akaronto, abhāvo bhavati. Ayaṃ pasajjapaṭisedhanayo.
anya-e0807n:1277_0: Ettha ca ubhosu pariyudāse brāhmaṇā añño brāhmaṇadhamme appatiṭṭhito khattiyādi brāhmaṇasadisova
anya-e0807n:1277_1: abrāhmaṇoti vutte patīyate. Itarasmiṃ pana pakkhe kenaci saṃsayanimittena khattiyādo
anya-e0807n:1277_2: brāhmaṇoti vuttassa micchāñāṇanivutti karīyati “brāhmaṇo+yaṃ na bhavati abrāhmaṇo”ti,
anya-e0807n:1277_3: brāhmaṇattajjhāsito na bhavatītyattho. Tattha sadisattaṃ vinā micchāñāṇāsambhavā
anya-e0807n:1277_4: payogasāmatthiyā ca sadisapaṭipatti, taggatā ca liṅga+saṅkhyā bhavanti. Atoyeva uccate
anya-e0807n:1279_0: Nañasaddassa sare ana, na asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. Evaṃ anissaro, aniṭṭho,
anya-e0807n:1279_1: anāsavo. Na ādāya anādāya, anoloketvā icchādi. Bahulādhikārā ayuttatthehi kehici
anya-e0807n:1279_2: hoti. Puna na gīyantīti apunageyyā gāthā, anokāsaṃ kāretvā, amūlāmūlaṃ gantvā, acandamullokikāni
anya-e0807n:1281_0: Kusaddo pādayo ca syādyantena sahe+katthā honti niccaṃ syādividhivisayato+ññattha.
anya-e0807n:1281_1: Ettha abyabhicāripādisahacaraṇatthena kuiti nipātova, na pathavīvācako kusaddo. Syādividhivisayo
anya-e0807n:1281_2: nāma “lakkhaṇitthambhūtā” dinā patiādīnaṃ visaye katadutiyā, tañca anvaddhamāsanti
anya-e0807n:1281_3: asaṃkhyasamāsa+miva mā hotūti “asyādividhimhī”ti nisedho. Kucchito brāhmaṇo kubrāhmaṇo,
anya-e0807n:1283: Kussu+ttaratthe vattamānassa sarādo uttarapade kadādeso hoti. Īsakaṃ uṇhaṃ kaduṇhaṃ, kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ, kadasanaṃ. Sareti kiṃ, kuputtā, kudārā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0807n:1285: Appatthe vattamānassa kussa kā hotu+ttarapade. Appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ. Evaṃ kāpupphaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1287_0: Kussa kā vā. Kucchito puriso kāpuriso, kupuriso vā. Pakaṭṭho nāyako panāyako, padhānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1287_1: vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ bhusaṃ vaddhaṃ pavaddhaṃ sarīraṃ, samaṃ sammā vā ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1287_2: vividhā mati vimati, vividho visiṭṭho vā kappo vikappo, adhiko devo atidevo, evaṃ
anya-e0807n:1287_3: adhidevo, adhisīlaṃ. Sundaro gandho sugandho, kacchito gandho duggandho, suṭṭhu kataṃ
anya-e0807n:1287_4: sukataṃ, duṭṭhu kataṃ dukkataṃ abhi siñcanaṃ abhisekoti sananto, atisayena katvā,
anya-e0807n:1287_5: kataṃ pakaritvā, pakataṃ, atisayena thutaṃ atitthutaṃ, atikkamma thutaṃ atitthutaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1287_6: īsaṃ kaḷāro ākaḷāro, suṭṭhu baddho ābaddho.
anya-e0807n:1291: Atikkanto mañcaṃ atimañco. Atimālo, “ghapassa+ntassā+ppadhānassā”ti mālāsadde ghassa rasso. Eva+muparipi ghapānaṃ rasso.
anya-e0807n:1293: Avakuṭṭhaṃ kokilāya vanaṃ avakokilaṃ, avamayūraṃ. Avakuṭṭhanti pariccattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1297: Nikkhanto kosambiyā nikkosambi. Asyādividhimhīti kiṃ, rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate.
anya-e0807n:1299_0: Cīpaccayanto kriyatthehi syādyantehi sahe+kattho hoti. Amalīnaṃ malīnaṃ karitvāti
anya-e0807n:1299_1: viggayha “abhūtatabbhāve karā+sa+bhūyoge vikārācī”ti cīpaccayekate iminā samāso.
anya-e0807n:1299_2: Ettha ca-kāro “cī kriyatthehī”ti visesanattho. “Pyo vā tvāssa samāse”ti pya hoti,
anya-e0807n:1301_0: Bhūsanādīsva+tthesva+la+mādayo saddā ekatthā honti. Alaṃ karitvā sakkaritvā asakkaritvāti
anya-e0807n:1301_1: viggayha samāse kate pye ca “sā sādhikarā ca cariccā”ti cādeso pararūpañca. Alaṃkariya,
anya-e0807n:1302_0: 16. Aññecā+ti suttena samāse kate… ettha yathā dvāraṃ vivarāti vutte pakaraṇato aggala+miti
anya-e0807n:1302_1: viññāyati, eva+midhāpi nipātapabhāve aññe cāti sāmaññaṃ ce+ti āgamānusārena labbhamānavibhatyantapaṭirūpanipātāva
anya-e0807n:1302_2: viññāyanti. Aggato bhavitvā purobhuyya, antarahito hutvā tirobhūya, antaradhānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1302_3: katvā tirokariya, urasi katvā urasikariya, manasi katvā manasikariya, majjhe katvā
anya-e0807n:1304: Anekaṃ syādyantaṃ aññassa padassa atthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1307: So ca navavidho dvipado, bhinnādhikaraṇo, tipado, na-nipātapubbapado, sahapubbapado, upamānapubbapado, saṅkhyobhayapado, disantarālattho, byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
anya-e0807n:1308: 1. Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1309: (Ka) tattha dutiyatthe tāva-āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāmanti āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo. So ca duvidho tagguṇā+tagguṇavasena. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1314_0: Tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati, so tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo,
anya-e0807n:1314_1: yathā ‘lambakaṇṇa+mānayā’ti. Yattha pana na gayhati, so atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yathā
anya-e0807n:1315_0: Idha visesanassa pubbanipāto. Ettha ca āgatasaddo ca samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe
anya-e0807n:1315_1: aṭṭhatvā dutiyāvibhatyatthabhūte saṅghārāmasaṅkhāte aññapadatthe vattanti, tato samāseneva
anya-e0807n:1315_2: kammatthassa abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti. Tathā āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṃ
anya-e0807n:1315_3: jetavanaṃ. Paṭipannā addhikā yaṃ paṭipannaddhiko patho, abhirūḷhāva, ṇijāyaṃ nāvaṃ
anya-e0807n:1316_0: (Kha) tatiyatthe-jitāni indriyāni yena so jitindriyo samaṇo, evaṃ diṭṭhadhammo, pattadhammo,
anya-e0807n:1316_1: katakicco. Vijitā mārā anenāti vijitamāro bhagavā, paṭividdhasabbadhammo. Karaṇatthe-chinno
anya-e0807n:1317: (Ga) catutthiyatthe-dinno suṅko yassa so dinnasuṅko rājā, dinnaṃ bhojanaṃ assāti dinnabhojano.
anya-e0807n:1318: (Gha) pañcamiyatthe-niggatā janā yasmā so niggatajano gāmo, niggato ayo=sukhaṃ yasmāti nirayo, nikkile- so. Apetaṃ viññāṇaṃ asmāti apetaviññāṇo matakāyo, apagatabhayabheravo arahā.
anya-e0807n:1319_0: (Ṅa) chaṭṭhiyatthe-chinnā hatthā yassa so chinnahattho. Evaṃ paripuṇṇasaṅkappo khīṇāsavo,
anya-e0807n:1319_1: vīto rāgo assāti vītarāgo. Dve padāni assāti dvipado, dvihattho paṭo. Tevijjoti ettha
anya-e0807n:1319_2: tivijjo evāti sakatthe ṇo vuddhi ca. Catuppado, pañca cakkhūni assāti pañcacakkhu
anya-e0807n:1319_3: bhagavā, chaḷabhiñño, “ghapassā”dinā rassattaṃ. Navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ. Dasabalo,
anya-e0807n:1319_4: anantañāṇo. Tīṇi dasa parimāṇa+mesaṃti tidasā devā, idha parimāṇasaddasannimānato
anya-e0807n:1319_5: dasasaddo saṅkhyāne vattate. Ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā, uttarapade “imassi+daṃ
anya-e0807n:1319_6: vā”ti imassa idaṃ. Ko pabhavo assāti kiṃ pabhavo kāyo. Vigataṃ malaṃ assāti vimalo,
anya-e0807n:1319_7: sundaro gandho assāti sugandhaṃ candanaṃ, evaṃ susīlo, sumukho, kucchito gandho assāti
anya-e0807n:1319_8: duggandhaṃ kuṇapaṃ, dummukho, duṭṭhu mano assāti dummano, evaṃ dussīlo. Tapo eva
anya-e0807n:1319_9: dhanaṃ assāti tapodhano. Khantisaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ assāti khantibalo. Indoti nāmaṃ etassāti indanāmo.
anya-e0807n:1320_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṃ yathicchitattā ubhayaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, kamātikkame
anya-e0807n:1320_1: payojanābhāvā. Jāto chando assāti jātachando, evaṃ chandajāto. Sañjātapītisomanasso,
anya-e0807n:1321_0: Dīghājaṅghā assāti dīghajaṅgho, ettha pumbhāvo, “ghapassā”dinā rasso ca. Tathā pahūtajivho.
anya-e0807n:1321_1: Mahantī paññā assāti mahāpañño. “Itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumi+tthī pume+ve+katthe”ti vīpaccayābhāventassa
anya-e0807n:1321_2: ṭādeso rassattañca. Itthiyanti kiṃ, khamādhano. Bhāsitapumāti kiṃ, saddhādhuro. Paññāpakatiko,
anya-e0807n:1321_3: paññāvisuddhiko, ettha “ltvitthiyūhi ko”ti ko. Gaṇḍīvadhanvāti pakatantarena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1322_0: Nānā=ppakārā dumā nānādumā, nānādumehi patitāni nānādumapatitāni, nānādumapatitāni
anya-e0807n:1322_1: ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānādumapatitapupphāni, tehi vāsitā nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā,
anya-e0807n:1323_0: (Ca) sattamyatthe-sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ so sampannasasso janapado. Sulabho piṇḍo
anya-e0807n:1323_1: imasminti sulabhapiṇḍo deso. Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṃ sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī. Bahavo
anya-e0807n:1323_2: tāpasā etasminti bahutāpaso assamo. Upacitaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ asminti upacitamaṃsalohitaṃ
anya-e0807n:1323_3: sarīraṃ. Bahavo sāmino asminti bahusāmikaṃ nagaraṃ, bahū nadiyo asminti bahunadiko,
anya-e0807n:1323_4: īkārantattā kapaccayo. Evaṃ bahujambukaṃ vanaṃ, bahavo kattāro asmiṃ assa vāti bahukattuko
anya-e0807n:1324_0: 2. Bhinnādhikaraṇo yathā-ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena janena saddhiṃ
anya-e0807n:1324_1: vāso assāti samānavāso puriso. Ubhato byañjana+massāti ubhatobyañjanako, vibhatyalopo
anya-e0807n:1324_2: “vā+ññato”ti ko ca, chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi, evaṃ daṇḍapāṇi, satthapāṇi,
anya-e0807n:1324_3: vajirapāṇi, khaggahattho, pattahattho, dāne ajjhāsayo assāti dānajjhāsayo dānādhimuttiko,
anya-e0807n:1325_0: 3. Tipado yathā-parakkamenā+dhigatā sampadā yehi te parakkamādhigatasampadā mahāpurisā.
anya-e0807n:1325_1: Evaṃ dhammādhigatabhogā. Onīto pattato pāṇi yena so onītapattapāṇi. Sīhassa pubbaddhamiva
anya-e0807n:1325_2: kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo. Mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1326_0: 4. Na-nipātapubbapado yathā-natthi etassa samoti assamo, “ṭa nañassā”ti nassa ṭo.
anya-e0807n:1326_1: Evaṃ appaṭipuggalo, aputtako, ahetuko, kapaccayo, eva+muparipi ñeyyaṃ. Natthi saṃvāso
anya-e0807n:1326_2: etenāti asaṃvāso, na vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado, abhikkhuko vihāro.
anya-e0807n:1326_3: Evaṃ anuttaro “ana sare”ti ana, evaṃ anantaṃ, anāsavo.
anya-e0807n:1327_0: 5. Paṭhamātthe sahapubbapado yathā-saha hetunā vattati so sahetuko sahetu vā, “sahassa
anya-e0807n:1327_1: so+ññatthe”ti sahassa so, evaṃ sappītikā, sappaccayā, sakileso, saupādāno, saparivāro
anya-e0807n:1327_2: sahaparivāro vā, saha mūlena uddhaṭo samūluddhaṭo rukkho.
anya-e0807n:1328_0: 6. Upamānopameyyajotakaivayutto upamānapubbapado paṭhamāya yathā-nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo
anya-e0807n:1328_1: yo so nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo. Saṅkho viya paṇḍaro ayanti saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko viya sūro
anya-e0807n:1328_2: ayanti kākasūro. Cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṃ paramatthadassanatoti cakkhubhūto bhagavā.
anya-e0807n:1328_3: Evaṃ atthabhūto, dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, andhabhūto. Muñjapabbajamiva bhūtā ayaṃ
anya-e0807n:1328_4: muñjapabbajabhūtā kudiṭṭhi. Tantākulamiva jātā ayaṃti tantākulajātā.
anya-e0807n:1329_0: Chaṭṭhyatthe-suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa so suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā, majjhapadalopo.
anya-e0807n:1329_1: Nāgassa gati viya gati assāti nāgagati. Evaṃ sīhagati, nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo,
anya-e0807n:1329_2: sīhahanu. Eṇissa viya jaṅghā assāti eṇijaṅgho. Brahmuno viya saro assāti brahmassaro.
anya-e0807n:1330_0: 7. Vāsaddatthe saṅkhyāubhayapado yathā-dve vā tayo vā dvatti, dvattayo ca te pattā
anya-e0807n:1330_1: ceti dvattipattā, “tisva”iti tisadde pare dvissa attaṃ. Dvīhaṃ vā tīhaṃ vā dvīhatīhaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1330_2: cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā, evaṃ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni.
anya-e0807n:1331: 8. Disantarālattho yathā-pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarālaṃ sā pubbadakkhiṇā vidisā. Ettha –
anya-e0807n:1333: Itthivācakā sabbādayo vuttimatte pumeva honti. Evaṃ pubbuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, pacchimuttarā. Pubbā ca sā dakkhiṇā ceti vā.
anya-e0807n:1334_0: 9. Byatihāralakkhaṇo yathā – “tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṃ”ti suttena
anya-e0807n:1334_1: samāse kate kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ kesākesī, daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi
anya-e0807n:1334_2: ca paharitvā yuddhaṃ pavattaṃ daṇḍādaṇḍīti hoti. Ettha ca “cī vītihāre”ti cīpaccaye
anya-e0807n:1335_0: Sobhaṇo gandho sugandho, so assa atthīti sugandhīhi atthiatthe īpaccayena siddhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1335_1: Yasmā ca bhaddāya kāpilāniyā apadāne “puno pattaṃ gahetvāna, sodhayitvā sugandhinā”ti
anya-e0807n:1335_2: vuttaṃ, tasmā vuttiyaṃ ikārantassa abhāvadīpanatthaṃ “sugandhi duggandhīti payogā
anya-e0807n:1335_3: na dissatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sugandhināti ekavacane rasso.
anya-e0807n:1337: Anekaṃsyādyantaṃ catthe ekatthaṃ vā hoti. Samuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāroti casaddassa attho catubbidho.
anya-e0807n:1338_0: Tattha samuccayā+nvācayesu samāso na hoti, kriyāsāpekkhatāya nāmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ayuttatthattā,
anya-e0807n:1338_1: yathā-cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātañca paccayaṃ sayanāsanaṃ adāsi, dānañca dehi, sīlañcarakkhāhi.
anya-e0807n:1339: Ubhayatthapadhāne catthe katha+mekatthībhāvo sambhave+ti ce, vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1342: Yasmā ekatthībhāvepi satīyasatīyatthe padhānaṃ, tasmā idaṃ vuccate –
anya-e0807n:1346: Samāso tu imaṃ aññe, jānante dvandanāmato.
anya-e0807n:1350: Samāhārotya+yaṃ cattho, so ca hoti napuṃsake.
anya-e0807n:1351_0: Itarītarayogo yathā-sāriputto ca moggallāno ca sāriputtamoggallānā, bho sāriputtamoggallānā
anya-e0807n:1351_1: iccādi. Avayavapadhānattā bahuvacanameva. Samaṇā ca brāhmaṇā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā, evaṃ
anya-e0807n:1353: Vijjāsambandhīnaṃ yonisambandhīnañca catthe ā hotīti ukārassa ā, hotā ca potā ca hotāpotāro. Evaṃ mātāpitaro.
anya-e0807n:1355: Putte uttarapade pitādīna+mā hoti catthe. Pitā ca putto ca pitāputtā, evaṃ mātāputtā.
anya-e0807n:1357: Patimhi pare jāyāya jayaṃ hoti. Jāyā ca pati ca jayampatayo. Jānipatīti pakatantarena siddhaṃ, jāni ca pati ca jānipati. Evaṃ jampati dampatīti.
anya-e0807n:1358: Kvaci appasaraṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā-cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā, nigamā ca janapadā ca nigamajanapadā. Evaṃ surāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbā.
anya-e0807n:1359: Kvaci ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇantānaṃ pubbanipāto, yathā-aggidhumā, gatibuddhibhujapaṭhaharakarasayā, dhātuliṅgāni.
anya-e0807n:1360: Kvaci sarādiakārantaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā-atthadhammā, atthasaddā, saddatthā vā.
anya-e0807n:1361: Aññamaññasāpekkhānameva tirohitāvayavabhedo samudāyapadhāno samāhāro, yathā-chattañca upāhanā ca chattupāhanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1363: Samāhāre sabbattha napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ bhavati, samāhārasse+kattā ekavacanameva.
anya-e0807n:1365: Napuṃsake vattamānassa syādīsu rasso. Bho chattupāhana, chattupāhanaṃ, chattupāhanena iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1366_0: Te ca samāhāritarītarayogā bahulaṃvidhānā niyatavisayāyeva honti, tatrā+yaṃ visayavibhāgo-niruttipiṭakāgato-pāṇi+tūriya+yogga+senaṅgānaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1366_2: ekajjhāyanapāvacanānaṃ, liṅgavisesānaṃ, vividhaviruddhānaṃ, disānaṃ, nadīnañca niccasamāhārekatthaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1367_0: Pāṇaṅgānaṃ-cakkhu ca sotañca cakkhusotaṃ, mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, “syādīsu
anya-e0807n:1367_1: rasso”ti napuṃsake vattamānassa rasso. Hanu ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṃ, kaṇṇā ca nāsā ca
anya-e0807n:1367_2: kaṇṇanāsaṃ, pāṇi ca pādo ca pāṇipādaṃ, chavi ca maṃsañca lohitañca chavimaṃsalohitaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1367_3: nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpaṃ, jarā ca maraṇañca jarāmaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1368_0: Tūriyaṅgānaṃ-alaso ca tālambaro ca alasatālambaraṃ, murajo ca gomukho ca murajagomukhaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1368_1: saṃkho ca paṇavo ca deṇḍimo ca, saṃkhā ca paṇavā ca deṇḍimā cāti vā saṃkhapaṇavadeṇḍimaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1368_2: paṇavādayo dvepi bherivisesā, maddaviko ca pāṇaviko ca maddavikapāṇavikaṃ, gītañca
anya-e0807n:1368_3: vāditañca gītavāditaṃ, sammañca tāḷañca sammatāḷaṃ, sammaṃti kaṃsatālaṃ, tāḷaṃti hatthatāḷaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1369: Yoggaṅgānaṃ-phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1370_0: Senaṅgānaṃ-hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ, rathā ca pattikā ca rathapattikaṃ, asi
anya-e0807n:1370_1: ca satti ca tomarañca piṇḍañca asisattitomarapiṇḍaṃ, asi ca cammañca asicammaṃ, cammanti
anya-e0807n:1370_2: saravāraṇa-phalakaṃ. Dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ, kalāpo=tuṇīraṃ. Paharaṇañca
anya-e0807n:1371: Niccaverīnaṃ-ahi ca nakulo ca, ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṃ. Evaṃ biḷāramūsikaṃ, antassa rassattaṃ. Kākolukaṃ, sappamaṇḍūkaṃ, garuḷasappaṃ, nāgasupaṇṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1372_0: Saṅkhyāparimāṇasaññānaṃ-ekakañca dukañca ekakadukaṃ. Evaṃ, dukatikaṃ, tikacatukkaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1372_1: catukkapañcakaṃ. Dasakañca ekādasakañca dasekādasakaṃ, “titālīsa” iti caka-bhāgalopaniddesena kakārassa lopo.
anya-e0807n:1373_0: Khuddajantukānaṃ-kīṭā ca paṭaṅgā ca kīṭapaṭaṅgaṃ, kīṭā=kapālapiṭṭhikapāṇā. Evaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1373_1: ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ, makkhikā ca kipillikā ca makkhikakipillikaṃ, kīṭā
anya-e0807n:1373_2: ca sariṃsapā ca kīṭasariṃsapaṃ. Tattha kunthā=sukhumakipillikā.
anya-e0807n:1374: Khuddajantu anaṭṭhī vā, atha kho khuddakopi vā;
anya-e0807n:1375: Sataṃ vā pasato yesaṃ, keci ānatulā iti.
anya-e0807n:1376_0: Pacanacaṇḍālānaṃ-orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ, evaṃ sākuntikamāgavikaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1376_1: Sapāko ca caṇḍālo ca sapākacaṇḍālaṃ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṃ, venarathakāraṃ, tattha
anya-e0807n:1377_0: Caraṇasādhāraṇānaṃ-atiso ca bhāradvājo ca atisabhāradvājaṃ, kaṭṭho ca kapālo ca kaṭṭhakapālaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1377_1: sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ, vijjā
anya-e0807n:1377_2: ca caraṇañca vijjācaraṇaṃ, evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, hirottappaṃ, satisampa-jaññaṃ, lobhamohaṃ,
