anya-e0807n:1378: Ekajjhāyanapāvacanānaṃ-dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ, evaṃ ekuttara saṃyuttakaṃ, khandhakavibhaṅgaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1379_0: Liṅgavisesānaṃ-itthī ca pumā ca itthipumaṃ, dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṃ, cīvarañca
anya-e0807n:1379_2: tiṇañca kaṭṭho ca sākhā ca palāsañca tiṇakaṭṭhasākhāpalāsaṃ. “Lābhī hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ”tipi dissati.
anya-e0807n:1380_0: Vividhaviruddhānaṃ-kusalañca akusalañca kusalākusalaṃ, evaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ, hīnapaṇītaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1380_1: kaṇhasukkaṃ, chekapāpakaṃ, sukhadukkhaṃ, adhamuttamaṃ, paṭighānunayaṃ, chāyātapaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1380_2: ālokandhakāraṃ. Rattiñca divā ca rattindivaṃ, “rattindivadāragavacaturassā”ti apaccaye
anya-e0807n:1380_3: kate numaāgamo. Aho ca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, “dīghā+hovassekadesehi ca ratyā”ti apaccaye
anya-e0807n:1381: Disānaṃ-pubbā ca aparā ca pubbāparaṃ, evaṃ puratthimapacchimaṃ, dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, pubbadakkhiṇaṃ, pubbuttaraṃ, aparadakkhiṇaṃ, aparuttaraṃ.
anya-e0807n:1382: Nadīnaṃ-gaṅgā ca yamunā ca gaṅgāyamunaṃ, evaṃ mahīsarabhū.
anya-e0807n:1383_1: ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ usīrabīraṇāni vā. Evaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ muñjapabbajāni vā,
anya-e0807n:1384_0: Rukkhavisesānaṃ-assatthā ca kapiṭṭhā ca assatthakapiṭṭhaṃ assatthakapiṭṭhā vā, evaṃ
anya-e0807n:1384_1: ambapanasaṃ ambapanasā, khadirapalāsaṃ khadirapalāsā, dhavāssakaṇṇaṃ dhavāssakaṇṇā,
anya-e0807n:1385_0: Pasuvisesānaṃ-gajā ca gavajā ca gajagavajaṃ gajagavajā vā, ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṃ
anya-e0807n:1385_1: ajeḷakā, hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā ca hatthīgavassavaḷavaṃ hatthīgavassavaḷavā,
anya-e0807n:1385_2: rassattaṃ. Evaṃ gomahisaṃ gomahisā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ eṇeyyavarāhā, sīhabyagghataracchaṃ
anya-e0807n:1386: Sakuṇavisesānaṃ-haṃsā ca bakā ca haṃsabakaṃ haṃsabakā. Evaṃ kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṃ kāraṇḍavacakkavākā, mayūrakoñcaṃ mayūrakoñcā, sukasālikaṃ sukasālikā, bakabalākaṃ bakabalākā.
anya-e0807n:1387: Dhanānaṃ-hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇāni. Evaṃ jātarūparajataṃ jātarūparajatāni, maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyaṃ maṇisaṅkhamuttaveḷuriyā.
anya-e0807n:1388: Dhaññānaṃ-sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṃ sāliyavā vā. Evaṃ tilamuggamāsaṃ tilamuggamāsāni, nippāvakulatthaṃ nippāvakulatthā.
anya-e0807n:1389: Byañjanānaṃ-sāko ca suvā ca sākasuvaṃ sākasuvā. Evaṃ gabyamāhisaṃ gabyamāhisā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ eṇeya, varāhā. Migamayūraṃ migamayūrā.
anya-e0807n:1390_0: Janapadānaṃ-kāsi ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ kāsikosalā, vajjī ca mallā ca vajjimallaṃ
anya-e0807n:1390_1: vajjimallā, aṅgā ca magadhā ca aṅgamagadhaṃ aṅgamagadhā, evaṃ cetivaṃsaṃ cetivaṃsā,
anya-e0807n:1390_2: macchasūrasenaṃ macchasūrasenā, kurupañcālaṃ kurupañcālā. Nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca
anya-e0807n:1391_0: Etasmiṃ ekatthībhāvakaṇḍe yaṃ vuttaṃ pubbaṃ, tadeva pubbaṃ nipatati, kamātikkame
anya-e0807n:1391_1: payojanassā+bhāvā. Kvaci vipallāsopi hoti, bahulādhikārato, dantānaṃ rājā rājadanto.
anya-e0807n:1391_2: Catthe samāhāre “sabhāparisāyā”ti ñāpakā kvaci napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ na bhavati, ādhipaccañca
anya-e0807n:1391_3: parivāro ca ādhipaccaparivāro. Evaṃ chandapārisuddhi, paṭisandhipavattiyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1395: Pāpādīhi parā yā bhūmi, tassā samāsanto a hoti. Pāpā bhūmi yasminti pāpabhūmaṃ, jātiyā upalakkhitā bhūmi jātibhūmaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1397: Saṃkhyāhi parāya bhūmiyā a hoti. Dve bhūmiyo assa dvibhūmaṃ. Evaṃ tibhūmaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1399: Saṃkhyāhi parāsaṃ nadīgodhāvarīnaṃ samāsanto a hoti. Pañcannaṃ nadīnaṃ samāhāro pañcanadaṃ. Evaṃ sattagodhāvaraṃ.
anya-e0807n:1401_0: Asaṃkhyehi saṃkhyāhi ca parāya aṅguliyā samāsanto a hoti. Niggata+maṅgulīhi niraṅgulaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1401_1: dve aṅguliyo samāhaṭā dvaṅgulaṃ. Anaññāsaṃkhyatthesūti kiṃ, pañca aṅguliyo asmiṃ
anya-e0807n:1403_0: Dīghādīhi parāya rattiyā a hoti. Dīghā ca sā ratti cāti dīgharattaṃ. Aho ca ratti
anya-e0807n:1403_1: ca ahorattaṃ, āpādittā o. Vassāsu ratti vassārattaṃ. Pubbā ca sā ratti cāti pubbarattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1403_2: Evaṃ apararattaṃ, aḍḍharattaṃ, atikkanto rattiṃ atiratto. Dve rattiyo samāhaṭā dvirattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1403_3: Anaññāsaṃkhyatthesu tveva, dīghā ratti asminti dīgharatti, hemanto. Rattiyā samīpaṃ
anya-e0807n:1403_4: uparatti. Bahulaṃvidhānā kvaci hoteva, rattiparimāṇānurūpaṃ yathārattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1405_0: Gosaddā alopavisaye samāsanto a hoti na ce catthādīsu samāso. Rañño go rājagavo.
anya-e0807n:1405_1: Paramo ca so go cāti paramagavo. Pañcannaṃ gunnaṃ samāhāro pañcagavaṃ, “gossā+vaṅa”ti
anya-e0807n:1407: Ete saddā a-antā nipaccante. Ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, imināva numāga mā. Dārā ca gavo ca dāragavaṃ. Catasso assiyo assa caturasso.
anya-e0807n:1409: Anugavaṃti nipaccate āyāmegamyamāne. Gavassa āyāmo anugavaṃ sakaṭaṃ, asaṅkhyasamāso.
anya-e0807n:1411: Akkhismā samāsanto a hoti aññatthe. Visālāni akkhīni yassa so visālakkho.
anya-e0807n:1413: Aṅgulantā aññatthe dārumhi samāsanto a hoti. Dve aṅguliyo avayavā asseti dvaṅgulaṃ dāru, evaṃ pañcaṅgulaṃ. Aṅgulisadisāvayavaṃ dhaññādīnaṃ vikkhepakaṃ dārūti vuccate.
anya-e0807n:1417_0: Uttarapade imassa idaṃ, imāya attho idamaṭṭho, thassa ṭho, idamaṭṭho assa atthīti
anya-e0807n:1417_1: idamaṭṭhī, idamaṭṭhino bhāvo idamaṭṭhitā. Imesaṃ paccayā idappaccayā, niggahītalopo passa ca dvibhāvo.
anya-e0807n:1419: Ntantūnaṃ uttarapade ṭa hoti. Bhavanto patiṭṭhā amhanti bhavaṃpatiṭṭhā mayaṃ, niggahītāgamo, vagganto, yossa ṭā ca. Bhagavā mūlaṃ etesaṃti bhagavaṃmūlakā no dhammā.
anya-e0807n:1421: Iti ntantūnaṃ a hoti. Guṇavanto patiṭṭhā mamāti guṇavantapatiṭṭho+smi.
anya-e0807n:1423: Saṃkhyāsu parassa o, paro satasmā adhikā parosataṃ.
anya-e0807n:1425: Puthassa jane u hoti. Puthagevā+yaṃ janoti puthujjano, jassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1427: Ahe āyatane ca uttarapade chassa so hoti vā. Sāhaṃ chāhaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ chaḷāyatanaṃ. (Sambaraṃ)
anya-e0807n:1429: Ltupaccayantānaṃ pitādīnañca yathākkama+māravaraṅa vā hontu+ttarapade. Satthuno dassanaṃ satthāradassanaṃ, kattāraniddeso. Mātarapitaro. Vātveva, satthudassanaṃ, mātujāyo.
anya-e0807n:1431_0: Paccaye pumabhāve atisayena byattā byattatarā, byattatamā. “Tassaṃ tatra, tāya tato,
anya-e0807n:1431_1: tassaṃ velāyaṃ tadā”“… etthantare rūpāni ācariyasaṃgharakkhita mahāsāmittheramatena
anya-e0807n:1431_2: imināva “kvaci paccayeti suttena siddhāni, teneva tāni imasmiṃ sutte udāhaṭāni. ācariyamoggallānamahātheramatena
anya-e0807n:1431_3: pane+tāni “sabbādayo vuttimatteti suttena siddhāni. toādīnaṃ vibhatyatthe vihitapaccayattā,
anya-e0807n:1431_4: tadanthānañca ṇādivuttittā dvinnampi therānaṃ matā aviruddhā.
anya-e0807n:1435: Kumbhādīsu+ttarapadesu udakassa udādeso vā hoti. Udakumbho, udakakumbho. Udapatto udakapatto. Udabindu udakabindu. Ākatigaṇo+yaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1437: Sotādīsu+ttarapadesu udakassa ussa lopo hoti. Dakasotaṃ, dakarakkhaso.
anya-e0807n:1439: Itthiyaṃ vattamānato akārantato nāmasmā āpaccayo hoti. Dhammadinnā.
anya-e0807n:1441: Nadādīhi itthiyaṃ vīpaccayo hoti. Nadī mahī kumārī taruṇī vāruṇī gotamī.
anya-e0807n:1443: Gāvī go. Ākatigaṇo+yaṃ. Va-kāro “ntantūnaṃ vīmhi to vā”ti visesanattho.
anya-e0807n:1445: Yakkhādito itthiyaṃ inī hoti vī ca. Yakkhinī yakkhī, nāginī nāgī, sīhinī sīhī.
anya-e0807n:1450: Itthiya+mivaṇṇuvaṇṇantehi nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sadāpayatapāṇinī, daṇḍinī, bhikkhunī, khattabandhunī, paracittavidunī. Mātuādito kasmā na hoti, itthipaccayaṃ vināpi itthattābhidhānato.
anya-e0807n:1452: Ttimhā+ññattheyeva itthiyaṃ nī hoti bahulaṃ. Sā+haṃ ahiṃsāratinī, tassā muṭṭhassatiniyā, sā gāvī vacchagiddhinī. Aññattheti kiṃ, dhammarati.
anya-e0807n:1454: Gharaṇipabhutayo nīpaccayantā sādhavo honti. Ghara+massā atthīti īmhi “yuvaṇṇehi nī”ti nī, gharaṇī. Iminā nassa ṇo, īssa attañca.
anya-e0807n:1455: Ācariyā vā yalopo ca iti gaṇasuttena niyāmitattā imināva nīmhi yalopo ca, ācarinī ācariyā.
anya-e0807n:1457: Mātulādito bhariyāya+mānī hoti. Mātulānī, varuṇānī, gahapatānī, ācariyānī.
anya-e0807n:1458: Abhariyāyaṃ khattiyā vā iti gaṇasuttena niyamitattā iminā vā ānī, khattiyānī. Nadādipāṭhā bhariyāyantu ī, khattiyī.
anya-e0807n:1460_0: Ūrusaddato itthiya+mū hoti. Karabho viya ūru yassā sā karabhorū, saṃhito ūru assāti
anya-e0807n:1460_1: saṃhitorū, evaṃ sahitorū, saññatorū, sahorū, saphorū, vāmorū, lakkhaṇorū. Ūti yogavibhāgā brahmabandhū.
anya-e0807n:1464: Vīmhi ntantūnaṃ to vā hoti. Gacchatī gacchantī, sīlavata sīlavantī.
anya-e0807n:1466: Vīmhi bhavato bhotādeso vā hoti. Bhotī bhavantī.
anya-e0807n:1468: Vīmhi puthussa pathavaputhavā honti. Pathavī puthavī, ṭhe pathavī.
anya-e0807n:1474_0: Chaṭṭhīyantā nāmasmā vā ṇapaccayo hoti apacce+bhidheyye. Apaccasaddasambandhittena
anya-e0807n:1474_1: apaccavantato katasarapaccayo samatthyato chaṭṭhyantato hotīti “chaṭṭhīyantā nāmasmā”ti
anya-e0807n:1474_2: sutte avuttampi vuttaṃ. Ṇādīnaṃ taddhitanti pubbācariyasaññā. Ṇakāro vuddhyattho.
anya-e0807n:1476_0: Sarāna+mādibhūtā ye akāri+vaṇṇu+vaṇṇā, tesaṃ ā+e+o vā honti yathākkamaṃ ṇānubandheti
anya-e0807n:1476_1: akārassa ākāro. Ā+e+onaṃ vuddhītipi pubbācariyasaññā. Vasiṭṭhassā+paccaṃ vāsiṭṭho.
anya-e0807n:1476_2: Vīmhi vāsiṭṭhī. Veti vasiṭṭhassā+paccaṃti vākyassa ca vasiṭṭhāpaccaṃti samāsassa
anya-e0807n:1476_3: ca vikappatthaṃ. So ca vāsaddo yāva “sakatthe”ti adhikarīyati.
anya-e0807n:1479: Vuttatthā apaccasaddassa napuṃsakatthepi puttaputtīnaṃ dvinnampi vācako hoti.
anya-e0807n:1483_0: Bhāradvājassa apaccaṃ=putto bhāradvājo, evaṃ vessāmitto, gotamo. Ettha ca a+yuvaṇṇantābhāvā
anya-e0807n:1483_1: ā+e+onaṃ na vuddhi. Vāsudevassa apaccaṃ vāsudevo, baladevo. Cittakotiādīsu pana saṃyogantattā
anya-e0807n:1483_2: “saṃyoge kvacī”ti kvaci na vuddhi. Upaguno apaccaṃ opagavo opagavī. Ettha “uvaṇṇassā+vaṅa
anya-e0807n:1484: Vacchassā+paccanti viggayha pubbasuttena ṇapaccaye kate puna vacchassā+paccaṃti viggaho.
anya-e0807n:1486_0: Vacchādīhi apaccapaccayantehi gottādīhi ca saddehi ṇāna+ṇāyanapaccayā vā honti apacce.
anya-e0807n:1486_1: Vacchāno, vacchāyano, “saṃyoge kvacī”ti na vuddhi. Katissā+paccaṃ kacco, “ṇya diccādīhī”ti
anya-e0807n:1486_3: kaccāyano, yāgame kātiyāno. Muggassā+paccaṃ=nattādīti vākye vuddhi+ikāralopa+pubbarūpāni.
anya-e0807n:1486_4: Moggallassā+paccaṃti punaṇāna+ṇāyanā honti, moggallāno moggallāyano. Ime cattāro
anya-e0807n:1486_5: apaccapaccayantā. Gottādito yathāsakaṭassā+paccaṃ nattādīhi sakaṭāno sakaṭāyano.
anya-e0807n:1486_6: Kaṇhassā+paccaṃ nattādi kaṇhāno kaṇhāyano. Evaṃ aggivessāno aggivessāyano, muñjāno
anya-e0807n:1486_7: muñjāyano, kuñjāno kuñjāyano. Sabbattha saṃyogattā na vuddhi. Ākatigaṇo+yaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1488_0: Kattikādīhi vidhavādīhi ca ṇeyyaṇerappaccayā honti vā yathākkamaṃ. Kattikāya apaccaṃ
anya-e0807n:1488_1: kattikeyyo, garuḷo vinatāya=supaṇṇamātuyā apaccaṃ venateyyo. Rohiṇiyā apaccaṃ rohiṇeyyo,
anya-e0807n:1488_2: gaṅgāya apaccaṃ gaṅgeyyo. Evaṃ bhāgineyyo, nādeyyo, anteyyo, āheyyo, kāpeyyo, suciyā
anya-e0807n:1488_3: apaccaṃ soceyyo, bāleyyo. Ṇere-vidhavāya apaccaṃ vedhavero. Bandhakiyā=abhisārikāya
anya-e0807n:1488_4: apaccaṃ bandha-kero. Samaṇassa upajjhāyassā+paccaṃ sāmaṇero, nāḷikero iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1494: Avaṇṇi+vaṇṇānaṃ lopo hoti yakārādo paccaye. Ditiyā=asuramātuyā apaccaṃ decco ādicco. Kuṇḍaniyā apaccaṃ koṇḍañño, nassa ññe pubbarūpaṃ. Aditīti devamātā.
anya-e0807n:1495: Bhātuno apaccaṃ bhātabyo, “yamhi gossa cā”ti yamhi ussa avaṅa akāralopapubbarūpāni.
anya-e0807n:1497_0: Akārantato ṇi vā hota+pacce bahulaṃ. Ā=ti nāmavisesanattā a-kārantatoti vuttaṃ. Dakkhassā+paccaṃ
anya-e0807n:1497_1: dakkhi, datti, doṇi, vāsavi, vāruṇi. Jinadattassā+paccaṃ jenadatti, suddhodani, ānuruddhi iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1499: Rājato ñño vā hota+pacce khatthiyajātiyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ. Rañño apaccaṃ rājañño. Jātīyanti kiṃ, rājāpaccaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1501: Tijātiyaṃ apacce ya+iyā honti. Khattassā+paccaṃ khatyo khattiyo. Jātiyaṃ tveva, khatti.
anya-e0807n:1503: Manuto jātisamudāye ssa+saṇa hontu+pacce. Manuno apaccaṃ manusso mānuso, manussī mānusī. Jātiyaṃ tveva, mānavo, nassa ṇo, māṇavo.
anya-e0807n:1505_0: Janapadassa yaṃ nāmaṃ, taṃ nāmasmā khattiyā apacce raññe ca ṇo hoti. Pañcālānaṃ apaccaṃ
anya-e0807n:1505_1: rājā vā pañcālo, kosalo, māgadho, okkāko. Janapadanāmasmāti kiṃ, dāsarathi. Khattiyāti
anya-e0807n:1507: Kurusivīhi apacce raññe ca ṇyo hoti. Kurūnaṃ apaccaṃ rājā vā korabyo. “Yamhi gossa cā”timinā avaṅa, bakārapubbarūpāni. Sebbo, ilopo. (Apaccataddhitaṃ).
anya-e0807n:1509_0: Rāgavācītatiyantato ratta+micce+tasmiṃ atte ṇo hoti. Kusumbhādīhi vaṇṇantarapattaṃ
anya-e0807n:1509_1: rattaṃ nāma. Kasāvena rattaṃ kāsāvaṃ. Evaṃ kusumbhena rattaṃ kosumbhaṃ, hāliddaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1509_2: pattaṅgaṃ, mañjeṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ. Idha na hoti nīlaṃ pītanti, guṇavacanattā ṇena vināpi
anya-e0807n:1511_0: Tatiyantato nakkhattā tena lakkhite kāle ṇo hoti, taṃ ce nakkhatta+minduyuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0807n:1511_1: Phussena induyuttena lakkhitā puṇṇamāsī phussī ratti, phusso aho, maghāya induyuttāya
anya-e0807n:1513_0: Seti paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhiyatthe ṇo hoti, yaṃ paṭhamantaṃ, sā ce devatā puṇṇamāsī
anya-e0807n:1513_1: vā. Sugato devatā assa sogato, māhindo, yāmo, vāruṇo. Buddho assa devatāti buddho.
anya-e0807n:1513_2: Phussī puṇṇamāsī assa sambandhinīti phusso māso. Evaṃ māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho,
anya-e0807n:1513_3: jeṭṭhamūlo, āsāḷho, sāvaṇo, poṭṭhapādo, assayujo, kattiko, māgasiro. Puṇṇamāsī ca
anya-e0807n:1513_4: bhatakamāsasambandhinī na hoti, puṇṇo mā assanti nibbacanā, ato eva nipātanā ṇo, sāgamo ca.
anya-e0807n:1515_0: Dutiyantato ta+madhīte taṃ jānātīti etesva+tthesu ṇo hoti ko ṇiko ca. Ettha casaddo
anya-e0807n:1515_1: ko caṇiko ca hotīti samuccino, no ṇapaccayaṃ. Byākaraṇa+madhīte jānātīti vā veyyākaraṇo,
anya-e0807n:1515_2: vi+ā+karaṇanti vicchijja katayādesassi+kārassa “tadādesā tadīva bhavantī”ti ñāyā
anya-e0807n:1515_3: “sarāna”miccādinā ekāre yāgamadvittāni. Evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, vatthuvijjo,
anya-e0807n:1515_4: chandaso, “manā, dīnaṃ saka” iti sakāgamo. Kamako, padako, venayiko, suttantiko,
anya-e0807n:1515_5: ābhidhammiko. Dvitaggahaṇaṃ ajjhenajānane ca visuṃ visuṃ paccayavidhānatthaṃ, ajjhenavisayadassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1517: Chaṭṭhiyantā visaye desasarūpe ṇo hoti. Vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto. Deseti kiṃ, cakkhussa visayo rūpaṃ, devadattassa visayo+nuvāko.
anya-e0807n:1519: Ti tannāme nivāse dese ṇo hoti. Sivīnaṃ nivāso deso sebbo. Ettha “yavā sare”ti yakāre bakārapubbarūpāni. Vāsāto.
anya-e0807n:1523: Tatiyantā nibbattatthe ṇo hoti. Kusambena nibbattā kosambī nagaraṃ, evaṃ kākandī, mākandī, sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā, hetumhi kattari karaṇe ca yathāyogaṃ tatiyā.
anya-e0807n:1525: Tanti paṭhamantā idhāti sattamyatthe dese tannāme ṇo hoti, yaṃ taṃ paṭhamanta+matthi ce. Udumbarā asmiṃ dese santīti odumbaro, bādaro, pabbajo.
anya-e0807n:1527_0: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇo. Udake bhavo odako, oraso, jānapado, māgadho, kāpilavatthavo,
anya-e0807n:1527_1: kosambo, manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ sukhaṃ, sakāgamo. Sāraso sakuṇo, sārasī sakuṇī, sārasaṃ
anya-e0807n:1527_2: pupphaṃ. Mitte bhavā mettā mettī vā. Pure bhavā porī vācā. Pāvuse bhavo pāvuso megho.
anya-e0807n:1527_3: Pāvusā ratti, pāvusaṃ abbhaṃ. Sārado, sāradā, sāradaṃ pupphaṃ. Mādhuro jano, mādhurā
anya-e0807n:1529: Bhavatthe tano. Ajja bhavo ajjatano, svātano, hiyyatano. “Eona+ma vaṇṇe”ti eonaṃ a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1531: Bhavatthe ṇo tano ca. Ettha ṇakāro avayavo, nevā+nubandho. Purāṇo, purātano.
anya-e0807n:1533: Bhavatthe acco hoti. Amā=saha bhavo amacco.
anya-e0807n:1535: Bhavatthe imo, majjhe bhavo majjhimo. Evaṃ antimo, heṭṭhimo, uparimo, orimo, pārimo, pacchimo, abbhantaridho, paccantimo.
anya-e0807n:1537_0: Bhavatthe kaṇaādayo honti. Kaṇa-kusinārāyaṃ bhavo kosinārako, māgadhako, āraññako
anya-e0807n:1537_1: vihāro, rājagahako, kosambako, indapattako, kāpilako, bhārukacchako, nāgarako. Aṅgesu
anya-e0807n:1537_2: jāto aṅgako, kosalako, vedehako, kambojako, gandhārako, sovīrako, sindhavako, assako
anya-e0807n:1537_3: iccādi. Ṇeyya-gaṅgeyyo, pabbateyyo, vāneyyo. Ṇeyyaka-kosaleyyako, bārāṇaseyyako,
anya-e0807n:1537_4: campeyyako, silāya jātaṃ seleyyakaṃ, mithileyyako. Bārāṇaseyyakotyādīsu “dissanta+ññepi
anya-e0807n:1537_5: paccayā”ti eyyako, evaṃ upari sutte dassitapaccayato visuṃ paccaye dassite iminā
anya-e0807n:1537_6: suttenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ya-gammo, yamhi akāralope pubbarūpaṃ rasso ca. Dibbo. Iya-udariyo,
anya-e0807n:1539: Sattamyantā bhavatthe ṇiko hoti. Sarade bhavo sāradiko divaso, sāradikā ratti.
anya-e0807n:1540: 27. Ta+massa sippaṃ sīlaṃ paṇyaṃ paharaṇaṃ payojanaṃ
anya-e0807n:1541_0: Paṭhamantā sippādivācakā asseti chaṭṭhyatthe ṇiko hoti. Vīṇāvādanaṃ sippa+massa veṇiko,
anya-e0807n:1541_1: vīṇāvādanaṃ abhedopacārena vīṇā nāma. Modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko. Paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ sīla+massa
anya-e0807n:1541_2: paṃsukūliko, tecīvariko. Gandho paṇya+massa gandhiko, teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko,
anya-e0807n:1541_3: tambuliko, loṇiko. Cāpopaharaṇa+massa cāpiko, tomariko, muggariko, mosaliko. Upadhi=kkhandhādi
anya-e0807n:1543_0: Dutiyantā hantīti evamādīsva+tthesu ṇiko hoti. Pakkhino hantīti pakkhiko, sākuṇiko,
anya-e0807n:1543_1: māyūriko, macche hantīti macchiko, meniko. Mige hantīti māgaviko, vakārāgamo. Migassa
anya-e0807n:1543_2: “tadaminā”dinā magavādesepi māgaviko. Orabbhiko, hāriṇiko. Sūkarikoti iko. Sata+marahatīti
anya-e0807n:1543_3: sātikaṃ, sandiṭṭhikaṃ, ehi passa vidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko. Ettha tyādyantasamudāyato
anya-e0807n:1543_4: anukaraṇattā vā taddhitassa abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā bahulaṃvidhānena vā paccayo.
anya-e0807n:1543_5: Sāhassiko, kumbhiko, doṇiko, addhamāsiko, kahāpaṇiko, āsītikā gāthā, nāvutikā. Sahassiyoti
anya-e0807n:1543_6: iyo. Paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, maggiko, paññāsayojaniko, pathiko. Badare uñchatīti
anya-e0807n:1543_7: bādariko, sāmākiko. Dhammaṃ caratīti dhammiko, adhammiko.
anya-e0807n:1544: 29. Tena kataṃ kītaṃ baddha+mabhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ hataṃ hanti jitaṃ jayati dibbati khanati tarati carati vahati jīvatiti
anya-e0807n:1545_0: Katādīsva+tthesu ṇiko. Kāyena kataṃ kāyikaṃ, vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃti sakāgamo. Vātena
anya-e0807n:1545_1: kato ābādho vātito, semhiko, pittiko. Satena kītaṃ sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ, vatthena
anya-e0807n:1545_2: kītaṃ vatthikaṃ, kumbhikaṃ, sovaṇṇikaṃ, ghātikaṃ. Mūlatova paccayo, amūlavācittā
anya-e0807n:1545_3: devadattena kītoti na hoti, tadatthāppatītiyā. Varatthāya baddho vārattiko, āyasiko,
anya-e0807n:1545_4: pāsiko, suttiko. Ghatena abhisaṅkhataṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā ghātikaṃ, goḷikaṃ, dadhikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1545_5: mārīcikaṃ. Jālena hato hantīti vā jāliko, bālisiko. Akkhehi jitaṃ akkhikaṃ dhanaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1545_6: sālākikaṃ, tindukiko, ambaphaliko. Akkhehi jayati dibbati vā akkhiko. Khaṇittiyā
anya-e0807n:1545_7: khanatīti khāṇittiko, kuddāliko. Devadattena jitaṃ, aṅgulyā khanatīti na hoti, tadatthānavagamā.
anya-e0807n:1545_8: Uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, uḷumpikoti iko. Kulliko, gopucchiko, nāviko. Sakaṭena
anya-e0807n:1545_9: caratīti sākaṭiko, rathiko. Parappikoti iko. Khandhena vahatīti khandhiko. Aṃsiko,
anya-e0807n:1545_10: sīsikoti iko. Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko, bhatiko, kayiko, vikkayiko, kayavikkayikoti iko.
anya-e0807n:1547_0: Catutthyantā saṃvattatīti asmiṃ attheṇiko hoti. Punabbhavāya saṃvattatīti ponobbhaviko,
anya-e0807n:1547_1: itthiyaṃ ponobbhavikā. Lokāya saṃvattatīti lokiko. Suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, saggāya saṃvattatīti
anya-e0807n:1547_2: sovaggiko, sasso+vaka tadaminādīpāṭhā. Dhanāya saṃvattatīti dhaññaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1549_0: Pañcamyantā sambhūta+māgatanti etesva+tthesu ṇiko hoti. Mātito sambhūta+māgataṃvā+ti
anya-e0807n:1549_1: ettha “mātito ca bhaginiyaṃccho”ti “mātito”ti bhāgena ussa imhi vākyaṃ, rassadvittesu
anya-e0807n:1549_2: mattikaṃ, pettikaṃ. Ṇya+riyaṇa+ryapaccayāpi dissanti. Surabhito sambhūtaṃ sorabhyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1549_3: Yamhi thaññaṃ. Ubhayattha “lopo+vaṇṇi+vaṇṇānaṃ”ti lopo. Riyaṇa-pituto sambhūto pettiyo,
anya-e0807n:1549_4: mātiyo, “rānubandhe+ntasarādissā”ti ulopo, mattiyo. Ryamhi-ulopo, cavaggapubbarūpāni, macco vā.
anya-e0807n:1551_0: Sattamyantā vasatītvevamādīsva+tthesu ṇiko hoti. Rukkhamūle vasatīti rukkhamūliko,
anya-e0807n:1551_1: āraññiko, rājagahiko, māgadhiko, sosāniko. Loke vidito lokiko. Catumahārājesu bhattā
anya-e0807n:1551_2: cātummahārājikā. Dvāre niyutto dovāriko, dassoka tadaminādipāṭhā. Bhaṇḍāgāriko. Ike-navakammiko,
anya-e0807n:1553_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā ida+micca+smiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti. Saṅghassa idaṃ saṅghikaṃ, puggalikaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1553_1: sakyaputtiko, nāṭaputtiko, jenadattiko. Kiye-sassa idaṃ sakiyo, parakiyo. Niyeattaniyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1555: Chaṭṭhiyantā ida+micca+smiṃ atthe ṇo hoti. Kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ, byākaraṇaṃ, sogataṃ sāsanaṃ, māhisaṃ maṃsādi.
anya-e0807n:1557: Gavādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi ida+micca+smiṃ atthe yo hoti. Gunnaṃ idaṃ gabyaṃ, avaṅa, maṃsādi. Ilope kabbaṃ. Duno idaṃ dabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1559: “Pitito mātito”ti tena tena suttanipāteneva ussa i. Pitusaddā tassa bhātari reyyaṇa. Pitu bhātā petteyyo.
anya-e0807n:1561: Mātuto ca pituto ca tesaṃ bhaginiyaṃ ccho hoti. Mātu bhagini mātucchā, pitu bhagini pitucchā. Kathaṃ “mātu bhātā mātulo”ti, “mātulāditvānī”ti nipātanā lapaccayo.
anya-e0807n:1563_0: Mātāpitūhi tesaṃ mātāpitūsvā+maho hoti. Mātu mātā mātāmahī, mātu pitā mātāmaho. Pitu
anya-e0807n:1563_1: mātā pitāmahī, pitu pitā pitāmaho. Na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ paccekābhisambandhato visuṃ visuṃ
anya-e0807n:1563_2: mātāpitusaddehi tesaṃ mātāpitunnaṃ atthe paccayo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1565: Mātāpitūhi hite reyyaṇa hoti. Mātu hito matteyyo, petteyyo.
anya-e0807n:1566: 40. Nindā+ññāta+ppa paṭibhāga rassa dayā saññāsu ko
anya-e0807n:1567_0: Nindādīsva+tthesu nāmasmā ko hoti. Nindāyaṃ-nindito muṇḍo muṇḍako, evaṃ samaṇako,
anya-e0807n:1567_1: paṇḍitako, brāhmaṇako, veyyākaraṇako. Aññāte-kassā+yaṃ asso assako, payogasāmatthiyā
anya-e0807n:1567_2: sambandhivisesānāvagamo+vagamyate. Appatthe-appakaṃ telaṃ telakaṃ, ghatakaṃ. Paṭibhāgatthe-hatthī
anya-e0807n:1567_3: viya hatthiko, assako, balībaddhako. “Ime no hatthikā assā, balībaddhā ca no ime”tyādipāṭhe
anya-e0807n:1567_4: “lopo”ti kapaccayalopena vā abhedopacārena vā daṭṭhabbaṃ, ime ca dāruādīhi katarūpāni.
anya-e0807n:1567_5: Rasserasso mānuso mānusako, rukkhako, pilakkhako. Dayāyaṃ-dayito=nukampito putto
anya-e0807n:1567_6: puttako, vacchako. Saññāyaṃ-moro viya morako, katako, bhatako.
anya-e0807n:1569_0: Paṭhamantā asseti asmiṃ atthe ṇiko hoti ko ca, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1569_1: Doṇādīnaṃ parimitavīhādīnaṃ karaṇattā “parimīyantya+nenāti parimāṇa”nti hoti. Doṇo
anya-e0807n:1569_2: parimāṇa+massāti doṇiko vīhi, khārasatiko, khārasahassiko, āsītiko vayo, upaḍḍhakāyo
anya-e0807n:1571_0: Yādīhi paṭhamantehi asseti chaṭṭhyatthe ttako hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1571_1: Yaṃ parimāṇa+massa yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, “etasseṭa ttake”ti etassa eṭa, ettakaṃ. Āvatake-yaṃ
anya-e0807n:1573: Sabbato paṭhamantā yādīhi ca asseti chaṭṭhyatthe āvantu hoti, tañce paṭhamantaṃ parimāṇaṃ bhavati. Sabbaṃ parimāṇa+massa sabbāvantaṃ, “aṃṅaṃ napuṃsake”ti aṃ. Yāvantaṃ, tāvantaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1575_0: Kimhā paṭhamantā asseti chaṭṭhyatthe rati+rīva+rīvataka+rittakā honti. Kiṃsaṅkhyānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1575_1: parimāṇa+mesaṃ kati, rānubandhattā iṃbhāgalopo. Kīva, kīvatakaṃ, kittakaṃ. Rīvanto sabhāvato asaṃkhyo.
anya-e0807n:1577: Sañjātatthe ito. Tārakā sañjātā assa tārakitaṃ gaganaṃ, pupphāni sañjātāni assa pupphito rukkho, pallavitā latā.
anya-e0807n:1579_0: Paṭhamantā mānavuttito asseti asmiṃ atthe matto hoti. Palaṃ ummāna+massa palamattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1579_1: Hattho paṇāma+massa hatthamattaṃ. Sataṃ māna+massa satamattaṃ. Doṇo parimāṇa+massa
anya-e0807n:1579_2: doṇamattaṃ. Abhedopacārā doṇotipi hoti. Mīyate+nenāti mānaṃ, mānassa sambandhittā
anya-e0807n:1581: Pamāṇaṃ hoti āyāmo, saṃkhyāseso tu sabbato.
anya-e0807n:1583: Uddhamānavuttito taggho hoti matto ca. Jaṇṇu parimāṇa+massa jaṇṇutagghaṃ, jaṇṇumattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1585: Purisā ṇo hoti mattādayo ca. Puriso parimāṇa+massa porisaṃ, purisamattaṃ+purisatagghaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1587_0: Ubhadvitīhi avayavavuttīhi ayo hoti. Ubho aṃsā assa ubhayaṃ, dvayaṃ, tayaṃ. Aṃsasambandhena
anya-e0807n:1587_1: samudāye vidhi hotīti na ubhayādito bahuvacananti ce, “rāhuno siro” tyādo abhedepi
anya-e0807n:1589_0: Satyantāya utyantāya īsantāya āsantāya dasantāya saṅkhyāya paṭhamantāya asminti sattamyatthe
anya-e0807n:1589_1: ḍo hoti, sā ce saṅkhyā adhikā hoti, ya+dasminti, taṃ ce sataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ
anya-e0807n:1589_2: vā hoti. Vīsati adhikā asmiṃ sateti vīsaṃsataṃ.
anya-e0807n:1591_0: Ḍe pare satyantassa tikārassa lopo hoti. Ekavīsaṃsataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā.
anya-e0807n:1591_1: Tiṃsati adhikā asmiṃ satādiketi tiṃsasataṃ ekatiṃsasataṃ iccādi. Utyantāyanavuti
anya-e0807n:1591_2: adhikā asmiṃ satādiketi navutaṃsataṃ sahassaṃ satasahassaṃ vā. Īsantāya-cattālīsaṃ
anya-e0807n:1591_3: adhikā asmiṃ sate sahasse satasahasseti cattālīsasata+miccādi. Āsantāya evaṃ, paññāsaṃsata+miccādi.
anya-e0807n:1593_0: Chaṭṭhiyantāye+kādasādikāya saṃkhyāya ḍo hoti pūraṇatthe vibhāsā. Sā saṃkhyā pūriyate
anya-e0807n:1593_1: yena taṃ pūraṇaṃ. Ekādasannaṃ pūraṇo ekādaso. Aññatra “ma pañcādikatīhī”ti mo, ekādasamo.
anya-e0807n:1593_2: Vīsatiyā pūraṇo vīso vīsatimo, tiṃso, tiṃsatimo. Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā
anya-e0807n:1595: Mapaccaye pañcamo, pañcamī. Sattamo, sattamī. Aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī. Katimo, katimī iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1597: Satādīnaṃ mo ca antādeso i ca. Satassa pūraṇo satimo, sahassimo.
anya-e0807n:1599_0: Chasaddā pūraṇatthe ṭṭha+ṭṭhamā. Channaṃ pūraṇo chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhamo. Itthiyaṃ chaṭṭhī,
anya-e0807n:1599_1: chaṭṭhamī. “Catutthadutiyesve+saṃ tatiyapaṭhamā”ti nipātanā pūraṇatthe dvito tiyo
anya-e0807n:1599_2: dvissa du ca, ticatūhi tissa a, tiya+tthā ca yathākkamaṃ, dutiyo tatiyo, catuttho.
anya-e0807n:1601: “Sati byabhicāre visesanaṃ sātthakaṃ”ti ñāyā saṃkhyāto visesetuṃ “asahāye”ti vuttaṃ. Ekasmā asahāyatthe ka+ākī honti vā. Ekova ekako, ekākī, eko vā.
anya-e0807n:1603_0: Vacchādīnaṃ sabhāvassa tanutte=kiñcimattāvasese taro hoti. So=sako bhāvo sabhāvo
anya-e0807n:1603_1: attaniyapavattinimittaṃ. Susuttassa tanutte vacchataro, itthiyaṃ vacchatarī. Yobbanassa
anya-e0807n:1603_2: tanutte okkhataro. Okkhā=dutiyavayaṭṭhagoṇo. Assabhāvassa tanutte assataro. Gāvoti
anya-e0807n:1603_3: jātisāmatthiyassa tanutte usabhataro. Ettha tanuttaṃ appabalatā.
anya-e0807n:1605_0: Kiṃsaddā niddhāraṇe ratara+ratamā honti. Ko evāti kataro bhavataṃ devadatto, kataro
anya-e0807n:1605_1: bhavataṃ kaṭṭho. Katamo bhavataṃ devadatto, katamo bhavataṃ kaṭṭho. Bhāradvājānaṃ katamo+si brahme.
anya-e0807n:1607_0: Datte+bhidheyye la+iyā honti bahulādhikārā manussasaññāyaṃ. Devena datto devalo deviyo,
anya-e0807n:1607_1: brahmalo brahmiyo. Sīvalo sīviyo sissa dīgho. Deva+brahma+sivāti tannāmakā manussā.
anya-e0807n:1609: Chaṭṭhiyantā bhāve kamme ca ttādayo honti bahulaṃ. Na sabbe paccayā sabbato honti aññatratta+tāhi. Bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddāti bhāvo saddapavattinimittaṃ. Vuttañca –
anya-e0807n:1611: Nimittabhūtaṃ nāmañca, jāti dabbaṃ kriyā guṇoti.
anya-e0807n:1612_0: Nīlassa paṭassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti guṇo bhāvo. Ettha nīlaguṇavasena paṭe nīlasaddassa
anya-e0807n:1612_1: vuttiyā paṭabuddhiyā nimittaṃ bhāvo nāma. Nīlassa guṇassa bhāvo nīlattaṃ nīlatāti
anya-e0807n:1612_2: nīlaguṇajāti, ettha nīlaguṇajāti nimittaṃ hutvā nīlasaddassa guṇavuttiyā nīlaguṇajāti
anya-e0807n:1612_3: nimittaṃ. Gottaṃ gotāti gojāti, ettha jātisaddānaṃ dabbavuttiyā sati jāti nimittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1612_4: Pācakassa bhāvo pācakattaṃti kriyāsambandhittaṃ bhāvo, ettha pacanakriyāsambandhittaṃ
anya-e0807n:1612_5: bhāvo. Daṇḍittaṃ visāṇittaṃ rājapurisattaṃti daṇḍa+visāṇa+rājadabbānaṃ sambandhittaṃ
anya-e0807n:1613_0: Devadattassa bhāvo devadattattaṃ, candattaṃ, sūriyattaṃti tadavatthā visesasāmaññaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1613_1: devadattassa bālatādiavatthābhedo, candassa kalādiavatthabhedo ca, sūriyassa mandapaṭutādiavatthābhedo
anya-e0807n:1613_2: ca sāmaññaṃ, tadettha nimittaṃ. Ettha vijjamānapadatthānaṃ visayabhūtasaññāsaddānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1613_3: pavattinimittaṃ vuttaṃ. Ākāsattaṃ abhāvattaṃti, tattha ghaṭākāsa+pīṭharākāsa, paṭābhāva+ghaṭābhāvādinā
anya-e0807n:1614: Ttana-puthujjanattanaṃ. Vedanāya bhāvo vedanattanaṃ, rasso. Evaṃ jāyattanaṃ, jārattanaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1615_0: Ṇya-alasassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā ālasyaṃ, ettha “lopo+vaṇṇi+vaṇṇānaṃ”ti a-lope “sarāna+mādissā”dinā
anya-e0807n:1615_1: ākāro, eva+mupari ca. Brāhmaṇassa bhāvo brahmaññaṃ, ññakārapubbarūpāni. Cāpalyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1615_2: nepuññaṃ, pesuññaṃ, rañño bhāvo rajjaṃ, ādhipaccaṃ, dāyajjaṃ, vesammaṃ, vesamaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1615_3: ṇapaccayo. Sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, vāṇijjaṃ, ārogyaṃ, odagyaṃ, ānaṇyaṃ, dubbalyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1615_4: balyaṃ, paṇḍiccaṃ, bāhussaccaṃ, porohiccaṃ. Muṭṭhassatissa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccaṃ, ilopo.
anya-e0807n:1615_5: Kosallaṃ, vepullaṃ. Samānassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, perissaṃ, somanassaṃ, domanassaṃ, sovacassaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1615_6: dovacassaṃ, nipakassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ, ādhikkaṃ, dubhagassa bhāvo dobhaggaṃ, sarūpassa
anya-e0807n:1615_7: bhāvo sāruppaṃ, opammaṃ, sokhummaṃ, tathassa bhāvo tacchaṃ. Dummedhassa bhāvo dummejjhaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1615_8: Bhesajassa bhāvo bhesajjaṃ, byāvaṭassa kammaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ yathā veyyākaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1616: Ṇeyya-sucino bhāvo soceyyaṃ, ādhipateyyaṃ, kapissa bhāvo kāpeyyaṃ. Saṭhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā sāṭheyyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1617: Ṇa-garūnaṃ bhāvo gāravaṃ, u avaṅa. Pāṭavaṃ, ajjavaṃ, maddavaṃ, “kosajjā”dinā ussa attaṃ dvittañca. Paramānaṃ bhāvo pāramī, vīpaccayo. Samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.
anya-e0807n:1618: Iya-adhipatino bhāvo adhipatiyaṃ, paṇḍitiyaṃ, bahussutiyaṃ, naggiyaṃ, sūriyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1619: Ṇiya-alasassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā ālasiyaṃ, tālusiyaṃ, mandiyaṃ, dakkhiyaṃ, porohitiyaṃ, veyyattiyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1620: Kathaṃ rāmaṇīyakaṃti, sakatthe kantā ṇena siddhā. Kammaṃ=kriyā, tattha alasassa kammaṃ alasattaṃ alasatā alasattanaṃ ālasyaṃ ālasiyaṃ vā.
anya-e0807n:1622_0: Sakatthepi yathāyogaṃ ttādayo honti. Yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ, kāruññaṃ, pattakallaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1622_1: Ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, ettha akāralopo, tassa ce pubbarūpe ca kate “tadaminā”dinā
anya-e0807n:1622_2: nassa ñño ca lopo ca hoti, kāyapāguññatā.
anya-e0807n:1624: Chaṭṭhiyantā vaddhā dāsā ca byo hoti bhāvakammesu. Vaddhassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā vaddhabyaṃ, vaddhatā. Dāsassa bhāvo kammaṃ vā dāsabyaṃ, dāsyaṃ, dāsatā. Kathaṃ vaddhavaṃti, ṇe vāgamo.
anya-e0807n:1626: Chaṭṭhiyantā yuvasaddā bhāvakammesu naṇa vā hoti vassa bo ca. Yuvassa bhāvo yobbanaṃ, yuvattaṃ yuvatā vā.
anya-e0807n:1628: Bhāve vā imo. Aṇuno bhāvo aṇimā, laghimā, mahato bhāvo mahimā. Kisassa bhāvo kasimā.
anya-e0807n:1630: Imamhi mahato maho ca kisassa kasādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0807n:1632: Kriyāvācakasaddato imo, pākena nibbattaṃ pākimaṃ, sekimaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1634_0: Ete saddā nipaccante ṇānubandhe. Kusītassa bhāvoti bhāve ṇyo hoti, iminā īssa akāre
anya-e0807n:1634_1: ca tassa je ca kate yassa pubbarūpaṃ, kosajjaṃ. Ujuno bhāve ajjavaṃti ṇo, iminā ussa
anya-e0807n:1634_2: attaṃ, “uvaṇṇassā+vaṅa sare”ti avaṅaādese jassa dvittaṃ. Parisāsu sādhūti vākye “ṇyo
anya-e0807n:1634_3: tattha sādhū”ti ṇyo, iminā jāgamo ca, “byañjane dīgharassā”ti āssa rasse ca kate
anya-e0807n:1634_4: jassa pubbarūpaṃ, pārisajjo. Iminā kamena vākyeneva saddasiddhi veditabbā. Suhadayova
anya-e0807n:1634_5: suhajjo, tassa bhāvo sohajjaṃ, iminā ayalopo. Muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ, iminā ussa attaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1634_6: Isino idaṃ bhāvo vā ārissaṃ, ṇyapaccaye iminā ārañāgame “lopo+vaṇṇi+vaṇṇānaṃ”ti antaikāralopo
anya-e0807n:1634_7: ca. Usabhassa idaṃ bhāvo vā āsabhaṃ, iminā ussa ā. Ājānīyassa bhāvo ājaññaṃ, iminā
anya-e0807n:1634_8: yalope “lopo+vaṇṇi+vaṇṇānaṃ”ti īkāralopo. Thenassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, iminā nassa yakāro.
anya-e0807n:1634_9: Bahussutassa bhāvo bāhusaccaṃ, iminā ussa akāro saṃyogādilopo. (Bhāvataddhitaṃ).
anya-e0807n:1636_0: Atisaye vattamānato honte+te paccayā. Atisayena pāpo pāpataro pāpatamo pāpissito
anya-e0807n:1636_1: pāpiyo pāpiṭṭho, itthiyaṃ pāpatarā iccādi. Atisayappaccayantāpi atisayappaccayo,
anya-e0807n:1636_2: atisayena pāpiṭṭho pāpiṭṭhataro pāpiṭṭhatamo. Evaṃ paṭutaro paṭutamo, paṭissiko,
anya-e0807n:1636_3: paṭiyo, paṭiṭṭho, varataro iccādi paṇītataro iccādi ca.
anya-e0807n:1638: Vuddhassa jo hoti iyaiṭṭhesu. Atisayena vuddho jeyyo jeṭṭho, jādese pubbasaralope luttā sarā issa ekāre ca yassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1640_0: Iyaiṭṭhesu bāḷha+ntika+pasatthānaṃ sādha+neda+sā honti yathākkamaṃ. Atisayena bāḷho
anya-e0807n:1640_1: sādhiyo sādhiṭṭho. Atisayena antiko nediyo nediṭṭho. Atisayena pasattho seyyo seṭṭho,
anya-e0807n:1640_2: pubbeva sare lutte issa e dvittañca.
anya-e0807n:1642: Iyaiṭṭhesu appayuvānaṃ kaṇa+kanā honti yathākkamaṃ. Atisayena appo kaṇiyo kaṇiṭṭho. Atisayena yuvā kaniyo kaniṭṭho.
anya-e0807n:1644_0: Iyaiṭṭhesu vī+mantu+vantūnaṃ lopo. Atisayena medhāvī medhiyo medhiṭṭho. Atisayena
anya-e0807n:1644_1: satimā satiyo satiṭṭho. Atisayena guṇavā guṇiyo guṇiṭṭho. Ettha yathākkamaṃ mantvatthe
anya-e0807n:1646: Llapaccayo hoti dutiyantā tannissitatthe. Vedaṃ nissitaṃ vedallaṃ. Duṭṭhu nissitaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ. Vedanti tuṭṭhi. Ille saṅkhāraṃ nissitaṃ saṅkhārillaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1648_0: Pakatiyā uttara+mavatthantaraṃ vikāro. Chaṭṭhiyantā nāmasmā vikāre+vayave ca ṇādayo
anya-e0807n:1648_1: honti bahulaṃ. Ṇa-ayaso vikāro āyasaṃ bandhanaṃ, sakāgamo. Udumbarassa avayavo vikāro
anya-e0807n:1648_2: vā odumbaraṃ bhasmaṃ paṇṇaṃ vā. Kāpotaṃ maṃsaṃ satti vā. Ṇika-kappāsassa vikāro kappāsikaṃ
anya-e0807n:1648_3: vatthaṃ. Ṇeyya-eṇissa vikāro+vayavo vā eṇeyyaṃ. Kosānaṃ vikāro koseyyaṃ vatthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1648_4: Maya-tiṇānaṃ vikāro tiṇamayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, naḷamayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, suvaṇṇamayo ratho,
anya-e0807n:1650: Vikārāvayavesu jatuto ssaṇa vā hoti. Ettha “vikārāvayavesū”ti vattantesupi bahulādhikārā vikāreyeva hoti. Jatuno vikāro jātussaṃ jatumayaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1652_0: Bahulaṃ paccayalopopi. “Phalitassa rukkhassa phala+mavayavo vikāro ca, pallavitasseva
anya-e0807n:1652_1: pallavaṃ”ti vuttattā phalādayo avayavā vikārā ca honti, tasmā idaṃ vuccati phalapupphamūlesu
anya-e0807n:1652_2: vikārāvayavesu-piyālassa phalāni piyālāni, mallikāya pupphāni mallikā, usīrassa mūlaṃ
anya-e0807n:1652_3: usīraṃ. Taṃsaddena vā tadabhidhānaṃ abhedopacārena, tasmā paccayalopaṃ vināpi sijjhati.
anya-e0807n:1654_0: Chaṭṭhiyantā samūhe kaṇa+ṇa+ṇikā honti. Gottapaccayantā kaṇa-rājaññānaṃ samūho rājaññakaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1654_1: mānusakaṃ. Ukkhādīhi ukkhānaṃ samūho okkhakaṃ, “saṃyoge kvacī”ti okāro. Oṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1654_2: Urabbhānaṃ samūho orabbhakaṃ. Rājakaṃ, rājaputtakaṃ, hatthikaṃ, dhenukaṃ, māyūrakaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1654_3: kāpotakaṃ, māhisakaṃ. Ṇa-kākānaṃ samūho kākaṃ, bhikkhaṃ. Ṇika acittā-apūpānaṃ samūho
anya-e0807n:1656: Samūhatthe tā. Janānaṃ samūho janatā, gajatā, bandhutā, gāmatā, sahāyatā, nāgaratā. Tāntā sabhāvato itthiliṅgā.
anya-e0807n:1657_0: Madanīyanti karaṇe+dhikaraṇe vā anīyena siddhaṃ. Dhūmāyitattantiktantā nāmadhātuto
anya-e0807n:1657_1: ttena siddhaṃ, dhūmo viya ācaratīti “kattutā+yo”ti āye “gamanatthākammakādhāre cā”ti
anya-e0807n:1657_2: ktapaccaye ūāgame ca kate dhūmāyitassa bhāvoti dhūmāyitattaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1661: Hitatthe sso. Cakkhuno hitaṃ cakkhussaṃ, āyussaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1663_0: Sattamyantā tattha sādhūti asmiṃ atthe ṇyo hoti. Sādhūti kusalo yoggo hito vā. Sabhāyaṃ
anya-e0807n:1663_1: kusalo sabbho, ākāralopo. Parisāyaṃ sādhu pārisajjo, “kosajjā”dinā jāgame akāravuddhi.
anya-e0807n:1663_2: Medhāya hitaṃ mejjhaṃ ghataṃ. Pādānaṃ hitaṃ pajjaṃ telaṃ. “Aññasmiṃ”ti ṇyo, rathaṃ vahatīti racchā.
anya-e0807n:1665: Kammasaddā sādhvatthe niya+ññā honti. Kamme sādhu kammaniyaṃ kammaññaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1667: Iko. Kathāyaṃ kusalo kathiko. Dhammakathiko, saṅgāmiko, pavāsiko, upavāsiko.
anya-e0807n:1669: Ṇeyyo. Pathe hitaṃ pātheyyaṃ, sapatismiṃ hitaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ. Padīpeyyaṃ telaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1673: Arahatthe tumantā rāyo vā. Ghātetuṃ arahatīti ghātetāyaṃ, “rānubandhe+ntasarādissā”ti uṃlopo. Jāpetāyaṃ, pabbājetāyaṃ. Vāti kiṃ, ghātetuṃ. (Saṃkiṇṇataddhitaṃ).
anya-e0807n:1675: Paṭhamantā ettha assa atthīti etesva+tthesu mantu hoti. Gāvo ettha dese assa vā purisassa santīti gomā, gomanto iccādi guṇavantusamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1676_0: Atthīti vattamānakālopādānato bhūtāhi bhavissantīhi vā gohi na gomā. Kathaṃ gomā
anya-e0807n:1676_1: āsi, gomā bhavissatīti. Tadāpi vattamānāhiyeva gohi gomā, āsi bhavissatīti padantarā
anya-e0807n:1680_0: Mantumhi āyussa āyasādeso hoti. Āyu assa atthīti āyasmā. Go assoti jātisaddānaṃ dabbābhidhāna-
anya-e0807n:1680_1: sāmatthiyā mantvādayo na honti, tathā guṇasaddānaṃ seto paṭoti. Yesaṃ tu guṇasaddānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1680_2: dabbābhidhānasāmatthiyaṃ natthi, tehi honteva, buddhi assa atthīti buddhimā. “Vantva+vaṇṇā”ti
anya-e0807n:1680_3: vantumhi rūpavā rasavā gandhavā saddavā. “Daṇḍāditvi+kaī vā”ti ika+ī, rasī rasiko,
anya-e0807n:1682: Vantu. Pasatthaṃ sīla+massa atthīti sīlavā. Pahutā pasatthā vā paññā assa atthīti paññavā.
anya-e0807n:1684: Ika+ī honti vā mantatthe. Bahulaṃvidhānā kutocisaddato dve honti, kuto ce+kamekaṃva. Niccayutto daṇḍo assa atthīti daṇḍiko daṇḍī. Gandhiko gandhī. Vātveva, daṇḍavā.
anya-e0807n:1685: “Uttamiṇeva dhanā iko”ti gaṇasuttena iko dhaniko. Añño dhanī dhanavā.
anya-e0807n:1686: “Asannihite atthā” asannihito attho assa atthīti atthiko atthī. Sannihite atthavā. “Tadantā ca” puññattho assa atthīti puññatthiko puññatthī.
anya-e0807n:1687: “Vaṇṇantā īyeva”. Brahmavaṇṇaṃ assa atthīti brahmavaṇṇī, devavaṇṇī.
anya-e0807n:1688: “Hatthadantehi jātiyaṃ”. Hattha+massa atthīti hatthī, dantī. Aññatra hatthavā dantavā.
anya-e0807n:1689: “Vaṇṇato brahmacārimhi”. Vaṇṇo assa atthīti vaṇṇiko brahmacārī.
anya-e0807n:1690_0: “Pokkharādito dese”. Pokkharaṃ jalaṃ padumaṃ vā assa atthīti pokkharī, “yuvaṇṇehi
anya-e0807n:1690_1: nī”ti nīmhi “gharaṇyādayo”ti īssa attaṃ, nassa ṇo ca, pokkharaṇī, uppalinī, kumudinī,
anya-e0807n:1691: “Kvacā+desepi”. Paduma+massa atthīti padumī paduminī paduminīpaṇṇaṃ. Desato+ññatra pokkharavā hatthī.
anya-e0807n:1693: “Sukhadukkhā ī”. Sukhī dukkhī. “Balā bāhūrupubbā ca”. Bāhubalī, ūrubalī.
anya-e0807n:1695: Ssī. Tapo assa atthīti tapassī, yasassī, tejassī, manassī, payassī. Vātveva, yasavā.
anya-e0807n:1697_0: Ro. Ninditaṃ mukha+massa atthīti mukharo. Susi=chiddaṃ assa atthīti susiro. Ūso=khāramattikā
anya-e0807n:1697_1: asmiṃ atthīti ūsaro. Madhuro guḷo, madhurā sakkharā, madhuraṃ khīraṃ. Khaṃ=gīvāya
anya-e0807n:1697_2: vivaraṃ assa atthīti kharo gadrabho. Kuñjo=hanu assa atthīti kuñjaro. Nagaro.
anya-e0807n:1698: “Dantassa ca unnatadante”ti gaṇasuttena dantassa u ca, unnataṃ danta+massa atthīti danturo.
anya-e0807n:1700: Bho vā. Tuṭṭhi assa atthīti tuṭṭhibho, sālibho, vālibho.
anya-e0807n:1702: Iti vā a hoti. Atisayā saddhā assa atthīti saddho, pañño, paññavā, saddhā kaññā, saddhaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1706: Ālu vā. Abhijjhā assa atthīti abhijjhālu, sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu, dayāvā. Abhijjhālu eva abhijjhāluko.
anya-e0807n:1708: Ilo vā. Piccha+massa atthīti picchilo, picchavā. Pheṇilo, jaṭilo, tuṇḍilo. Ninditā vācā assa atthīti vācāloti parassaralopo.
anya-e0807n:1710: Vo hoti vā. Sīlavo, sīlavā. Kesavo, kesavā.
anya-e0807n:1711: “Aṇṇā niccaṃ” aṇṇavo. “Gaṇḍīrājīhi saññāyaṃ” gaṇḍī=meṇḍasiṅgaṃ assa atthīti gaṇḍīvaṃ dhanu, rājīvaṃ paṅkajaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1713: Vī. Māyāvī, medhāvī pumā. Nīmhi medhāvinī. Medhāvī kulaṃ, “ekavacanayosva+ghonaṃ”ti simhi rasso. Evaṃ māyāvī.
anya-e0807n:1715: Issare+bhidheyye sasaddā āmī+uvāmī honti mantvatthe. Saṃ=āyattaṃ assa atthīti sāmī suvāmī. Suvāminī kaññā.
anya-e0807n:1717: Lakkhīsaddā ṇo hoti mantvatthe a ca+ntassa. Lakkhī assa atthīti lakkhaṇo.
anya-e0807n:1719: Aṅgasmā no hoti. Kalyāṇāni sobhaṇāni aṅgāni assā atthīti aṅganā.
anya-e0807n:1721: Lomā so, pahūtā lomā assa atthīti lomaso, lomasā kaññā.
anya-e0807n:1723: Ima+iyā honti, putto assa atthīti puttimo, kittimo, puttiyo, kappiyo, jaṭiyo, hānabhāgiyo, seniyo. (Atthyatthataddhitaṃ).
anya-e0807n:1725_0: Pañcamyantā bahulaṃ to hoti vā. Toādipaccayantā nipphannanipātā, tehi parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ
anya-e0807n:1725_1: “asaṃkhyehi sabbāsaṃ”ti lopova. Gāmato āgacchatīti gāmasmā āgacchati, corato bhāyatīti
anya-e0807n:1725_2: corehi bhāyati, satthato parihīno satthā parihīno. Evaṃ purisato, rājato, aggito,
anya-e0807n:1725_3: hatthito, hetuto, yuttito, itthito, bhikkhunito, yāguto, jambuto, cittato, āyuto.
anya-e0807n:1727: Tomhi imassa ṭi nipaccate etassa ṭa+eṭa kiṃ saddassa kuttañca. Ito imasmā, ato etto etasmā, kuto kasmā.
anya-e0807n:1731: Sattamyantehi to hoti. Ādo ādito, majjhato, antato, piṭṭhito, passato, mukhato. Paṭhamantā yato+dakaṃ ta+dādittaṃ, yaṃ udakaṃ, tadevā+dittanti attho.
anya-e0807n:1733: Sabbādīhi sattamyantehi tra+tthā vā honti. Sabbatra sabbattha sabbasmiṃ, yatra yattha, tatra tattha iccādi. Bahulādhikārā na tumhaamhehi.
anya-e0807n:1735_0: Etehi “sabbādito”tiādinā tra+tthā. Sesādesā ca paccayā ca imināva nipaccante. Iminā
anya-e0807n:1735_1: kissa ka+ku ca, etassa ṭe+ṭā ca, vapaccaye kissa ilopo ca, ha+dhapaccayesu imassa
anya-e0807n:1735_2: ṭi ca nipaccate. Kasmiṃ kattha kutra kva, etasmiṃ ettha atra, imasmiṃ iha idha.
anya-e0807n:1737: Sabbasmā dhi vā. Sabbasmiṃ sabbadhi sabbatra.
anya-e0807n:1741: Tasaddā haṃ hoti hiñca. Tahaṃ tahiṃ tatra.
anya-e0807n:1743: Hiṃ haṃ nipaccante kissa ku+kā ca. Kuhiṃ kahaṃ. Kuhiñcanaṃti nipātantaraṃ.
anya-e0807n:1745: Etehi kāle dā hoti vā. Sabbasmiṃ kāle sabbadā, ekadā, aññadā, yadā, tadā.
anya-e0807n:1747: Ete saddā nipaccante. Kasmiṃkāle kadā kudā, sabbasmiṃ kāle sadā, imasmiṃ kāle adhunā idāni.
anya-e0807n:1749_0: Pakati paccayo ādeso kālavisesoti sabba+metaṃ nipātanā labbhati. Imassa ṭo jjo cā+hani
anya-e0807n:1749_1: nipaccante, asmiṃ ahani ajja. Samānassa sa-bhāvo jju cā+hani. Samāne ahani sajju.
anya-e0807n:1749_2: Aparasmā jju, aparasmiṃ ahani aparajju. Imassa eto, kāle rahi ca, imasmiṃkāle etarahi.
anya-e0807n:1749_3: Kiṃ saddassa ko, raha cā+najjatane. Kasmiṃ kāle karaha.
anya-e0807n:1751: Sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tasmiṃ thāpaccayo hoti. Sabbena pakārena sabbathā, yathā, tathā.
anya-e0807n:1753: Ki+mimehi thaṃpaccayo, ka+ittaṃ tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ. Kena pakārena kathaṃ, iminā pakārena itthaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1755: Pakāre dhā hoti. Dvīhi pakārehi dve vā pakāre karoti dvidhā karoti, bahudhā karoti, ekaṃ rāsiṃ pañcappakāraṃ karoti pañcadhā karoti. Pañcappakāra+mekappakāraṃ karoti ekadhā karoti.
anya-e0807n:1757: Ekasmā pakāre jjhaṃ vā hoti. Ekena pakārena ekaṃ vā pakāraṃ karoti ekajjhaṃ karoti, ekadhā karoti vā.
anya-e0807n:1759: Edhā vā. Dvīhi pakārehi dve vā pakāre karoti dvedhā, tedhā. Dvidhā tidhā.
anya-e0807n:1761: Pakāravati taṃsāmaññavācakā saddā jātiyo hoti. Paṭujātiyo, mudujātiyo.
anya-e0807n:1763: Vārasambandhiniyā saṃkhyāya kkhattuṃ hoti. Dve vāre bhuñjati dvikkhattuṃ divasassa bhuñjati. Vāraggahaṇaṃ kiṃ, pañca bhuñjati. Saṅkhyāyāti kiṃ, pahūte vāre bhuñjati.
anya-e0807n:1765: Kkhattuṃ hoti. Kati vāre bhuñjati katikkhattuṃ bhuñjati.
anya-e0807n:1767_0: Vārasambandhiniyā bahusaṃkhyāya dhā hoti kkhattuñca, vārānaṃ ce paccāsatti hoti.
anya-e0807n:1767_1: Bahuvāre bhuñjati bahudhā divasassa bhuñjati, bahukkhattuṃ vā. Paccāsattiyaṃti kiṃ,
anya-e0807n:1769: Kiṃpaccayo ekassa sādeso ca nipaccate. Ekaṃ vāraṃ bhuñjati sakiṃ bhuñjati, ekakkhattuṃ vā.
anya-e0807n:1771: Vicchāyaṃ pakāre ca so hoti. Khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ karoti khaṇḍaso karoti. Puthuppakārena puthuso. Sabbena pakārena sabbaso.
anya-e0807n:1773_0: Avatthāvato+vatthantarenā+bhūtassa tāyā+vatthāya bhāve karā+sa+bhūhi sambandhe sati
anya-e0807n:1773_1: vikāravācakācī hoti. Adhavalaṃ dhavalaṃ karoti dhavalī karoti. Adhavalo dhavalo siyā
anya-e0807n:1773_2: dhavalī siyā. Adhavalo dhavalo bhavati dhavalī bhavati. Abhūtatabbhāveti kiṃ, ghaṭaṃ
anya-e0807n:1773_3: karoti, dadhi atthi, ghaṭo bhavati. Karāsabhūyogeti kiṃ, adhavalo dhavalo jāyate.
anya-e0807n:1773_4: Vikārāti kiṃ, pakatiyā mā hotu, suvaṇṇaṃ kuṇḍalī karoti. (Nipātataddhitaṃ).
anya-e0807n:1775_0: Vuttato+ññepi paccayā dissanti. Vividhā mātaro vimātaroti visesanasamāso, tāsaṃ puttā
anya-e0807n:1775_1: vemātikāti rikaṇapaccaye rānubandhattā ulope vuddhimhi kate vemātikā. Pathaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0807n:1775_2: pathāvino, āvī. Issā assa atthīti issukī, ukī. Dhuraṃ vahantīti dhorayhā, yhaṇa.
anya-e0807n:1776: Sāmaññañca viseso ca, bhāvajo ca nipātajo;
anya-e0807n:1777: Iti viññūhi viññeyyo, taddhito tu catubbidho.
anya-e0807n:1781: Kriyaṃ ācikkhatīti ākhyātanti kriyāpadassa pubbācariyasaññā. Kāla+kāraka+purisaparidīpakaṃ kriyālakkhaṇaṃ tyādyantaṃ aliṅgañca, vuttampi ce+taṃ –
anya-e0807n:1785_0: Ca sabbattha vattate. Kriyā attho etassāti kriyattho dhātu, so ca duvidho sakammakā+kammakavasena.
anya-e0807n:1785_1: Tattha yasmiṃ kriyatthe kattuvācimhā kammaṃ gavesīyate, so sakammako. Itaro akammako.
anya-e0807n:1786_0: Tatra sakammakā kammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā kaṭaṃ karoti, gāmaṃ gacchati,
anya-e0807n:1786_1: odanaṃ pacati. Akammakā kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā acchati seti tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0807n:1786_2: Kriyāti ca gamanapacanādiko asattasammato kattari kamme vā patiṭṭhito kārakasamūhasādhiyo
anya-e0807n:1789: Kara+bhūdhātūhi karaṇañca bhavanañca vuccati, pāka+gamanādīhi tesaṃ kriyābhavanānaṃ vāccattaṃ kathaṃ bhavatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Punapi –
anya-e0807n:1793: Kāriyarūpā hi dhātvatthā, sattāyuttā ca te+khilā;
anya-e0807n:1794: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṃ tesu gamyate.
anya-e0807n:1795: 1. Vattamāneti anti si tha mi ma te ante se vhe e mhe.
anya-e0807n:1796: Vattamāne āraddhāparisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā tyādayo honti. Kriyādhikārattā “kriyatthā”ti vuttaṃ. Tesa+maniyame –
anya-e0807n:1798_0: Ekānekesu tumhaamhasaddavacanīyesu tadaññasaddavacanīyesu ca kārakesu pubbacchakkānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1798_1: paracchakkānañca majjhimu+ttama+paṭhamā dve dve honti yathākkamaṃ. Tatthati antīti
anya-e0807n:1798_2: paṭhamapuriso, ādo niddiṭṭhattā. Si tha iti majjhimapuriso, majjhe niddiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0807n:1798_3: Mi ma iti uttamapuriso. Uttamasaddo+yaṃ sabhāvato tipabhutīna+manta+māha. Paracchakkepi
anya-e0807n:1798_4: te antetiādinā evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesu bhavissatiādīsu sattasu paccayavidhānasuttesupi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1799_0: Idāni bhūvādīna+maṭṭhagaṇānaṃ bhūvādigaṇesu bhū=sattāya+miti paṭhamadhātuto parā
anya-e0807n:1799_1: tyādayo yojīyante. Tattha “ekamhi vattabbe ekavacanaṃ”ti tyādīsu parabhūtesu kattu+kamma+bhāvesuyeva
anya-e0807n:1799_3: lo” iccādinā tesaṃ vikaraṇānaṃ vidhānā tyādayo kattu+kamma+bhāvesveva viññāyantīti
anya-e0807n:1801: Nissāya paccayā honti, ete vikaraṇā siyuṃ.
anya-e0807n:1803: Ivaṇṇu+vaṇṇantānaṃ kriyattānaṃ e+o honti yathākkamaṃ paccayeti ūsso+kāro.
anya-e0807n:1805: Sare pare eona+mayavā honti yathākkamaṃti ossa avādeso. So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā itthī sādhu bhavati, cittaṃ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0807n:1806: Uttattā kattu ākhyāte, tatiyā na ca kattari;
anya-e0807n:1808: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṃ bahuttā “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ”ti anti.
anya-e0807n:1810_0: Vikaraṇānaṃ kvaci lopo hotīti lavikaraṇassa lopo, sesaṃ purimasadisaṃ. Te purisā
anya-e0807n:1810_1: bhavanti. Majjhimapuri- sekavacanaṃ si, tvaṃ bhavasi. Bahuvacanaṃ thapaccayo, tumhe
anya-e0807n:1812_0: Akārassa dīgho hoti himimesu. Ahaṃ bhavāmi. Bahuvacanaṃ mapaccayo, mayaṃ bhavāma.
anya-e0807n:1812_1: Evaṃ paracchekkepi-bhavate, bhavante. Bhavase, bhavavhe. Bhave, bhavamhe. Keci dīghaṃ
anya-e0807n:1819_0: Paca=pāke, akāro uccāraṇattho, eva+muparipi. Paca iti ṭhite lavikaraṇaṃ, vikaraṇalopādi
anya-e0807n:1819_1: purimasamaṃ. So odanaṃ pacati, te pacanti. Tvaṃ pacasi, tumhe pacatha. Ahaṃ pacāmi,
anya-e0807n:1819_2: mayaṃ pacāma. Paracchakke-pacate, pacante. Pacase, pacavhe. Pace, pacāmhe.
anya-e0807n:1821_1: ekattha pasaṅge majjhimapurisabahuvacanaṃ thapaccayo. So ca pacati, tvañca pacasi,
anya-e0807n:1821_2: tumhe pacatha. Tulyabalavirodhino hi vippaṭisedhā paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisānaṃ
anya-e0807n:1821_3: tiṇṇaṃ ekattha pasaṅge uttamapurisabahuvacanaṃ hoti, so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi,
anya-e0807n:1824: Etesaṃ dhātūnaṃ cchaṅa vā hoti nta+māna+tyādīsu. So gāmaṃ gacchati. Anti –
anya-e0807n:1826: Garupubbasmā rassā nte+ntīnaṃ re vā hoti.
anya-e0807n:1831_0: Gacchare gacchanti. Tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. Ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma.
anya-e0807n:1831_1: Cchādesābhāvapakkhe “ū lasse”ti ekāre gameti. Paralope gamenti. Gamesi, gametha.
anya-e0807n:1831_2: Gamemi, gamema. Paracchakkepi so gacchate, gacchare gacchante. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0807n:1832: Pure adhammo dibbati, purā marāmīti ca taṃsamīpe tabbohārūpacārena vattamānavacanaṃ. Vuttañhi –
anya-e0807n:1840_0: Pure+purāsaddehi vā anāgatatā gamyate, tadā tassa vattamānattā. Kālabyattayo vā eso,
anya-e0807n:1840_1: bhavantyeva hi kālantarepi tyādayo bāhulakā “santesu parigūhāmi” “kāyassa bhedā abhisamparāyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1840_2: sahabyataṃ gacchati vāsavassa” “ativelaṃ namassissaṃ”ti. “Kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi,
anya-e0807n:1841: 5,175. Gama vada dānaṃ ghamma vajja dajjā
anya-e0807n:1842: Gamādīnaṃ ghammādayo vā honti nta+māna+tyādīsu. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1846: Vuttattā akammakato kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto tyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n:1848_0: Bhāvakammavihitesu parokkhāvajjitesu māna+nta+tyādīsu paresu kyo hoti kriyatthā.
anya-e0807n:1848_1: Kakāro+nubandhakāriyattho. “Na te kānubandha+nāgamesū”ti paṭisedhā okārābhāvo. Anubhūyati sukhaṃ devadattena.
anya-e0807n:1850: Ākhyātena avuttattā, kattuto tatiyā na tu;
anya-e0807n:1852: Anubhūyanti sampattiyo tayā. Anubhūyasi tvaṃ devadattena. Anubhūyatha tumhe. Ahaṃ anubhūyāmi, tayā mayaṃ anubhūyāma. Dvitte anubhuyyati+ccādi. Evaṃ paracchakke.
anya-e0807n:1853: Bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassa ekattā ekavacanameva. Tañca paṭhamapurisekavacaneyeva sambhavati, neva+ññaṃ, bahulaṃvidhānā. Bhūyati bhūyate devadattena, sampati bhavanantyattho.
anya-e0807n:1856_0: Kriyatthā kyassa īña vā hoti. Ño ādyāvayavattho. Devadattena odano pacīyati paccati,
anya-e0807n:1856_1: reādese odanā pacīyare pacīyanti, paccare paccanti. Cavaggapubbarūpāni. Tvaṃ pacīyasi

anya-e0807n:1857_0: Gamito kamme cchaṅa ca īñaāgame ca kate tena gāmo gacchīyati, gāmā gacchīyanti. Gacchīyasi,
anya-e0807n:1857_1: gacchīyatha. Gacchīyāmi, gacchīyāma. Evaṃ paracchakke. Gamīyati gammati, gamīyanti
anya-e0807n:1857_2: gammanti. Gamīyasi gammasi, gamīyatha gammatha, gamīyāmi gammāmi, gamīyāma gammāma
anya-e0807n:1857_3: paracchakkepi evaṃ. Tathā ghammīyati, ghammīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1860: Tathā hi vijjamānassāpi kammāssa avacanicchāyaṃ idaṃ vuccati –
anya-e0807n:1861: Satopi na vivakkhā+ssa, asatopi ca sā bhave;
anya-e0807n:1866: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti ssati ssatha ssāmi ssāma ssate ssante ssase ssavhe ssaṃ ssāmhe
anya-e0807n:1867: Bhavissati=anāraddhe atthe vattamānato kriyatthā ssatyādayo honti.
anya-e0807n:1869_0: Kriyatthā paresaṃ aādīnaṃ īādīnaṃ ssādīnañca byañjanassi+ña hoti vibhāsā. Vavatthitavibhāsā+yaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1869_1: Sseti ssādīnaṃ ssatiādīnañcāvayavo gahito, “ūbyañjanassā”ti siddhepi tyādīsu etesamevāti
anya-e0807n:1869_2: niyamattho+ya+mārambho. Lassākāralope o+avādese bhavissati, bhavissanti. Bhavissasi,
anya-e0807n:1869_3: bhavissatha. Bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. Bhavissate, bhavissante. Bhavissase, bhavissavhe.
anya-e0807n:1872_0: Kyassa vā lopo hoti sse. Sukhaṃ tayā anubhavissati, anubhavissanti. Anubhavissasi,
anya-e0807n:1872_1: anubhavissatha. Anubhavissāmi, anubhavissāma. Aññatra anubhūyissati, anubhūyissanti
anya-e0807n:1873: Kattari-pacissati, pacissanti iccādi. Kamme-pacissati odano devadattena, pacīyissati, paccissati. Paccissanti odanā pacīyissanti, pacīyissare, paccissare, paccissanti.
anya-e0807n:1874_0: Gamito kattari-so gacchissati, te gacchissanti. Tvaṃ gacchissasi, tumhe gacchissatha.
anya-e0807n:1874_1: Ahaṃ gacchissāmi, mayaṃ gacchissāma. Gacchissate, gacchissante. Gacchissase, gacchissavhe.

anya-e0807n:1874_3: gamissāma iccādi. Kamme-gacchiyissati, gacchiyissanti iccādi. Kyalope gamissati,
anya-e0807n:1874_4: gamissanti iccādi. Tathā ghammissati ghammīyissati, ghammissanti, ghammīyissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1876_0: Nāmasadde nipāte sati garahāyaṃ vimhaye ca gamyamāne ssatyādayo honti. Ime hi nāma
anya-e0807n:1876_1: kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti. Ettha “jyādīhi knā”ti knāvikaraṇe “ñāssane jā”ti jādeso.
anya-e0807n:1876_2: Na hi nāma bhikkhave tassa moghapurisassa pāṇesu anuddayā bhavissati. Kathañhi nāma
anya-e0807n:1876_3: so bhikkhave moghapuriso sabbamattikāmayaṃ kuṭikaṃ karissati. Vimhaye-acchariyaṃ
anya-e0807n:1876_4: vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, santena vata bho pabbajitā vihārena viharanti, yatra

anya-e0807n:1876_6: neva dakkhiti, na pana saddaṃ sossati. Acchariyaṃ andho nāma pabbata+mārohissati,
anya-e0807n:1877: 4. Bhūte ī uṃ o ttha iṃ mhā ā ū se vhaṃ a mhe
anya-e0807n:1878: Bhūte parisamatte atthe vattamānato kriyatthā īādayo honti. Bhūtānajjatane upari vakkhamānattā ime īādayo bhūtajjatane. “Suvo ahosi ānando”tiādīsu bhūtasāmaññeva bhavanti.
anya-e0807n:1884: Āādo īādo ssādo ca kriyatthassa vā aña hotīti dhātuto pubbaṃ aña. “Kattari lo”ti lo, ekāra+avādesā ca.
anya-e0807n:1886: Eyyāthādīnaṃ oādayo vā honti yathākkamaṃti īssattho, abhavittho, bhavittho, abhavattho, bhavattho. “Ā ī ū mhā ssā ssamhānaṃ vā”ti īssa rassattaṃ. So abhavi bhavi, abhavī bhavī.
anya-e0807n:1888: Tiuṃssa iṃsu+aṃsu vā honti. Abhaviṃsu bhaviṃsu, abhavaṃsu bhavaṃsu, abhavuṃ bhavuṃ.
anya-e0807n:1890: Ossa aādayo vā honti. Abhava bhava, abhavi bhavi, iñāgame abhavittha bhavittha, abhavattha bhavattha, abhavittho bhavittho, abhavattho bhavattho.
anya-e0807n:1892: Ossa si vā hoti. Abhavisi bhavisi, abhavasi bhavasi. Abhavo bhavo.
anya-e0807n:1894: Esaṃ uña vā hoti. Īādisambandhīnameva gahaṇaṃ. Abhavuttha bhavuttha.
anya-e0807n:1896_0: Iṃssa ca siña vā hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ. Ikāraññakārā uccāraṇaādyāvayavatthā.

anya-e0807n:1896_9: anvabhūyī anubhūyī, anvabhūyiṃsu anubhūyiṃsu anvabhūyaṃsu anubhūyaṃsu anvabhūyuṃ
anya-e0807n:1896_10: anubhūyuṃ iccādi. Bhāve-tena abhūyittho bhūyittho abhūyattho bhūyattho abhūyi bhūyi
anya-e0807n:1896_11: abhūyī bhūyī. Tena abhūyattha bhūyattha abhūya bhūya abhūyā bhūyā.
anya-e0807n:1897_0: So apacittho pacittho iccādi kattusamaṃ. Kamme-apacīyittho pacīyittho apacīyattho

anya-e0807n:1898: So gāmaṃ agacchittho gacchittho iccādi purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1900: Ḍaṃsassa ca gamissa ca ñchaṅa vā hoti ā+īādīsu. Agañchittho gañchittho agañchattho gañchattho agañchi gañchi agañchī gañchī iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1902_0: Āādo īādo ca gamissa ā hoti vā. So agā agami gami agamittho gamittho agamattho gamattho.
anya-e0807n:1902_1: Īpaccaye lassākārassa “himimesva+ssā”ti ettha “assā”ti yogavibhāgā dīghe “dīghā īssā”ti
anya-e0807n:1902_2: īssa siādeso, agamāsi agami gami agamī gamī, agamiṃsu gamiṃsu agamaṃsu gamaṃsu agamuṃ
anya-e0807n:1902_3: gamuṃ. Ossa aādese ajjhaguṃ. Tvaṃ ajjhagā parassa lopo. Tumhe ajjhaguttha. Ahaṃ ajjhagaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1902_4: mayaṃ ajjhagamha. Paracchakke – “eyyāthā”dinā tthe so agacchittha gacchittha agañchittha
anya-e0807n:1902_5: gañchittha agamittha gamittha agama gama agamā gamā. Te agamū gamū, ossa āādese ajjhaguṃ.
anya-e0807n:1902_6: Tvaṃ agamise gamise. Tumhe agamivhaṃ. “Eyyāthā” dinā a+mādese ahaṃ agamaṃ gamaṃ ajjhagaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1902_7: Mayaṃ agamimhe gamimhe. Kammeagacchīyi agamīyi, agacchiyuṃ agamiyuṃ iccādi. Tathā
anya-e0807n:1904_0: Māyoge sati īādayo āādayo ca vā honti. Sakakālato kālantarepi paccayavidhānattho+yaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1904_1: Mā bhavaṃ abhavittho iccādi. Vāvidhānāssatyādi+eyyādi+tvādayopi honti, mā bhavaṃ

anya-e0807n:1906_0: Avijjamānajjatane bhūtatthe vattamānato kriyatthā āādayo honti vā. “Eyyāthā”dinā

anya-e0807n:1906_3: abhavattha bhavattha abhavattho bhavattho, siādese abhavasi bhavasi abhavo bhavo.
anya-e0807n:1906_4: Tumhe abhavattha bhavattha. Ahaṃ abhavaṃ bhavaṃ abhava bhava, mayaṃ abhavamha bhavamha
anya-e0807n:1906_5: abhavamhā bhavamhā. So abhavattha bhavattha. Te abhavatthuṃ bhavatthuṃ. Tvaṃ abhavase
anya-e0807n:1906_6: bhavase. Tumhe abhavavhaṃ bhavavhaṃ. “Issa ca siña”ti siṃ, ahaṃ abhavasiṃ bhavasiṃ
anya-e0807n:1906_7: abhaviṃ bhaviṃ. Mayaṃ abhavamhase bhavamhase. Kamme-tthe sukhaṃ tayā anubhūyittha,
anya-e0807n:1906_8: iñāgamābhāve anubhūyattha iccādi. Bhāve-abhūyattha bhūyattha iccādi.

anya-e0807n:1907_1: paccattha apacīya pacīya apacīyā pacīyā apacca pacca apaccā paccā. Apacīyu pacīyu
anya-e0807n:1907_2: apacīyū pacīyū apaccu paccu apaccū paccū iccādi. “Māyoge ī+āādī”ti māyogepi āādayo,
anya-e0807n:1908: Tathā agacchattha gacchattha iccādi purimasamaṃ. Tathā agamattha gamattha iccādipi aghammattha ghammattha iccādipi. (Anajjatanapaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n:1909: 6. Parokkhe a u e ttha a mha ttha re ttho vho i mhe
anya-e0807n:1910: Apaccakkhe bhūtānajjatane vattamānato kriyatthā aādayo honti. Akkhānaṃ=indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhaṃ. Tasmiṃ. “Aparokkhesū”ti vacanā kya+lādivikaraṇā na honti.
anya-e0807n:1912: Parokkhāyaṃ paṭhama+mekassaraṃ saddarūpaṃ dve bhavati. “Bhūssa vuka” itiādīsu vuka, bhūva bhūva iti dvitte –
anya-e0807n:1914: Dvitte pubbassa ādito+ññassa byañjanassa lopo hoti.
anya-e0807n:1916: Aādīsu dvitte pubbassa bhūssa a hoti.
anya-e0807n:1918_0: Dvitte pubbesaṃ catutthadutiyānaṃ tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathākkamaṃti bakāre so babhūva
anya-e0807n:1918_1: kira, te babhuvu kira. Tvaṃ babhuve kira, iña tumhe babhuvittha kira. Ahaṃ babhuva
anya-e0807n:1918_2: kira, mayaṃ babhuvimha kira. So babhuvittha kira, te babhuvire kira. Tvaṃ babhuvittho
anya-e0807n:1918_3: kira, tumhe babhuvivho kira. Ahaṃ babhuvi kira, mayaṃ babhuvimhe kira. Kamme-anupabhuva
anya-e0807n:1919_0: Papaca, papacu. Papace, iñāgame papacittha. Aññatra “saṃyogādilopo”ti lopo, papacittha.
anya-e0807n:1919_1: Papaca, papacimha. Papacittha, papacire. Papacittho papacitho, papacivho. Papaci,
anya-e0807n:1920_0: Aādipaccaye dvibhāve anādibyañjanalope pubbassa “kavaggahānaṃ cavaggajā”ti cavaggajakāre
anya-e0807n:1920_1: “byañjane dīgharassā”ti dīghe ca kate so gāmaṃ jagāma kira, jagamu. Jagame, jagamittha.
anya-e0807n:1920_2: Jagama, jagamimha. Jagamittha, jagamire. Jagamittho, jagamivho. Jagami, jagamimhe. Evaṃ kamme.
anya-e0807n:1921_1: phalenā+numīyamānā parokkhāva vatthuto. Tena uttamavisayepi payogasambhavo. (Parokkhāpaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n:1922: 7. Yyodo vā+tipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssamhā ssatha ssiṃsussasessavhessiṃ ssāmhase.
anya-e0807n:1923_0: Eyyādo visaye kriyātipattiyaṃ ssādayo honti. Vidhurapaccayopanipātato kāraṇavekallato
anya-e0807n:1923_1: vā kriyātipatana+manipphatti kriyātipatti. Ete ca ssādayo sāmatthiyā atītānāgatesveva
anya-e0807n:1923_2: honti, na vattamāne, tatra kriyātipatyasambhavā. Iñāgame ssāssa vā rasse ca sace
anya-e0807n:1923_3: so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa bhavissa abhavissā bhavissā vā,
anya-e0807n:1923_4: te ca taṃ alabhissaṃsu, arahanto abhavissaṃsu bhavissaṃsu. “Eyyāthā”dinā ssessa vā
anya-e0807n:1923_5: akāre tvaṃ abhavissa bhavisse. Tumhe abhavissatha. Ahaṃ abhavissaṃ. Rasse mayaṃ abhavissamha
anya-e0807n:1923_6: bhavissamha abhavissamhā bhavissamhā. Paracchakke-so abhavissatha, abhavissiṃsu.
anya-e0807n:1924: Kamme-tena sukhaṃ anvabhavissa, anvabhavissaṃsu kyalopo. Anvabhūyissa anvabhūyissā iccādi. Bhāve-tena abhūyissa bhūyissa abhūyissā bhūyissā. Abhūyissatha bhūyissatha.
anya-e0807n:1925_0: Evaṃ taṇḍulādisādhanaṃ alabhissa, odanaṃ apacissa pacissa iccādi. Kamme-tena odano
anya-e0807n:1925_1: apacissa pacissa apacissā pacissā apacīyissa pacīyissa apacīyissā pacīyissā apaccissa
anya-e0807n:1926_0: So agacchissa gacchissa agacchissā gacchissā iccādi. Cchādesā+bhāve agamissa gamissa
anya-e0807n:1926_1: agamissā gamissā iccādi. Kamme-agacchissa gacchissa agacchīyissa iccādi. Agamissa
anya-e0807n:1926_2: gamissa agamīyissa iccādi. Tathā aghammissa iccādi. (Kriyātipattipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n:1927: 8. Hetuphalesve+yya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvho eyyaṃ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0807n:1928: Hetubhūtāyaṃ phalabhūtāyañca kriyāyaṃ vattamānato kriyatthā eyyādayo honti vā. Lavikaraṇavuddhiādi pubbasamaṃ. Parikappe –
anya-e0807n:1930: Eyya+eyyāsi+eyya+miccesa+me vā hoti. So dāni kinnu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya.
anya-e0807n:1932_0: Eyyu+miccassa ñuṃ vā hoti. Sace saṃkhārā niccā bhavuṃ bhaveyyuṃ, na nirujjheyyuṃ.
anya-e0807n:1932_1: Yadi tvaṃ bhave bhaveyyāsi. “Eyyāthā” dinā assa okāre tumhe bhaveyyātho bhaveyyātha
anya-e0807n:1934_0: Eyyāmassa emu vā hoti u ca. Kinnu kho mayaṃ bhavemu bhaveyyāmu bhaveyyāma. Paracchakke-bhavetha,
anya-e0807n:1934_1: bhaveraṃ. Bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho. Bhave bhaveyyaṃ, bhaveyyāmhe. Kamme-sukhaṃ tayā
anya-e0807n:1934_2: anubhuyye anubhuyyeyya, anubhuyyuṃ anubhūyeyyuṃ. Tena tvaṃ anubhūye anubhūyeyyāsi,
anya-e0807n:1934_3: tumhe anubhūyeyyātho anubhūyeyyātha. Tenā+haṃ anubhūyeyyāmi, mayaṃ anubhūyemu anubhūyeyyāmu
anya-e0807n:1934_4: anubhūyeyyāma. Paracchakke-anubhūyetha iccādi. Bhāve-bhūye bhūyeyya bhūyetha.
anya-e0807n:1935: Vidhimhi-so odanaṃ pace paceyya iccādi. Kamme-pacīye pacīyeyya pacce pacceyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1936: Anumatiyaṃ-so gāmaṃ gacche gaccheyya iccādi. Aññatra game gameyya iccādi. Tathā ghamme ghammeyya iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1937: Pāto paceyya ce bhuñje, icce+ttha pacanakriyā;
anya-e0807n:1940: Sattiyaṃ arahate ca kriyatthā eyyādayo honti. Bhavaṃ khalu pattaṃ paceyya, bhavaṃ satto, bhavaṃ araho.
anya-e0807n:1942_0: Sambhāvane gamyamāne dhātunā vuccamāne ca eyyādayo honti vibhāsā. Api bhavaṃ gilitaṃ
anya-e0807n:1942_1: pāsāṇaṃ paceyya udaragginā, sambhāvemi saddahāmi bhavaṃ paceyya, bhavaṃ pacissati, bhavaṃ apaci.
anya-e0807n:1946: Patthanā, bhattiyā vā+tha, na vā byāpāraṇā vidhi.
anya-e0807n:1947: Pañhe-kiṃ so bhattaṃ paceyya, udāhu byañjanaṃ. Patthanāyaṃ-aho vata so paceyya ce. Vidhimhi-bhavaṃ pattaṃ paceyya. (Eyyādipaccayanayo).
anya-e0807n:1948: 10. Tu antu hi tha mi ma taṃ antaṃ ssu vho e āmase
anya-e0807n:1949: Pañhapatthanāvidhisve+te honti kriyatthato. Āsiṃsanatthe-so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
anya-e0807n:1951_0: Ato parassa hissa vā lopo hoti. Tvaṃ sukhī bhava bhavāhi, himhi dīgho. “Eyyāthā”dinā
anya-e0807n:1951_1: vhoka, tumhe sukhitā bhavathavho bhavatha. Ahaṃ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṃ sukhino bhavāma.
anya-e0807n:1951_2: Paracchakke-tathā bhavataṃ, bhavantaṃ. Bhavassu, bhavavho. Bhave bhavāmase. Kamme-tayā
anya-e0807n:1952_0: Āṇattiyaṃ-devadatto dāni odanaṃ pacatu, pacantu iccādi. Kamme-tena odano paccatu
anya-e0807n:1952_1: iccādi. Tathā so gāmaṃ gacchatu iccādi. “Ū lasse”ti lasse+kāre gametu, gamentu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1952_2: Ghammādese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi. Kamme-gacchīyatu iccādi. Tathā gamīyatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1953: Vidhimhi-lassa lope lutte vuddhi, idha pabbato hotu.
anya-e0807n:1954_0: Nimantane-adhivāsetha tumhe bhante bhagavā bhojanaṃ, vasatissa “curādito ṇī”ti ṇimhi
anya-e0807n:1954_1: “assā ṇānubandhe”ti ā, “yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye”ti e ca hoti. Idha nissīdatu bhavaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1954_2: sadassa “jara+sadāna+mīma vā”ti īma, manubandhattā antasarato īma.
anya-e0807n:1955: Ajjhesane-desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ, ettha curādittā purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0807n:1956: Anumatiyaṃ-puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, pavisatu bhavaṃ. Ettha pucchato hissa lopo. Evaṃ nisīda.
anya-e0807n:1957: Patthanā=yācanā, tatra-dada=dāne, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, dāto lassa ekāre ca ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi.
anya-e0807n:1958: Pattakāle-sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṃ karotu bhavaṃ. Ettha “tanāditvo”ti o.
anya-e0807n:1962_0: Etesaṃ vā cchaṅa hotinta+māna+tyādīsu. So saggaṃ gacchati gameti, gacchanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1962_1: Kamme-gacchīyati gamīyati iccādi. Yama=uparame, parokkhāanajjatanarūpāni sabbattha
anya-e0807n:1962_2: payoga+manugamma yojetabbāni. Nipubbo, niyacchati niyamati, niyacchanti niyamanti.
anya-e0807n:1962_3: Saṃpubbo, “ye saṃssā”ti ññattaṃ, saññamati, saññamanti. Kamme-niyacchīyati niyamīyati
anya-e0807n:1962_4: niyammati, saññamīyati vā. Tathā niyacchissati, saññamissati. Niyacchi, saṃyami.
anya-e0807n:1962_5: Niyacchissa, saṃyamissa. Niyaccheyya, saṃyameyya. Niyacchatu, saññamatu. Isa+siṃsa=icchāyaṃ,
anya-e0807n:1962_6: so saggaṃ icchati, icchanti iccādi. “Lahussupantassā”ti vuddhimhi esati, esanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1962_7: Kamme-icchīyati, “vā kvacī”ti vuddhimhi esīyati. Pubbarūpe issati issate iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1962_8: Icchissati esissati iccādi. Icchi esi. Icchissa esissa. Iccheyya eseyya. Icchatu
anya-e0807n:1962_9: esatu iccādi. Āsa=upavesane, so āsane acchati iccādi. “Byañjane dīgharassā”ti rasso,
anya-e0807n:1962_10: upapubbo, tathā upāsati. Acchissati upāsissati. Acchi upāsi. Acchissa upāsissa. Accheyya
anya-e0807n:1962_11: upāseyya. Acchatu upāsatu iccādi. Disa=pekkhane, dicchati dicchanti iccādi sabbaṃ
anya-e0807n:1962_12: purimasamaṃ. Labha=lābhe, ito paraṃ visesaṭṭhānamevavakkhāma, sabbavāro vuttānusārena
anya-e0807n:1962_13: gahetabbo. Labhati, labhanti iccādi. Kamme-kyassa pubbarūpādimhi kate labbhati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1964: Labhasmā iṃ īnaṃ thaṃ+thā vā honti. So alabhittha labhittha alabhi labhi iṃ paccaye alatthaṃ alabhiṃ iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1966_0: Labhādīnaṃ cchaṅa hoti ssena saha. Lacchati labhissati, lacchanti labhissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1966_1: Kriyātipattiyaṃ ssābhāgassa cchaṅādese alacchā alabhissa iccādi. Vasa=nivāse, vacchati
anya-e0807n:1966_2: vasissati. Kamme-bahulādhikārā “assū”ti ukāro, pubbarūpe vussati vussissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1966_3: Tathā avacchā avasissā. Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, checchati chindissati, “mañca rudhādīnaṃ”ti
anya-e0807n:1966_4: maṃ lo ca. Lassa lopo ca. Bhida=vidāraṇe, bhecchati bhindissati. Abhecchā abhindissā.
anya-e0807n:1966_5: Ruda=rodane, rucchati rodissati. Arucchā arodissā iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1967_0: Aññapaccayepi chidassa “cchaṅa” iti yogavibhāgā cchaṅa, bhūte ūṃ paccaye acchecchuṃ
anya-e0807n:1967_1: acchindiṃsu. Vuttato aññadhātūnañca, gama=gamane, gacchaṃ gacchissaṃ. Aññapaccayepi
anya-e0807n:1967_2: vaca=byattavacane iccādi, kamme-bahulādhikārā tyādīsu parabhūtesupi yathāgamaṃ vacādīnañcassa
anya-e0807n:1967_3: “vacādīnaṃ vassuṭa vā”ti kamme uṭa ca “assū”ti assa u ca, tena dhammo uccati vuccati,
anya-e0807n:1969: Bhujādīnaṃ kkhaṅa hoti ssena saha. Vakkhati vacissati, vakkhanti vacissanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1971_0: Īādīsu vacassa oma hoti. Makārānubandhattā “mānubandho sarāna+mantā paro”ti paribhāsato
anya-e0807n:1971_1: sarā paro. Avoci, avocuṃ, avoco iccādi. Anajjatane-avaca avacā vacā iccādi. Kriyātipattiyaṃ-avakkhā
anya-e0807n:1971_2: avacissā, avakkhiṃsu avacissiṃsu iccādi. Vaceyya iccādi. Kamme-vucceyya iccādi. Tathā
anya-e0807n:1973: Kusa=akkose, āpubbo, tassa rasso ca, akkosati iccādi ñeyyaṃ, lavikaraṇalopavuddhiyo.
anya-e0807n:1975: Kusā ruhā ca parassa īssa chi vā hoti. Pararūpapaṭhamakkharāni, akkocchi akkosi iccādi. Abhipubbo ruha=rohane, abhirucchi abhiruhi iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1976_0: Vaha=pāpuṇane, vahati, vahanti. Kamme-kye “hassa vipallāso”ti vipariyāso, tena so
anya-e0807n:1976_1: vuyhati, “assū”ti uttaṃ. Vahissati, vuyhissati. Avahi, avuyhittha, avuhi. Avahissā,
anya-e0807n:1976_2: vuyhīssā iccādi. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Vahatu, vuyhatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1979_0: Jara marānaṃ īyaṅa vā hoti māna+nta+tyādīsu. Jīyati. “Jara sadāna+mīma”ti īmaāgamo
anya-e0807n:1979_1: lo ca, jīrati. Kamme-jīrīyati jīyīyati. Evaṃ jīyissati jīrissati, jīyīyissati jīrīyissati.
anya-e0807n:1979_2: Ajīyi ajīri, ajīyīyi ajīrīyi. Ajīyissā ajīrissā, ajīyīyissā ajīrīyissā ajīyissā ajīrīyissā
anya-e0807n:1979_3: iccādi. Mara=pāṇacāge, īyaṅa, mīyati marati, mīyanti maranti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1981: 5,124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhāti
anya-e0807n:1982: Ete ādesā disassa vā honti. Anekavaṇṇattā sabbādeso. Passati passanti, dakkhati dakkhanti. Kamme-kye pubbarūpo, dissati dissanti, vipassīyati dakkhīyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1984_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa lopo vā hoti. Dakkhati dakkhissati. Apassi passi,
anya-e0807n:1984_1: apassiṃsu passiṃsu apasso passo, apassittha passittha. Apassiṃ passiṃ, apassimha
anya-e0807n:1984_2: passimha. Tathā adassī dassī, adassiṃsu dassiṃsu iccādi. Anajjatane dasādeso, addasā
anya-e0807n:1984_3: addasa. Addā adda iccādi. Apassissa dakkhissa iccādi. Passeyya dakkheyya, passatu dakkhatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1985: Sada=visaraṇagatyāvasādanādānesu, nipubbo, “jarasadāna+mīma vā”ti īmaāgamo. Nisīdati, nisīdanti iccādi. Bhāve-nisajjati, nisajjate.
anya-e0807n:1988_0: Yajassa yassa ṭi+yī honti kānubandheti bahulādhikārā tyādivisayepi kye pubbarūpe
anya-e0807n:1988_1: ca ijjati yijjati mayā buddho. So yajissati, tena ijjissate yijjissate. So yajī,
anya-e0807n:1988_2: tena ijji yijji. So yajissā, tena ijjissā yijjissā. So yajeyya, tena ijjeyya yijjeyya.
anya-e0807n:1988_3: So yajatu, tena ijjatu yijjatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1989_0: Vada=vacane, “gamavadā” dinā vadassa vajjādeso vā, lassa “ūlasse”ti kvaci e ca, vajjati
anya-e0807n:1989_1: vadeti vadati, vajjenti vadenti iccādi. Kamme – “kyassā”ti īña, vajjīyati vajjati
anya-e0807n:1989_2: vadīyati, vajjīyanti vajjanti vadīyanti. Vadissati, vadissanti. Avadī vadī, avadiṃsu
anya-e0807n:1989_3: vadiṃsu. Avadissa vadissa. Vajje vajjeyya vade vadeyya, vajjeyyuṃ vadeyyuṃ. Vajjetu
anya-e0807n:1990_0: Kamu=padavikkhepe, “parokkhāyañcā”ti caggahaṇena kama kama iti dvitte anādibyañjanalope
anya-e0807n:1990_1: lavikaraṇe “kavaggahā” dinā kassa ce niggahītāgame ca kate caṃkamati kamati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1990_2: Cala=kampane, caṃcalati. Jala+dala=dittiyaṃ, dvitte daddallati iccādi. (Savuddhikabhūvādinayo).
anya-e0807n:1991: Hū+bhū=sattāyaṃ, tyādīsu “kattari lo”ti lo, tassa lope “yuvaṇṇāna+meo paccaye”ti okāro. So hoti, te honti. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa iccādi. Bhāve-tena hūyati hūyate.
anya-e0807n:1993: Hūssa heādayo honti ssaccādo. Hessati hehi ssati hohissati.
anya-e0807n:1995_0: Dakkhādīhi ādesehi parassa ssassa vā lopo hoti. Hehiti hehissati, hohiti hohissati.
anya-e0807n:1995_1: Hehinti hehissanti, hohinti hohissanti iccādi. Anajjatane īmhi añāgamo, “paro kvacī”ti
anya-e0807n:1995_2: īssa lopo, so ahu. Vuddhimhi “dīghā īssa” iti īssa siādeso, suvo ahosi ānando.
anya-e0807n:1997: Hūto parassa u+miccassa resuṃ vā hoti. Rakārānubandho “rānubandhentasarādissā”ti antasarādissa lopo. Ahesuṃ. Okāravuddhi avādese ahavuṃ. Ossa siādese ahosi.
anya-e0807n:1999_0: Imiccassa siña hoti mhātthānañca bahulaṃ. Ñākāro ākhyāvayavattho (ukāro) ikāro uccāraṇattho.
anya-e0807n:1999_1: “Aīssā” dinā iñāgame tumhe ahosittha, ahosi. Parassaralope rasse ca ahuṃ, ahosimha,
anya-e0807n:1999_2: ahumha, rasso. Bhāve-abhavi, āssatthādeso, abhavittha. Anajjatane āūādipaccaye kate
anya-e0807n:1999_3: “yuvaṇṇāna+miya ṅuvaṅa sare”ti uvaṅādese ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvo, ahuvattha. Assa amādese
anya-e0807n:1999_4: ahuṃ ahuvaṃ, ahumha iccādi. Bhāve-tena ahuyi ahuyittha. Ahavissā, ahavissaṃsu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:1999_5: Bhāve-ahuyissa, ahuyissatha. Pubbassaralopo, heyya, heyyuṃ iccādi. Bhāve-hūyeyya,
anya-e0807n:1999_6: hūyetha. Hotu, hontu iccādi. Bhāve-hūyatu, hūyataṃ. Anupubbe anubhoti iccādi sabbavāresu
anya-e0807n:1999_7: yojetabbaṃ. Bhāve rūpābhāvā. Kamme-anubhūyati iccādi viseso.
anya-e0807n:2000_0: Si=saye, lassa lopo vuddhi, seti. Ayādese sayati, senti sayanti iccādi. Kamme-atipubbo,
anya-e0807n:2000_1: kye “dīgho sarassā”ti issa dīghe ca kate tena atisīyati, atisīyanti iccādi. Bhāve-tena
anya-e0807n:2001: Nī=pāpane, dvikammako+yaṃ, ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti nayati, nenti nayanti iccādi. Kamme-nīyate gāmaṃ ajo devadattena iccādi. Tathā sesesupi yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2004: Ṭhāpānaṃ tiṭṭhapivāhonti vā nta+māna+tyādīsu. Lassa lope tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti, ṭhāti, ṭhānti.
anya-e0807n:2006: Pādito parassa ṭhāssa kvaci ṭhaho hoti vā. Saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti. Lasse, adhiṭṭheti, adhiṭṭhenti. Kamme –
anya-e0807n:2008_0: Ñādito+ññassa ākārantassa kriyatthassa ī hoti kye. Upaṭhīyati, upaṭhīyanti. Ṭhahādese
anya-e0807n:2008_1: “kyassā”ti īña, tena patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. Bhāve-īmhi ṭhīyati, ṭhīyate.
anya-e0807n:2008_2: Tathā papubbe patiṭṭhissati patiṭṭhahissati. Īssa simhi aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu, saṇṭhahi,
anya-e0807n:2008_3: saṇṭhahiṃsu. Patiṭṭhissa patiṭṭhahissa. Tiṭṭhe tiṭṭheyya, saṇṭhe saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṃ,
anya-e0807n:2008_4: saṇṭhahe saṇṭhaheyya. Tiṭṭhatu ṭhātu, saṇṭhahatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2009: Pā=pāne, pivādese pivati. “Tavaggavaraṇā” do “bayañā”ti yogavibhāgena vassa bakāro, pibati. Kammepīyati, pīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2012: Atthito parassa tassa tho hoti. Pararūpe paṭhamakkharatakāre ca atthi. “Nta+māna+nti+yi+yuṃsvā+dilopo”ti assa lopo, santi.
anya-e0807n:2014: Atthissa aṭa hoti sihisu. Ṭo sabbādesattho. Tvaṃ asi. Pararūpādimhi kate idāni tumhe attha.
anya-e0807n:2016: Asasmā paresaṃ mimānaṃ mhimhā vā honti taṃsanniyogena asassa aṭa ca. Amhi.
anya-e0807n:2018: Esu mimesu asassa so hoti, pararūpabādhanatthaṃ. Asmi, amha asma. Bhavissatipaccaye –
anya-e0807n:2020_0: Parokkhā a-ādo anajjatana ā-ādo kriyātipattissā-ādo bhavissatissatyādo ca atthissa
anya-e0807n:2020_1: bhu hoti. Ādesavidhānaṃ asassāpayogatthaṃ, kismiñci paccayavisese, tasmā asitabbantiādi
anya-e0807n:2020_2: na bhavati. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavā, abhavu. Kriyātipattiyaṃ bhuādese abhavissa,
anya-e0807n:2022_0: Asa=bhuvi+ccasmā paresaṃ eyyādicchannaṃ sādayo honti yathākkamaṃ. Pararūpe so assa,
anya-e0807n:2022_1: te assu. Tvaṃ assa, tumhe assatha. Ahaṃ assaṃ, mayaṃ assāma. Tvādimhi so atu, assa
anya-e0807n:2022_2: lope santhu, ayādese tvaṃ ahi, tumhe attha. Amhi, amha, sādese asmi asma. Bahulādhikārā
anya-e0807n:2022_3: ajjatane āsi, āsiṃsu, āsuṃ iccādīpi honti.
anya-e0807n:2025: Brūto parassa tissa īña vā hoti. Vuddhiavādese lassa lope bravīti.
anya-e0807n:2027: Brūssa o na hoti byañjane. Brūti. Uvaṅādese brūvanti.
anya-e0807n:2029_0: Āhā paresaṃ ti+antīnaṃ ṭa+ṭū honti. Ṭakārā sabbādesatthā. Atoyeva āhā paresaṃ tiantīnaṃ
anya-e0807n:2029_1: ṭaṭūvidhānañāpakā tiantīsu brūssa āho. Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2029_2: Bravissati. Abravi abravī, abravuṃ. Anajjatane abravā, abravu. Parokkhāyaṃ –
anya-e0807n:2031: Brūssa āho hoti parokkhāaādīsu. Supine kira so āha, te āhu iccādi. Abravissa. Brave braveyya. Vuddhippaṭisedhe brūtu, bravantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2032: Hana=hiṃsāyaṃ, timhi vikaraṇalope so hanati hanti. Te hananti iccādi. Kamme-ye nassa ññe pubbarūpaṃ, tena haññati, haññanti haññare. Tathā hanissati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2034: Hanā ssāssa cha+khā vā honti. Paṭihaṃkhāmi paṭihanissāmi. Haṃchema hanissāma. Ahani, ahaniṃsūtiādi sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Huvādayo
anya-e0807n:2035_0: Hu=havane. Tyādīsu lo. “Parokkhāyañcā”ti caggahaṇena hu huti dvittaṃ, “kavaggahānaṃ
anya-e0807n:2035_1: cavaggajā”ti hassa jo, lalopo vuddhi ca, juhoti aggiṃ, aññatra “yavā sare”ti vakāro,
anya-e0807n:2035_2: juhvati. Juhonti. Juhvanti. Juhosi juhvasi, juhotha juhvatha. Iccādi. Kamme – “dīgho
anya-e0807n:2035_3: sarassā”ti dīghe hūyati tena aggi iccādi. Juhissati, juhissanti. Ajuhavi ajuhosi,
anya-e0807n:2035_4: ajuhavuṃ ajuhaviṃsu ajuhavaṃsu ajuhosuṃ. Ajuhissa, ajuhissaṃssu. Juhe juheyya. Juhotu, juhontu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2036_0: Hā=cāge, pure viya dvebhāvachādesalope “rasso pubbassā”ti pubbassa āssa rasso. Jahāti
anya-e0807n:2036_1: iccādi. Kamme – “aññādissā+ssī kye”ti kye āssa ī, hīyati iccādi. Jahissati. Ajahāsi,
anya-e0807n:2036_2: “dīghā īssa” iti si, pajahi, ajahiṃsu ajahaṃsu, pajahiṃsu pajahuṃ. Kamme-pahīyi pahīyittha.
anya-e0807n:2037: Dā=dāne, dvibhāvarassattāni, lalopo, dadāti, dadanti iccādi. “Gamavadā” dinā dajjādese dajjati, dajjanti iccādi. Lasse+kāre dānaṃ deti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2039_0: Advitte vattamānassa dāssa daṃ hoti vā mimesu. Vaggantaṃ, dammi demi, damma dema.
anya-e0807n:2039_1: Īkāre dīyati iccādi. Anāgatatthe iñāgame saraṇopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. Dajjissati,
anya-e0807n:2039_2: dajjissanti. Lavikaraṇe dassati, dassanti. Ajjatane-adadi, adadiṃsu, adajji, adajjiṃsu,
anya-e0807n:2039_3: adāsi, adaṃsu. Anajjatane-adadā, adadu. Kālātipattiyaṃ-adadissa adajjissa, le adassa,
anya-e0807n:2039_4: dassaṃsu. Eyyādimhi-dade dadeyya dajje dajjeyya. “Ṭā”ti bahulādhikārā dajjādesā parassa
anya-e0807n:2039_5: eyyassa ṭā, dajjā, dajjuṃ dajjeyyaṃ dadeyyuṃ. Tvādīsu-dadātu, dadantu, dajjatu, dajjantu,
anya-e0807n:2039_6: lasse+kāre detu, dentu iccādi. Sabbattha kammepi yojanīyaṃ.
anya-e0807n:2040_0: Dhā=dhāraṇe, tyādimhi caggahaṇena dvitte pubbākārassa rassatte lalope “catutthadutiyānaṃ
anya-e0807n:2040_1: tatiyapaṭhamā”ti pubbadhakārassa dakāre ca kate dadhāti, dadhanti. Pipubbo, “tadaminā”
anya-e0807n:2040_2: dinā āssa lopo, “dhāssa ho”ti dvitte parassa dhāssa hakāro, dvāraṃ pidahati, pidahanti.
anya-e0807n:2040_3: Lasse+kāre nidheti, nidhenti. Kamme-vidhīyati, vidhīyanti iccādi. Dhassati, pidahissati,
anya-e0807n:2040_4: paridahessati. Adhāsi, pidahi. Adhassa, pidahissa. Dadhe dadheyya, pidahe pidaheyya.
anya-e0807n:2041: Bhūvādi ca juhādi ca, huvādidhātavo ci+me;
anya-e0807n:2044: Adhunā vikaraṇapabhedapakāsanatthaṃ rudhādīnaṃ aṭṭhagaṇānaṃ kānici rūpāni udāhariyante –
anya-e0807n:2047_0: Rudhādiko aparokkhesu kattuvihitamāna+nta+tyādīsu lo hoti mañca+ntasarā paro. Niggahītassa
anya-e0807n:2047_1: vaggantaṃ, “lahussupantassā”ti saṃyogattā na vuddhi. So maggaṃ rundhati, rundhanti
anya-e0807n:2047_2: iccādi. Kamme-nipubbo kyo dhassa cavagga+pubbarūpa+tatiyakkharajakārā, tena maggo
anya-e0807n:2047_3: nirujjhati iccādi. Iñāgame rundhissati, nirujjhissati. Arundhi, arundhiṃsu. Nirujjhittho,
anya-e0807n:2047_4: nirujjhi, nirujjhiṃsu. Arundhissa, arundhissaṃsu, nirujjhissa, nirujjhissaṃsu. Rundhe
anya-e0807n:2047_5: rundheyya, nirujjhe nirujjheyya. Rundhatu, rundhantu. Tvaṃ rundha rundhāhi. Nirujjhatu, nirujjhantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2048_0: Chida=dvedhākaraṇe, chindati, chindanti. Kamme-chijjati, chijjanti. Bhavissatipaccaye
anya-e0807n:2048_1: – “labha vasacchidā” dinā cchaṅādese checchati chindissati. Kamme-pubbarūpaṃ, chijjissati,
anya-e0807n:2048_2: chijjissanti. Achindi chindi, acchejji, acchejjiṃsu. Acchindissā achijjissā. Chinde
anya-e0807n:2048_3: chindeyya, chijje chijjeyya, chindatu, chindantu, chijjatu, chijjantu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2049_1: kkhaṅa”ti dhātvantena saha ssassa kkhaṅādese vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhuñjissati, bhokkhanti,
anya-e0807n:2050: Muca=mocane, muccati, muccanti iccādi. Kamme-muccati, muccanti iccādi. (Rudhādinayo).
anya-e0807n:2051: Diva=kīḷā vijigiṃsā vohāra juti thuti gatīsu,
anya-e0807n:2053_0: Divādīhi kattari lavisaye yaka hoti. Kakāro kānubandhakāriyattho, eva+mupari ca.
anya-e0807n:2053_1: Vassa bakāre pubbarūpaṃ, so jutaṃ dibbati, dibbanti iccādi. Kamme-kye tena dibbati,
anya-e0807n:2053_2: dibbanti iccādi. Dibbissati, tena dibbissati. Adibbi dibbi. Tena adibbi dibbi. Adibbissa.
anya-e0807n:2053_3: Tena adibbissa. Dibbe dibbeyya. Tena dibbe dibbeyya. Dibbatu. Tena dibbatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2054_0: Siva=tantusantāne, sibbati, sibbanti iccādi. Pada=gamane, upubbo, cavaggapubbarūpāni,
anya-e0807n:2054_1: uppajjati, uppajjare uppajjanti iccādi. Kammekye tena paṭipajjate iccādi. Bhāve-uppajjate
anya-e0807n:2054_2: tayā. Budha=avagamane, jhakārapubbarūpāni yakkharesu. Dhammaṃ bujjhati, bujjhare
anya-e0807n:2054_3: bujjhanti iccādi. Kamme-mayā dhammo bujjhate iccādi. Yudha=sampahāre, yujjhati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2054_4: Naha=bandhane, “hassa vipallāso”ti ye vipallāso, sannayhati+ccādi. Mana=ñāṇe, ññakāra+pubbarūpāni,
anya-e0807n:2054_5: maññati+ccādi. Tusa=tuṭṭhimhi, pubbarūpe tussati+ccādi. Sama=upasame, sammati+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2055_0: Jana=janane, “janissā”ti ā hoti kānubandhe bahulādhikārā, so jāyati, jāyanti+ccādi.
anya-e0807n:2055_1: Kamme-janituṃ payojetīti “payojakabyāpāre ṇāpi ce”ti ṇimhi “aññatrāpī”ti vuddhipaṭisedhe
anya-e0807n:2055_2: kyamhi “dīgho sarassā”ti dīghe ca kate tena janīyati, janīyanti iccādi. So jāyissati.
anya-e0807n:2055_3: Tena janissati. So ajāyi, tena ajanīyi. So ajāyissa, tena ajanīyissa. So jāye jāyeyya,
anya-e0807n:2055_4: tena janīyeyya. So jāyatu, tena janīyatu iccādi. (Divādinayo).
anya-e0807n:2058_0: Tudādīhi kattari lavisaye ko hoti. Tudati, tudanti iccādi. Kamme-tudyati tujjati,
anya-e0807n:2058_1: tudyare tudyanti, tujjare tujjanti+ccādi. Tathā tudissati tujjissati. Atudi, atudiṃsu,
anya-e0807n:2058_2: atujji. Atudissa atujjissa, tudeyya tujjeyya. Tudatu, tudantu, tujjatu iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2059_0: Visa=pavesane, papubbo. So gāmaṃ pavisati iccādi. Kamme-pavisīyati iccādi. Pavisissati.
anya-e0807n:2059_1: Pavisīyissati. Pāvisi, īmhi “bhujamucā” dinā yogavibhāgā kkhaṅa. Pāvisi, pavisi pāvekkhi,
anya-e0807n:2059_2: pathaviṃ pāvisiṃsu pavisiṃsu. Pāvisīyi. Pāvisissa pavisissa. Pāvisīyissa. Pavise
anya-e0807n:2059_3: paviseyya, vikaraṇalopo pavisīyeyya. Pavisatu, pavisīyatu iccādi. Nudati. Disa=uccāraṇe,
anya-e0807n:2062_0: Jyādīhi kattari lavisaye knā hoti. Na vuddhi. Kilese jināti, jinanti. Tena kileso
anya-e0807n:2062_1: jīyati, jīyanti, kye dīgho. Jinissati, jinissanti. Ajini jini. Ajīyi, ajīyittha.
anya-e0807n:2062_2: Ajinissa. Ajīyissa. Jineyya. Jinātu iccādi. Ci=caye, tathā cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2067_0: Sanāssa ñāssa nāyo vā hoti timhi. Nāyati, vijānāti iccādi. Kamme-viññāyati iccādi.
anya-e0807n:2067_1: Kye “āsse cā”ti ettha “āsse”ti yogavibhāgā āssa e hoti, yassa dvitte ñeyyati, ñeyyanti
anya-e0807n:2067_2: iccādi. Vijānissati, vijānissanti. Kamme – “kyassa sse”ti kyalope rasse ca kate ñāssati,
